 * Name                                              AIRPORT_STAR

DECLARE
   msgnum NUMBER       := MESSAGE_CODE; 
   msgtxt VARCHAR2(80) := MESSAGE_TEXT; 
   msgtyp VARCHAR2(3)  := MESSAGE_TYPE; 
BEGIN 
   Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
   IF (msgnum = 40400 or msgnum = 40406 or msgnum = 40407) THEN 
     CLEAR_MESSAGE;
--Begin Fix SCR 5767 -- Madhu --26-Sep-2012     
     	:parameter.upd_rec:='N';
		  set_block_property(Name_in('System.Cursor_Block'),update_allowed,property_true);
--End Fix SCR 5767 -- Madhu --26-Sep-2012
     Message('Record has been saved successfully'); 
   ELSIF msgnum in (41051,40350,47316,40353, 40352) then  -- Fix SCR 7219 - Ashish N -13-Dec-2017
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum in (40401, 40405) THEN 
      null;
   ELSE 
      display_alert.one_button('S','Error',msgtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(msgnum)||': '||msgtxt); 
      raise form_trigger_failure;
   END IF; 
END; 
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            ON-ERROR
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 ON-ERROR
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

DECLARE
   msgnum NUMBER       := error_CODE; 
   msgtxt VARCHAR2(80) := error_TEXT; 
   msgtyp VARCHAR2(3)  := error_TYPE; 
   v_block_name    varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block; -- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012 
BEGIN 
   Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
   IF (msgnum = 40400 or msgnum = 40406 or msgnum = 40407) THEN 
      Message('Changes saved successfully'); 
   ELSIF msgnum in (41051, 40350, 47316, 40353, 40352) then  -- Fix SCR 7219 - Ashish N -13-Dec-2017
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum in (40401, 40405) THEN 
      null;
   ELSIF msgnum = 40100 then
   		clear_message;
   		message('At the first record.');
   ELSIF msgnum = 40735 and msgtxt like '%01031%' then
   		clear_message;
   		dsp_msg(msgtxt||' Insufficient privileges. ');
   ELSIF msgnum = 40501 THEN --Fix SCR 7149 --Madhu--18-Oct-2017
   		:control_block.temp_field := 'Y';   		
   ELSIF msgnum in (40508,40509) then
   		dsp_msg(msgtxt||chr(10)||chr(10)||
   		'Please check the exact error message from the "Display Error" in the "HELP" menu');
   		--raise form_trigger_failure; 		
   -- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012 
   ELSIF msgnum IN (40200) THEN
   	IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' THEN
   		IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN
   	   	If :parameter.record_type = 'T' Then
					IF name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
						dsp_msg('Record Cannot be Updated as '||name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT')||' is not associated with DCR# '||:global.dcr_number||' Or with processing Cycle '||:global.processing_cycle);
					ELSE
						dsp_msg('Record Cannot be Updated as '||name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT')||' is not associated with DCR# '||:global.dcr_number||' Or with processing Cycle '||name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'));
					END IF;   	   
					raise form_trigger_failure;	
   			Else
					IF name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
						dsp_msg('STD Record Cannot be Updated with DCR# '||:global.dcr_number||' Or with processing Cycle '||:global.processing_cycle);
					ELSE
						dsp_msg('STD Record Cannot be Updated with DCR# '||:global.dcr_number||' Or with processing Cycle '||name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'));
					END IF;
   	   		raise form_trigger_failure;	
   			End If;
   		ELSE
   			dsp_msg(msgtxt);
   	  	raise form_trigger_failure;			
   	  END IF;	
   	ELSE
   		dsp_msg(msgtxt);
   	  raise form_trigger_failure;	
   	END IF;
   ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
   	  IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' THEN
   	  	null;
   	  else
   	  	dsp_msg(msgtxt);
   	  	raise form_trigger_failure;
   	  end if;
   -- End Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012 
   ELSE 
      display_alert.one_button('S','Error',msgtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(msgnum)||': '||msgtxt); 
      --raise form_trigger_failure;
   END IF; 
END; 

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes

-- Get maximum cycle 
select max(processing_cycle)
into   :global.max_cycle 
from   pl_std_airport
where data_supplier = :global.data_Supplier;

IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED' 
and :system.COORDINATION_OPERATION not in( 'DELETE_RECORD','COUNT_QUERY','DOWN','NEXT_RECORD')THEN
	CHECK_TO_COMMIT(:system.COORDINATION_OPERATION);
	IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED' THEN
		raise form_trigger_failure;
	end if;
end if;
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
  Clear_All_Master_Details;
	if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
		set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
		set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
		hide_view('STD_OVER');
		:CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := null;
		set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_false);
	else			
		set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
		set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
		hide_view('TLD_OVER');
		:CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := null;
		set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_false);
	end if;	
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

IF :System.Cursor_Block like 'PL%STAR' AND :System.Form_Status = 'CHANGED' THEN
	CHECK_TO_COMMIT('DOWN');

		RAISE form_trigger_failure;

BEGIN 
if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
	if :system.record_status != 'NEW' and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
		refresh_master_library.if_refresh;
	end if;	
	if :parameter.library_access like 'PRE%' then
		if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
			go_block('PL_STD_STAR');
		else
			go_block('PL_TLD_STAR');
		end if;
	else
		if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
			go_block('STD_STAR');
		else
			go_block('TLD_STAR');
		end if;
	end if;
end if;

if globals.g_where is not null then
	set_block_property(:system.current_block,default_where,globals.g_where);
end if;

corept_execute_query;

if :parameter.library_access like 'PRE%' then
	:control_block.count_invalid := count_invalid_records(:system.cursor_block);
end if;
if get_block_property(:system.current_block,query_hits) > 0 then
  globals.g_where := null;
  set_block_property(:system.current_block,default_where,'');
end if;
-- Start changes for SCR 3424, Neelima, 26-Nov-2010
EXCEPTION 
WHEN OTHERS THEN
NULL;
END;
--End changes for SCR 3424, Neelima, 26-Nov-2010

if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
	if :system.record_status != 'NEW' and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
		refresh_master_library.if_refresh;
	end if;	
	if :parameter.library_access like 'PRE%' then
		if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
			go_block('PL_STD_STAR');
		else
			go_block('PL_TLD_STAR');
		end if;
	else
		if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
			go_block('STD_STAR');
		else
			go_block('TLD_STAR');
		end if;
	end if;
end if;

globals.g_where := null;
set_block_property(:system.current_block,default_where,'');
corept_enter_query;
if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
	unset_query_menu_items;
end if;

--Begin Fix SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015
IF :parameter.record_type = 'S' OR :Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL = 'Y' THEN
	:Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';
	CHECK_TO_COMMIT('COMMIT');
ELSE
	Copy_Data_Check_PRC(:PL_TLD_STAR.processing_cycle); -- Added for SCR 65036
	IF DCR_Effective_Cycle_Fun(:PL_TLD_STAR.processing_cycle) = 'Y' THEN
		CHECK_TO_COMMIT('COMMIT');

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            KEY-DUPREC
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

if :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
	null;
else
	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'DUP');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012
	IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012
	if :system.cursor_block like '%STAR' then
		message('To copy a STAR record, please use the COPY_RECORDS function under the TOOL menu');
	else
		if :system.cursor_block like '%LEG' then
			if name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.PATH_AND_TERMINATION') is not null or
				name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE') is not null then
				create_record;
			end if;
		elsif name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.data_supplier') is not null then
			create_record;		
		end if;
		duplicate_record;
		if :system.cursor_block like '%LEG' then
			copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.validate_ind');
		end if;
		copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.create_dcr_number');
		copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.update_dcr_number');
		:control_block.validated := 'N';
	end if;
	-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012	
			ELSE
				IF :system.cursor_block LIKE '%APPROACH' THEN
					dsp_msg('To Copy Approach Record use COPY_RECORDS fucntion under Tools Menu.');	
				ELSE
			  	dsp_msg('Record cannot be Duplicated with DCR# '||:GLOBAL.dcr_number);
			  	Raise Form_trigger_failure;				
			  END IF;
			END IF; 
	-- End Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012			
end if;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            KEY-DELREC
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

/*
Mod 6665: SCR 6665--Madhu--25-Aug-2015
Mod 6799: SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015--:Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL is used to suppress the DCR Effective alert message
*/
if :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
	null;
else
	
	if :system.record_status not in ('NEW','INSERT') then
		:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'DEL');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012 
		declare
			p_table_type varchar2(5) :='M2C';
			v_block         varchar2(50):= :system.cursor_block;		
			v_dcr_number         number := name_in(substr(v_block,1,11)||'.create_dcr_number');
			v_processing_cycle number(6):= name_in(v_block||'.processing_cycle');
			v_validate_ind  varchar2(1) := name_in(substr(v_block,1,11)||'.validate_ind');
			v_status        varchar2(10):= :system.form_status;
			ls_Return				VARCHAR2(1);
			CURSOR PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT_cur IS      
    	SELECT 1 FROM PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT P     
    	WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.STAR_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR.STAR_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_STD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_STD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE;
  		CURSOR PL_STD_STAR_LEG_cur IS      
    	SELECT 1 FROM PL_STD_STAR_LEG P     
    	WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.STAR_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR.STAR_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_STD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_STD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE;
			CURSOR PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT_cur IS      
    	SELECT 1 FROM PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT P     
    	WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.STAR_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.STAR_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_TLD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_TLD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE and P.customer_ident = :PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT;
  		CURSOR PL_TLD_STAR_LEG_cur IS      
    	SELECT 1 FROM PL_TLD_STAR_LEG P     
    	WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.STAR_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.STAR_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_TLD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_TLD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE and P.customer_ident = :PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT;
  		CURSOR SEGMENT_PL_STD_LEG_cur IS      
    	SELECT 1 FROM PL_STD_STAR_LEG P     
    	WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.STAR_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR.STAR_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_STD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_STD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE and P.ROUTE_TYPE = :PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE	and p.TRANSITION_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT;
			CURSOR SEGMENT_PL_TLD_LEG_cur IS      
    	SELECT 1 FROM PL_TLD_STAR_LEG P     
    	WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.STAR_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.STAR_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_TLD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_TLD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE AND P.CUSTOMER_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT	and P.ROUTE_TYPE = :PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE and p.TRANSITION_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT;	
			Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
			v_exist_MESSAGE varchar2(100);
			v_button        number(1);
		begin
			if v_status = 'CHANGED' then -- incase validate_ind is manualy modified by user
				v_validate_ind := refresh_ml_utilities.get_validate_ind(substr(v_block,1,11),v_dcr_number);
			end if;
			--
			if v_validate_ind in ('Y','S','H','O') then
    		IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info(v_block,'D') = 'N' THEN
					raise form_trigger_failure;
				END IF;																						
			end if;
			--
			if v_block = 'PL_STD_STAR' then
				OPEN PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT_cur;     
  			FETCH PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT_cur INTO Dummy_Define;     
	  		IF ( PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT_cur%found ) THEN     
  	  		v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing segments and/or legs.';
  			ELSE
  				OPEN PL_STD_STAR_LEG_cur;     
  				FETCH PL_STD_STAR_LEG_cur INTO Dummy_Define;     
	  			IF ( PL_STD_STAR_LEG_cur%found ) THEN     
  	  			v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing legs.';
  				END IF;
  				CLOSE PL_STD_STAR_LEG_cur;			
	  		END IF;
  			CLOSE PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT_cur;
  		elsif v_block = 'PL_TLD_STAR' then
  			OPEN PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT_cur;     
	  		FETCH PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT_cur INTO Dummy_Define;     
  			IF ( PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT_cur%found ) THEN     
    			v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing segments and/or legs.';
  			ELSE
  				OPEN PL_TLD_STAR_LEG_cur;     
	  			FETCH PL_TLD_STAR_LEG_cur INTO Dummy_Define;     
  				IF ( PL_TLD_STAR_LEG_cur%found ) THEN     
    				v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing legs.';
  				END IF;
  				CLOSE PL_TLD_STAR_LEG_cur;			
	  		END IF;
  			CLOSE PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT_cur;		
  		elsif v_block = 'PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT' then
  			OPEN SEGMENT_PL_STD_LEG_cur;
	  		FETCH SEGMENT_PL_STD_LEG_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
  			IF (SEGMENT_PL_STD_LEG_cur%FOUND ) THEN
  				v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing legs.';
  			END IF;
	  		CLOSE SEGMENT_PL_STD_LEG_cur;
  		elsif v_block = 'PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT' then
  			OPEN SEGMENT_PL_TLD_LEG_cur;
  			FETCH SEGMENT_PL_TLD_LEG_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
	  		IF (SEGMENT_PL_TLD_LEG_cur%FOUND ) THEN
  				v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing legs.';
  			END IF;
  			CLOSE SEGMENT_PL_TLD_LEG_cur;
	  	end if;	
  		--
--Start Mod 6799  		
  		IF :Parameter.Record_Type = 'T' THEN
  			ls_Return:=	DCR_Effective_Cycle_Fun(:PL_TLD_STAR.processing_cycle,'D');
  			IF ls_Return = 'Y' THEN
  				:Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'Y';
  			END IF;
  		END IF;
  		IF ls_Return = 'N' THEN
  			RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
  		END IF;
--End Mod 6799
  		IF V_EXIST_MESSAGE IS NOT NULL THEN
  			if v_block like '%STAR' then
  				v_button := DISPLAY_ALERT.MORE_BUTTONs('S','DELETE PROCEDURE',
	 				v_exist_MESSAGE||chr(10)||
 					'Pick your choice carefully:'||chr(10)||chr(10),'Delete All','Cancel');
 					IF v_button = 1 then
  					if v_block = 'PL_STD_STAR' then
  						DELETE FROM PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT P     
	  		  		WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.STAR_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR.STAR_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_STD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_STD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE;
  						DELETE FROM PL_STD_STAR_LEG P     
	    				WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.STAR_IDENT = :PL_STD_STAR.STAR_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_STD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_STD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE;
  					elsif v_block = 'PL_TLD_STAR' then
  						DELETE FROM PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT P     
    					WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.STAR_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.STAR_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_TLD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_TLD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE and P.customer_ident = :PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT;
  	  				DELETE FROM PL_TLD_STAR_LEG P     
    					WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.STAR_IDENT = :PL_TLD_STAR.STAR_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_TLD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_TLD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE and P.customer_ident = :PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT;
	  				end if;
  				else
  					:Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';--Mod 6799
  					raise form_trigger_failure;
  				end if;
	  		elsif v_block like '%SEGMENT' then	
  				v_button := DISPLAY_ALERT.MORE_BUTTONs('S','DELETE PROCEDURE',
 					v_exist_MESSAGE||chr(10)||
 					'Pick your choice carefully:'||chr(10)||chr(10),'Delete Legs too','Delete Segment only','Cancel');
 					IF v_button = 1 then	
  					if v_block = 'PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT' then
  						go_block('PL_STD_STAR_LEG');
  						first_record;
  						loop
  							if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type = :PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.route_type and
  								:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident = :PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.transition_ident then
  								if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.ref_info is null then
  									:Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del:='Y';--Mod 6665
  									delete_record;
  								else
  									:control_block.std_validation_errors := 'The leg with seq# '||:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.sequence_num||' of the seg: '||:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.ref_info;
  									raise form_trigger_failure;
  								end if;	
  							else
  								exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  								next_record;
  							end if;	
  						end loop;
  						first_record;
  						set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
							go_block('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT');
  					elsif v_block = 'PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT' then
  						go_block('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG');
  						first_record;
  						loop
  							if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type = :PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.route_type and
  								:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident = :PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.transition_ident then
  								if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.ref_info is null then
  									:Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del:='Y';--Mod 6665
  									delete_record;
  								else
  									:control_block.tld_validation_errors := 'The leg with seq# '||:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.sequence_num||' of the seg: '||:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.ref_info;
  									raise form_trigger_failure;
  								end if;
  							else
  								exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  								next_record;
  							end if;	
  						end loop;
  						first_record;
  						set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
							go_block('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT');
  					end if;
  				elsif v_button = 3 then
  					:Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';--Mod 6799
  					raise form_trigger_failure;
	  			end if;			
  			end if;
  		else
  			if v_block like '%LEG' then
  				if DISPLAY_ALERT.MORE_BUTTONs('S','DELETE A LEG',
 					  'Please be sure that you want to delete this leg.'||chr(10)||chr(10),'Delete','Cancel')=2 then
 					  :Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';--Mod 6799
 					  raise form_trigger_failure;
  				end if;
  			end if;
  		end if;			
			--
			if v_validate_ind in ('Y','S','H','O') and v_block like '%STAR' then
  			refresh_master_library.delete_from_ref_table(v_dcr_number);
			end if;	
			--
			IF :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
				v_processing_cycle IN (:global.new_processing_cycle,:global.old_processing_cycle) AND
				v_validate_ind IN ('Y','S','H','O') THEN
				if v_block like '%STAR' then
  				dsp_msg('System is going to refresh this deletion for the master library table.');
  				refresh_master_library.refresh_a_record(p_table_type,v_dcr_number,v_processing_cycle,substr(v_block,4,3)||'_STAR','I');
  				delete_record;
  				commit_form;
  				refresh_master_library.set_record_group(v_dcr_number,'I',substr(v_block,4,3)||'_STAR',v_processing_cycle,'D');
  				:Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';--Mod 6799
  				dsp_msg('Refresh Successful and the deletion is commited.');
  			else
					refresh_master_library.set_record_group(v_dcr_number,v_validate_ind,substr(v_block,1,11),v_processing_cycle,'D');
					:Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del:='Y';--Mod 6665
					delete_record;
				end if;
			else
				:Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del:='Y';--Mod 6665
				delete_record;
				if v_block like '%STAR' then
					:Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';--Mod 6799
					commit_form;
				end if;	
			end if;
		end;
	else
		delete_record;
	end if;
	:control_block.validated := 'N';
end if;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            PRE-COMMIT
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

if name_in('CONTROL_BLOCK.'||substr(:system.cursor_block,4,3)||'_VALIDATION_ERRORS') is not null 
	and name_in(substr(:system.cursor_block,1,7)||'STAR.REF_INFO') is not null then
	raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            KEY-EXIT
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

DECLARE
   ls_Form_Id     FORMMODULE;
   ls_Data_type   VARCHAR2(30);
   ls_process_id WEBUTIL_HOST.process_id;
BEGIN 
   ls_Form_Id    := FIND_FORM( lower('AIRPORT_STAR'));
   ls_Data_type  := TO_CHAR(ls_Form_Id.ID);
    
   IF Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID.COUNT >= 1 THEN
       
       FOR plot_exe_no IN Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID.FIRST..Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID.LAST
       LOOP
          IF Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(plot_exe_no).ls_DataType = ls_Data_type THEN
             --Plot_Global_Pkg.Exit_CorePTDU_Plot(Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(plot_exe_no).ln_Process_ID);
             ls_process_id.handle :=TO_number(Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(plot_exe_no).ln_Process_ID);
             --FORMS11g PITSS
             WEBUTIL_HOST.Terminate_Process(ls_process_id);
          END IF;   
      END LOOP; 
   
   END IF;
   
   IF :SYSTEM.MODE = 'NORMAL' THEN
      CHECK_TO_COMMIT('EXIT');
   END IF;
   
   Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
   
   Exit_form;
END;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            WHEN-FORM-NAVIGATE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

IF :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' AND Name_In('global.check_save') = 'Y' THEN --5320
	Check_Save_PRC('Airport STAR');
END IF;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            TRIGGER_PITSS_CON_HIDE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

/*This Form is manipulated with PITSS.CON!*/
null;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No

   ----------
 - Attached PL/SQL Libraries                         
 * Blocks                                            
   ----------
   * Name                                            PL_STD_STAR
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Navigation Style                                Same Record
   * Previous Navigation Data Block                  PL_STD_STAR_LEG
   * Next Navigation Data Block                      PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT
   * Current Record Visual Attribute Group           CURRENT_RECORD
   * Query Array Size                                4500
   - Number of Records Buffered                      0
   * Number of Records Displayed                     1
   - Query All Records                               No
   - Record Orientation                              Vertical
   - Single Record                                   No
   - Database Data Block                             Yes
   - Enforce Primary Key                             No
   - Query Allowed                                   Yes
   - Query Data Source Type                          Table
   * Query Data Source Name                          PL_STD_STAR
   * Query Data Source Columns                       
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   AIRPORT_ICAO
     * Column Type                                   VARCHAR2
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        2
     * Precision                                     0
     * Scale                                         0
     * Mandatory                                     Yes
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   AIRPORT_IDENT
     * Column Type                                   VARCHAR2
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        4
     * Precision                                     0
     * Scale                                         0
     * Mandatory                                     Yes
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   SID_IDENT
     * Column Type                                   VARCHAR2
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        6
     * Precision                                     0
     * Scale                                         0
     * Mandatory                                     Yes
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   DATA_SUPPLIER
     * Column Type                                   VARCHAR2
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        1
     * Precision                                     0
     * Scale                                         0
     * Mandatory                                     Yes
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   PROCESSING_CYCLE
     * Column Type                                   NUMBER
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        0
     * Precision                                     6
     * Scale                                         0
     * Mandatory                                     Yes
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   SID_TYPE
     * Column Type                                   VARCHAR2
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        1
     * Precision                                     0
     * Scale                                         0
     * Mandatory                                     No
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   AREA_CODE
     * Column Type                                   VARCHAR2
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        3
     * Precision                                     0
     * Scale                                         0
     * Mandatory                                     No
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   VALIDATE_IND
     * Column Type                                   VARCHAR2
     - Column Type Name                              
     - Parent Column                                 
     * Length                                        1

     * Scale                                         0
     * Mandatory                                     No
     ----------
     * Column Name                                   CREATE_DCR_NUMBER
     * Column Type                                   NUMBER
     - Column Type Name

     * Length                                        0

     ----------
     * Column Name                                   UPDATE_DCR_NUMBER

   - Query Data Source Arguments                     
   - Alias                                           
   - Include REF Item                                No
   - WHERE Clause                                    
   * ORDER BY Clause                                 airport_ident,airport_icao,star_ident,processing_cycle
   - Optimizer Hint                                  
   - Insert Allowed                                  Yes
   - Update Allowed                                  Yes
   - Locking Mode                                    Automatic
   - Delete Allowed                                  Yes
   - Key Mode                                        Automatic
   - Update Changed Columns Only                     No
   - Enforce Column Security                         No
   - Maximum Query Time                              0
   - Maximum Records Fetched                         0
   - DML Data Target Type                            Table
   - DML Data Target Name                            
   - Insert Procedure Name                           
   - Insert Procedure Result Set Columns             
   - Insert Procedure Arguments                      
   - Update Procedure Name                           
   - Update Procedure Result Set Columns             
   - Update Procedure Arguments                      
   - Delete Procedure Name                           
   - Delete Procedure Result Set Columns             
   - Delete Procedure Arguments

   - Precompute Summaries                            No
   - DML Returning Value                             No

if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
	IF :PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT IS NOT NULL AND
		(:SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED' or nvl(:pl_std_star.validate_ind,'N') != 'Y') and
		(:control_block.validated = 'N' or :control_block.temp_dcr != :pl_std_star.create_dcr_number) then
		validate_procedure;
	end if;
  :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012	
	if_from_leg_search(2);
	:control_block.temp_dcr := nvl(:pl_std_star.create_dcr_number,0);
	if :CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS is not null then
		if get_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' then
			set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_true);
			set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',ENABLED, property_true);
		end if;	
	else
		set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',ENABLED, property_false);
		set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_false);
	end if;	
end if;

if :global.from_error_summary != 'Y' then
	:pl_std_star.data_supplier    := :global.data_supplier;
	if :display_item_block.allow_both_cycles = 'N' then
  	:pl_std_star.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
	end if;

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
  :pl_std_star.old_validate_ind     := :pl_std_star.validate_ind;
  :pl_std_STAR.ref_info := get_ref_info('PL_STD_STAR',:pl_std_STAR.create_dcr_number);
  :control_block.validated := 'N';  
  :control_block.STD_VALIDATION_ERRORS := null;
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.record_status != 'QUERY' and :system.cursor_block = 'PL_STD_STAR'then
	if nvl(:pl_std_star.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','I','O') or
		(nvl(:pl_std_star.old_validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') and
		nvl(:pl_std_star.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O')) then
		dsp_msg('You can only update the validate_ind to ''Y'',''S'',''H'',''W'' or ''N''');
		:pl_std_star.validate_ind := :pl_std_star.old_validate_ind;
	end if;
	if :pl_std_star.validate_ind is null and :pl_std_star.old_validate_ind is not null then
		:pl_std_star.validate_ind := :pl_std_star.old_validate_ind;
	end if;
	if :PL_STD_STAR.ref_info is not null and 
		:PL_STD_STAR.validate_ind in ('W','N','I') then
		:control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS := :PL_STD_STAR.ref_info;
		set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
		set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
		:PL_STD_STAR.validate_ind := :PL_STD_STAR.old_validate_ind;
	end if;	
	if :pl_std_star.processing_cycle is null then
		:pl_std_star.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
	end if;	
	if :system.record_status in ('NEW','INSERT') then  	
		if check_proc_pk = FALSE then
			dsp_msg('This record already exists!');
			raise form_trigger_failure;
		end if;		
		:pl_std_star.data_supplier    := :global.data_supplier;
		if rtrim(:pl_std_star.create_dcr_number) is null then
			select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_std_star.create_dcr_number from dual;
			:control_block.temp_dcr := :pl_std_star.create_dcr_number;
		end if;
		:pl_std_star.validate_ind := 'I';
		:pl_std_star.old_validate_ind := 'I';
		:control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1;
	end if;	
  :control_block.validated := 'N';
  validate_keys;
  if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
    (:pl_std_star.old_validate_ind = 'Y' or :pl_std_star.validate_ind = 'Y') then
    if :PL_STD_STAR.processing_cycle in (:global.new_processing_cycle, :global.old_processing_cycle) then
			refresh_master_library.set_record_group
			(:PL_STD_STAR.create_dcr_number,:PL_STD_STAR.validate_ind,
		 	'PL_STD_STAR',:PL_STD_STAR.processing_cycle,'U');
		end if; 	
  end if;    
end if;

     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No

     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------

     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :pl_std_star.validate_ind = 'I' then
	:control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid - 1;	
end if;
set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
  recstat     VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status;   
  startitm    VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item;   
  rel_id      Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
  IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN   
    RETURN;
  END IF;
  --
  -- Begin PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT detail program section
  --
  IF ( (:PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:PL_STD_STAR.STAR_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_STD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) or (:PL_STD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE is not null) ) THEN   
    rel_id := Find_Relation('PL_STD_STAR.PL_STD_STAR_PL_STD_STAR_SE');   
    Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT');   
  END IF;
  --
  -- End PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT detail program section
  --
  --
  -- Begin PL_STD_STAR_LEG detail program section
  --
  IF ( (:PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_STD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:PL_STD_STAR.STAR_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_STD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) or (:PL_STD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE is not null) ) THEN   
    rel_id := Find_Relation('PL_STD_STAR.PL_STD_STAR_PL_STD_STAR_LEG');   
    Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PL_STD_STAR_LEG');   
  END IF;
  --
  -- End PL_STD_STAR_LEG detail program section
  --

  IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN     
     Go_Item(startitm);     
     Check_Package_Failure;     
  END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
if :PL_STD_STAR.validate_ind = 'I' then
		set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
		set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
end if;

	IF rtrim(:pl_std_star.specials_ind) IS NULL THEN
		:pl_std_star.specials_ind := 'N';

IF :System.Record_Status IN ('INSERT','NEW') THEN 
   :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
Else
	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012	
End If;
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :pl_std_star_segment.route_type is not null then
	if refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT','W') = 'N' then
    set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
    set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
    set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.AIRCRAFT_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE); --65347
	else
		set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
   	set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
   	set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.AIRCRAFT_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE); --65347
	end if;
--	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012
end if;
--
if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then  
  go_block('PL_STD_STAR_LEG');
  first_record;
  loop
  	if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
  		:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND
  		 :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
  		:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
  		:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
  		:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
  	end if;
  	exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  	next_record;
  end loop;	
	first_record;
	:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
	:control_block.pk_aircraft_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_route_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_transition_change :='N'; --5699
	go_block('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT');
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.block_status != 'QUERY' then
	if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then
		if check_segment_pk = FALSE then
			dsp_msg('This change will generate a duplicate record! ');
			:pl_std_star_segment.route_type      := :pl_std_star_segment.old_route_type;
			:pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident:= :pl_std_star_segment.old_transition_ident;
			:pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type:= :pl_std_star_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
			:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
			:control_block.pk_aircraft_change :='N';  --5699
			:control_block.pk_route_change :='N';  --5699
			:control_block.pk_transition_change :='N'; --5699
		end if;
	end if;
	if :pl_std_star_segment.create_dcr_number is null then
		select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_std_star_segment.create_dcr_number from dual;
		:pl_std_star_segment.old_route_type := :pl_std_star_segment.route_type;
		:pl_std_star_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident;
		:pl_std_star_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
		:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
		:control_block.pk_aircraft_change :='N';  --5699
		:control_block.pk_route_change :='N';  --5699
		:control_block.pk_transition_change :='N'; --5699
	end if;
	:control_block.validated := 'N';
end if;

  :pl_std_star_segment.old_transition_ident    := :pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident;
  :pl_std_star_segment.old_aircraft_type    := :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347

     * Name                                          KEY-CREREC

declare
	lc_cur_rec varchar2(5);
begin
:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 16-Sep-2012
IF 	:parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN	 --Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 26-Sep-2012
	-- Begin Fix SCR 4905 -- Venkat M 04-Jun-2019
	if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'N' and :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT' and 
		(:pl_std_star_segment.old_route_type <> :pl_std_star_segment.route_type or 
		 :pl_std_star_segment.old_transition_ident <> :pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident OR
		  :pl_std_star_segment.old_aircraft_type <> :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type) then --65347
		  lc_cur_rec := :system.cursor_record;
  		go_block('PL_STD_STAR_LEG');
  		first_record;
  		loop
  			if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
  				 :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND
  				  :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
  				 :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
  				 :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
  				 :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
  			end if;
  			exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  			next_record;
  		end loop;	
			first_record;
			:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
			:control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
			:control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
			:control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
			go_block('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT');
			go_record(lc_cur_rec);
	end if;
	--End Fix SCR 4905 -- Venkat M 04-Jun-2019				
	create_record; 
	go_item('pl_std_star_segment.route_type');
End If;
end;

		end;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012

	If :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' Then		
			dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));

if :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_route_type     != :pl_std_STAR_segment.route_type  
	AND (:control_block.pk_aircraft_change = 'Y' or :control_block.pk_transition_change = 'Y' )		then
	
	:control_block.old_route_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_route_type;
  --:control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident;
  --:control_block.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
  :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.route_type;
  :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_std_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :control_block.new_aircraft_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
  :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_route_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.route_type;
  --:pl_std_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  --:pl_std_STAR_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
  :control_block.pk_route_change := 'Y'; -- 5699
  :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
  :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';	
	
ELSIF :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_route_type     != :pl_std_STAR_segment.route_type THEN
  :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_route_type;
  :control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident;
  :control_block.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
  :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.route_type;
  :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_std_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :control_block.new_aircraft_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
  :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_route_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.route_type;
  :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
  :control_block.pk_route_change := 'Y'; -- 5699
  :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; -- 5699
  :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; -- 5699
  :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
end if;

LOOP
	IF :pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident = :pl_std_star_leg.transition_ident THEN
		next_item;
		EXIT;
	ELSE 
		next_record;
	END IF;
	EXIT WHEN :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
END LOOP;

  --:pl_std_STAR_segment.old_route_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.route_type;
  --:pl_std_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :pl_std_STAR_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.aircraft_type; 
  :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
  :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N';
  :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N';
  :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'Y';

if ERROR_CODE = 40200 then
		declare 
			v_message varchar2(1);
		begin
			v_message := refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT','C');
		end;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
		:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');
	If :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' Then		
			dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));
	End If;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
end if;
       - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes
       - Execution Hierarchy                         Override
       - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                  No

if :pl_std_star_segment.old_transition_ident     != :pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident then
  :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_std_star_segment.old_route_type;
  :control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_star_segment.old_transition_ident;
  :control_block.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_star_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
  :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_std_star_segment.route_type;
  :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident;
  :control_block.new_aircraft_type := :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
  :pl_std_star_segment.old_route_type := :pl_std_star_segment.route_type;
  :pl_std_star_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident;
  :pl_std_star_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
  :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
end if;

If :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code is not null then
	-- Fill the character 1 through 4
	:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.wc1 := substr(rpad(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),1,1);
	:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.wc2 := substr(rpad(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),2,1);
	:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.wc3 := substr(rpad(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),3,1);
	:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.wc4 := substr(rpad(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),4,1);
end if;
	
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
  if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then  
  	first_record;
  	loop
  		if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
  			:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND 
  			:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
  			:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
  			:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
  			:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
  		end if;
  		exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  		next_record;
  	end loop;	
		:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
		:control_block.pk_aircraft_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_route_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_transition_change :='N'; --5699
		first_record;
	end if;
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :system.cursor_record != '1' and :pl_std_star_leg.sequence_num is null then
	previous_record;
else
	if :pl_std_star_leg.sequence_num is not null and :pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind = 'I' then
		validate_leg;
	else
		set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
	end if;
	if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and rtrim(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.FIX_IDENT) is not null then
		:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.ref_info := get_ref_info('PL_STD_STAR_LEG',:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.create_dcr_number);
    if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.ref_info is not null then
      set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_LEG.FIX_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
      set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
      set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
      set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);	
		else
			set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_LEG.FIX_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
     	set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
     	set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
     	set_item_property('PL_STD_STAR_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);	
		end if;
	end if;	
IF :System.Record_Status IN ('INSERT','NEW') THEN 
   :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
Else
	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012	
End If;
--	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.block_status != 'QUERY' then	
	if nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.sequence_num, '-1') != '-1' then
		if nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','I','O') then
			dsp_msg('Validate indicator can only ''Y'',''S'',''H'',''W'',''N'' or ''I''');
			:pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind := null;
		end if;
		if :pl_std_STAR_leg.validate_ind in ('I','W','N') and :pl_std_STAR.ref_info is not null then
			:pl_std_STAR_leg.validate_ind := null;
		end if;
		if :system.record_status in ('NEW','INSERT') then
			:pl_std_star_leg.file_recno       := 0;
			if rtrim(:pl_std_star_leg.create_dcr_number) is null then
				select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_std_star_leg.create_dcr_number from dual;
			end if;
		end if;	
		if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE is null and
			nvl(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.CENTER_FIX_IDENT,'NOPT') != 'NOPT' and 
			:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.PATH_AND_TERMINATION != 'RF' then
			:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE := '0';
		end if;
		validate_leg;
		:control_block.validated := 'N';
	end if;
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          KEY-UP
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.PATH_AND_TERMINATION is null and
	:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE is null and :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.create_dcr_number is null then
	clear_record;
	if :system.last_record = 'FALSE' then
		previous_record;
	end if;
else
	previous_record;
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          KEY-DOWN
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE is null and :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.path_and_termination is null then
	null;
else
	:control_block.pre_seq          := :pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num;
	:control_block.transition_ident := :pl_std_STAR_leg.transition_ident;
	:control_block.route_type       := :pl_std_STAR_leg.route_type;
	:control_block.aircraft_type       := :pl_std_STAR_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
	next_record;
	if :pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num is null then
		:pl_std_STAR_leg.route_type       := :control_block.route_type;
		:pl_std_STAR_leg.transition_ident := :control_block.transition_ident;
		:pl_std_STAR_leg.aircraft_type := :control_block.aircraft_type; --65347
		:pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num     := :control_block.pre_seq + 10;
	end if;
	go_item('pl_std_STAR_leg.fix_ident');
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          KEY-CREREC
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012
IF 	:parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN	-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012	
-- To provide a sequence number for a new record
if get_block_property('pl_std_STAR_leg',current_record) = 1 and 
	:pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num is null then
	go_block('pl_std_STAR_segment');
	first_record;
	if :pl_std_STAR_segment.route_type is not null then 
		go_block('pl_std_STAR_leg');
		:pl_std_STAR_leg.route_type       := :pl_std_STAR_segment.route_type;
		:pl_std_STAR_leg.transition_ident := :pl_std_STAR_segment.transition_ident;	
		:pl_std_STAR_leg.aircraft_type := :pl_std_STAR_segment.aircraft_type;	--65347
		:pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num     := 10;
	else
		if message_code = 40102 THEN
			clear_message;
		end if;
		message('Please create the segment first.');
		raise form_trigger_failure;
	end if; 
else
	:control_block.pre_seq          := :pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num;
	:control_block.transition_ident := :pl_std_STAR_leg.transition_ident;
	:control_block.route_type       := :pl_std_STAR_leg.route_type;
	:control_block.aircraft_type       := :pl_std_STAR_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
	create_record;
	:pl_std_STAR_leg.route_type      := :control_block.route_type;
	:pl_std_STAR_leg.transition_ident:= :control_block.transition_ident;
	:pl_std_STAR_leg.aircraft_type:= :control_block.aircraft_type; --65347
	:pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num := '-1';
	next_record;
	if :control_block.route_type      != :pl_std_STAR_leg.route_type or
		:control_block.transition_ident != :pl_std_STAR_leg.transition_ident or
		:control_block.aircraft_type != :pl_std_STAR_leg.aircraft_type OR --65347
		:pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num is null then
 		Previous_Record;
 		:pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num := :control_block.pre_seq + 10;
 	else
		:control_block.next_seq      := :pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num;
		Previous_Record;
		:pl_std_STAR_leg.sequence_num := floor((:control_block.pre_seq +	:control_block.next_seq)/2);
	end if;
end if;
go_item('pl_std_STAR_leg.fix_ident');
END IF; -- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012

if ERROR_CODE = 40200 then
		declare 
			v_message varchar2(1);
		begin
			v_message := refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_STD_STAR_LEG','C');
		end;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');		
	If :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' Then		
			dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));
	End If;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
end if;

--Begin Fix SCR 6626--Madhu --28-Jan-2016
Mag_Course_Prc(:PL_STD_STAR_Leg.Magnetic_Course);

IF LENGTH(:PL_STD_STAR_Leg.Magnetic_Course) > 4 THEN
	dsp_msg('Magnetic Course should not exceed 4 characters');
	RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
END IF;
--End Fix SCR 6626--Madhu --28-Jan-2016

if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
	if :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT IS NOT NULL AND 
		(:SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED' or nvl(:pl_tld_star.validate_ind,'N') != 'Y') and
		(:control_block.validated = 'N' or :control_block.temp_dcr != :pl_tld_star.create_dcr_number) then
		validate_procedure;
	end if;
	if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
		if :pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag = 'N' then
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'default');
		else
			if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and :pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag = 'Y' then
				set_item_property('pl_tld_star.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
				set_item_property('pl_tld_star.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
			else	
				set_item_property('pl_tld_star.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
				set_item_property('pl_tld_star.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'default');
			end if;
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'default');
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');	
		end if;
	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012	
	end if;
	if_from_leg_search(2);
	:control_block.temp_dcr := nvl(:pl_tld_star.create_dcr_number,0);
	if :CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS is not null then
		if get_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' then
			set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_true);
			set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',ENABLED, property_true);
		end if;			
	else
		set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',ENABLED, property_false);
		set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_false);
	end if;	
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          PRE-QUERY
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :global.from_error_summary != 'Y' then
	:pl_tld_star.data_supplier    := :global.data_supplier;
	if :display_item_block.allow_both_cycles = 'N' then
  	:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
	end if;
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          POST-QUERY
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments

     * Trigger Text                                  

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
  :pl_tld_star.old_processing_cycle := :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle;
  :pl_tld_star.old_g_in_house := :pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag;
  :pl_tld_star.old_validate_ind     := :pl_tld_star.validate_ind;
  :pl_tld_STAR.ref_info := get_ref_info('PL_TLD_STAR',:pl_tld_STAR.create_dcr_number);
  :control_block.validated := 'N';
  :control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS := null;
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.record_status != 'QUERY' and :system.cursor_block = 'PL_TLD_STAR' then
	if nvl(:pl_tld_star.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','I','O') or
		(nvl(:pl_tld_star.old_validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') and
		nvl(:pl_tld_star.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O')) then
		dsp_msg('You can only update the validate_ind to ''Y'',''S'',''H'',''W'' or ''N''');
		:pl_tld_star.validate_ind := :pl_tld_star.old_validate_ind;
	end if;
	if :pl_tld_star.validate_ind is null and :pl_tld_star.old_validate_ind is not null then
		:pl_tld_star.validate_ind := :pl_tld_star.old_validate_ind;
	end if;
	if :pl_tld_STAR.ref_info is not null and 
		:pl_tld_STAR.validate_ind in ('W','N','I') then
		:control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS := :pl_tld_STAR.ref_info;
		set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
		set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
		:pl_tld_STAR.validate_ind := :pl_tld_STAR.old_validate_ind;
	end if;
	validate_extra_fields(:PL_TLD_STAR.processing_cycle,:PL_TLD_STAR.generated_in_house_flag);
	if :system.record_status not in ('NEW','INSERT') then
		if :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle != :pl_tld_star.old_processing_cycle then
			if check_proc_pk = FALSE then
				dsp_msg('This change will generate a duplicate record! ');
				:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_star.old_processing_cycle;
			else
				if :pl_tld_STAR.ref_info is not null THEN
					:control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS := :pl_tld_STAR.ref_info;
					set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
					set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
					:pl_tld_STAR.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_STAR.old_processing_cycle;
				end if;
			end if;	
		end if;
	else
		if check_proc_pk = FALSE then
			dsp_msg('This record already exists!');
			raise form_trigger_failure;
		end if;		
		:pl_tld_star.data_supplier    := :global.data_supplier;
		if rtrim(:pl_tld_star.create_dcr_number) is null then
			select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_tld_star.create_dcr_number from dual;
			:control_block.temp_dcr := :pl_tld_star.create_dcr_number;
		end if;
		:pl_tld_star.update_dcr_number := :global.dcr_number;
		:pl_tld_star.validate_ind := 'I';
		:pl_tld_star.old_validate_ind := 'I';
		:control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1;
	end if;	
	:control_block.validated := 'N';
	validate_keys;
	if :system.record_status not in ('NEW','INSERT') then
		if :control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS is not null and :PL_TLD_STAR.ref_info is not null then
			:PL_TLD_STAR.GENERATED_IN_HOUSE_FLAG := :PL_TLD_STAR.OLD_G_IN_HOUSE;
		else
			if :PL_TLD_star.OLD_G_IN_HOUSE != :PL_TLD_star.GENERATED_IN_HOUSE_FLAG or
			:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle != :pl_tld_star.old_processing_cycle then
			-- Reset the old values  
	    :pl_tld_star.old_processing_cycle := :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle;	
	    :pl_tld_star.old_g_in_house := :pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag;	
			:PL_TLD_star.flag_change := 'Y';
			end if;
		end if;
	end if;
	if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
    (:pl_tld_star.old_validate_ind = 'Y' or :pl_tld_star.validate_ind = 'Y') then
    if :PL_TLD_STAR.processing_cycle in (:global.new_processing_cycle, :global.old_processing_cycle) then
			refresh_master_library.set_record_group
			(:PL_TLD_STAR.create_dcr_number,:PL_TLD_STAR.validate_ind,
		 	'PL_TLD_STAR',:PL_TLD_STAR.processing_cycle,'U');
		end if; 	
  end if;
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          POST-DELETE
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :pl_tld_star.validate_ind = 'I' then
	:control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid - 1;	
end if;
set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
  recstat     VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status;   
  startitm    VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item;   
  rel_id      Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
  IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN   
    RETURN;
  END IF;
  --
  -- Begin PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT detail program section
  --
  IF ( (:PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:PL_TLD_STAR.STAR_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_TLD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) or (:PL_TLD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE is not null) or (:PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT is not null) ) THEN   
    rel_id := Find_Relation('PL_TLD_STAR.PL_TLD_STAR_PL_TLD_STAR_SE');   
    Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT');   
  END IF;
  --
  -- End PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT detail program section
  --
  --
  -- Begin PL_TLD_STAR_LEG detail program section
  --
  IF ( (:PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:PL_TLD_STAR.STAR_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_TLD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) or (:PL_TLD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE is not null) or (:PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT is not null) ) THEN   
    rel_id := Find_Relation('PL_TLD_STAR.PL_TLD_STAR_PL_TLD_STAR_LEG');   
    Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PL_TLD_STAR_LEG');   
  END IF;
  --
  -- End PL_TLD_STAR_LEG detail program section
  --

  IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN     
     Go_Item(startitm);     
     Check_Package_Failure;     
  END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
if :PL_TLD_STAR.validate_ind = 'I' then
	set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
	set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
end if;

if instr(:PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT,'%') > 0 or instr(:PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT,'_') > 0 then
	dsp_msg('Wildcard ''%'' and/or ''_'' is not allowed.');
	:PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT := null;
	raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;
--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012
DECLARE
   v_flag           NUMBER;
   v_allow_update   NUMBER := 0;
   v_block_name     VARCHAR2 (30) := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
BEGIN
   v_allow_update := 0;

   IF :SYSTEM.record_status IN ('NEW', 'INSERT') THEN
      IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_Flag :=  validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         ELSE
            v_Flag := validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         END IF;
      ELSE
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_Flag :=  validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         ELSE
            v_Flag := validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         END IF;
      END IF;

      IF :global.data_supplier IN ('J', 'L', 'E') THEN
         IF v_Flag IN (6, 4, 3, 2, 1) THEN
            v_allow_update := 1;
            :PL_TLD_STAR.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle; --7607
            --:control_block.comp_cycle := get_cycle; --7607
            :parameter.comp_cycle := get_cycle; --8002
         ELSIF v_Flag = 0 THEN
						IF name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
							dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||:global.processing_cycle);
						ELSE
							dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'));
						END	IF;
            RAISE FORM_trigger_failure;
         END IF;
      ELSIF :global.data_supplier IN ('Q', 'N')THEN
         IF v_Flag = 5 THEN
            v_allow_update := 1;
            :PL_TLD_STAR.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle; --7607
            --:control_block.comp_cycle := get_cycle; --7607
            :parameter.comp_cycle := get_cycle; --8002
         END IF;
      END IF;
   END IF;
END;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012

DECLARE
		ls_Return VARCHAR2(1);--Fix SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015
BEGIN
	IF rtrim(:pl_tld_STAR.processing_cycle) IS NULL THEN
		:pl_tld_STAR.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
	ELSE
--Begin Fix SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015		
		ls_Return := DCR_Effective_Cycle_Fun(:pl_tld_STAR.processing_cycle);
	     IF ls_Return = 'N' THEN
	     	RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
	     END IF;
	END IF;
END;
--End Fix SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015

--Begin Fix SCR 7607 --Madhu
DECLARE
   ls_icao   VARCHAR2 (2);
BEGIN

   ls_icao :=
      populate_airport_icao (RTRIM (:pl_tld_star.airport_ident),
                     RTRIM (:pl_tld_star.airport_icao),
                     :pl_tld_star.customer_ident,
                     :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle,
                     NVL (:pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag, 'Y'));

   IF ls_icao = '--' THEN
      :pl_tld_star.airport_icao := NULL;
   ELSE
      :pl_tld_star.airport_icao := ls_icao;
   END IF;

END;
--End Fix SCR 7607--Madhu

--Begin Fix SCR 6709.08 -- Madhu --12-Apr-2016
IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN
	IF rtrim(:pl_tld_star.specials_ind) IS NULL THEN
		:pl_tld_star.specials_ind := 'N';
	END IF;	
END IF;
