if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type is not null then
	if refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT','W') = 'N' then
    set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
    set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
    set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.AIRCRAFT_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE); --65347
	else
		set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
   	set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
   	set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.AIRCRAFT_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE); --65347
	end if;
-- :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012
IF :System.Record_Status IN ('INSERT','NEW') THEN 
   :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
Else
	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012	
End If;	
end if;
if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then  
  go_block('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG');
  first_record;
  loop
  	if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
  		:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND 
  		:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
  		:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
  		:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
  		:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
  	end if;
  	exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  	next_record;
  end loop;	
	first_record;
	:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
	:control_block.pk_aircraft_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_route_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_transition_change :='N'; --5699
	go_block('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT');
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.block_status != 'QUERY' then
	if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then
	  if check_segment_pk = FALSE then
			dsp_msg('This change will generate a duplicate record! ');
			:pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type      := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_route_type;
			:pl_tld_STAR_segment.transition_ident:= :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident;
			:pl_tld_STAR_segment.aircraft_type:= :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
			:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
			:control_block.pk_aircraft_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_route_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_transition_change :='N'; --5699			
	 	end if;
	end if;
	if :pl_tld_star_segment.create_dcr_number is null then
		select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_tld_star_segment.create_dcr_number from dual;
		:pl_tld_star_segment.generated_in_house_flag := :PL_TLD_STAR.GENERATED_IN_HOUSE_FLAG;
		:pl_tld_star_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type;
		:pl_tld_star_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_star_segment.transition_ident;
		:pl_tld_star_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
		:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
		:control_block.pk_aircraft_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_route_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_transition_change :='N'; --5699
	end if;	
	:control_block.validated := 'N';
end if;

     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          POST-QUERY
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
  :pl_tld_star_segment.old_route_type        := :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type;
  :pl_tld_star_segment.old_transition_ident    := :pl_tld_star_segment.transition_ident;
  :pl_tld_star_segment.old_aircraft_type    := :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          KEY-CREREC
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

declare
	lc_cur_rec varchar2(5);
begin
:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 16-Sep-2012
IF 	:parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN	 --Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 26-Sep-2012
	-- Begin Fix SCR 4905 -- Venkat M 04-Jun-2019
	if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'N' and :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT' and 
		(:pl_tld_star_segment.old_route_type <> :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type or 
		 :pl_tld_star_segment.old_transition_ident <> :pl_tld_star_segment.transition_ident OR
		  :pl_tld_star_segment.old_aircraft_type <> :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type) then --65347
		  lc_cur_rec := :system.cursor_record;
  		go_block('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG');
  		first_record;
  		loop
  			if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
  				 :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND 
  				 :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
  				 :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
  				 :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
  				 :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
  			end if;
  			exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  			next_record;
  		end loop;	
			first_record;
			:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
			:control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
			:control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
			:control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
			go_block('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT');
			go_record(lc_cur_rec);
	end if;
	--End Fix SCR 4905 -- Venkat M 04-Jun-2019		
	create_record; 
	go_item('pl_tld_star_segment.route_type');
End If;
end;

			v_message varchar2(1);

			v_message := refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT','C');

	If :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' Then		
			dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),

if :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_route_type     != :pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type 
	AND (:control_block.pk_aircraft_change = 'Y' or :control_block.pk_transition_change = 'Y' )then 

  :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_route_type;
  --:control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident;
  --:control_block.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_AIRCRAFT_TYPE; --65347
  :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type;
  :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :control_block.NEW_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE; --65347
  :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type;
  --:pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  --:pl_tld_STAR_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE; --65347
  :control_block.pk_route_change := 'Y'; -- 5699
  :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N';   -- 5699
  :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N';   -- 5699
  :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';

  :control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident;

  :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :control_block.NEW_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE; --65347
  :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type;
  :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :pl_tld_STAR_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE; --65347
  :control_block.pk_route_change := 'Y';
  :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N';
  :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N';
  :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
end if;

IF :pl_tld_STAR_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE     != :pl_tld_STAR_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE 
				AND (:control_block.pk_transition_change = 'Y' OR :control_block.pk_route_change = 'Y')	then --5699
--	 :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_route_type;
  --:control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident;
  :control_block.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
  :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type;
  :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :control_block.NEW_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
  --:pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type;
  --:pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :pl_tld_STAR_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
  :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N';
  :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N';
  :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'Y';
  :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
ELSIF :pl_tld_STAR_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE     != :pl_tld_STAR_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE THEN
  :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_route_type;
  :control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident;
  :control_block.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
  :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type;
  :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :control_block.NEW_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
  :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type;
  :pl_tld_STAR_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.transition_ident;
  :pl_tld_STAR_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
  :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'Y';
  :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
END IF;
       - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes
       - Execution Hierarchy                         Override
       - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                  No
       - 'Keyboard Help' Text                        
       - Trigger Steps

       * Name                                        ON-ERROR

--65347
IF ERROR_CODE = 40200 THEN
		DECLARE 
			v_message VARCHAR2(1);
		BEGIN
			v_message := refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT','C');
		END;

	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');
	IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' THEN		
			dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
			 name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
	END IF;

END IF;

if ERROR_CODE = 40200 then
		declare 
			v_message varchar2(1);
		begin
			v_message := refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT','C');
		end;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');
	If :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' Then		
			dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
			 name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
	End If;
-- End Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
end if;

  :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_tld_star_segment.old_route_type;
  :control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_star_segment.old_transition_ident;
  :control_block.old_aircraft_type := :pl_tld_star_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
  :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type;
  :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_tld_star_segment.transition_ident;
  :control_block.new_aircraft_type := :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
  :pl_tld_star_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type;

  :pl_tld_star_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
  :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
end if;

If :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code is not null then
	-- Fill the character 1 through 4
	:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.wc1 := substr(rpad(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),1,1);
	:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.wc2 := substr(rpad(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),2,1);
	:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.wc3 := substr(rpad(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),3,1);
	:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.wc4 := substr(rpad(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),4,1);
end if;

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
  if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then  
  	first_record;
  	loop
  		if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
  			:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND 
  			:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
  			:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
  			:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
  			:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
  		end if;
  		exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  		next_record;
  	end loop;	
		:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
		:control_block.pk_aircraft_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_route_change :='N';  --5699
:control_block.pk_transition_change :='N'; --5699
		first_record;
	end if;
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :system.cursor_record != '1' and :pl_tld_star_leg.sequence_num is null then
	previous_record;
else
	if :pl_tld_star_leg.sequence_num is not null and :pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind = 'I' then
	 	validate_leg;
	else
		set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
	end if;
	if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and rtrim(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_IDENT) is not null then
		:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.ref_info := get_ref_info('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG',:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.create_dcr_number);
    if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.ref_info is not null then
      set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
      set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
      set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
      set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);	
		else
			set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
     	set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
     	set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
     	set_item_property('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);	
		end if;	  
	  if :pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag = 'N' then
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
		else
			set_item_property('pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
		end if;	  
	end if;
	-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012 	
IF :System.Record_Status IN ('INSERT','NEW') THEN 
   :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
Else
	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012	
End If;
-- End Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012 
end if;

     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.block_status != 'QUERY' then
	if nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.sequence_num, '-1') != '-1' then	
		if nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','I','O') then
			dsp_msg('Validate indicator can only ''Y'',''S'',''H'',''W'',''N'' or ''I''');
			:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind := null;
		end if;
		if :pl_tld_STAR_leg.validate_ind in ('I','W','N') and :pl_tld_STAR.ref_info is not null then
			:pl_tld_STAR_leg.validate_ind := null;
		end if;
		if :system.record_status in ('NEW','INSERT') then
			:pl_tld_star_leg.file_recno       := 0;
			:pl_tld_star_leg.generated_in_house_flag := :PL_TLD_STAR.GENERATED_IN_HOUSE_FLAG;
			if rtrim(:pl_tld_star_leg.create_dcr_number) is null then
				select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_tld_star_leg.create_dcr_number from dual;
			end if;
		end if;	
		if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE is null and
			nvl(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.CENTER_FIX_IDENT,'NOPT') != 'NOPT' and 
			:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.PATH_AND_TERMINATION != 'RF' then
			:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE := '0';
		end if;
		validate_leg;
		:control_block.validated := 'N';
	end if;
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          KEY-UP
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.PATH_AND_TERMINATION is null and
	:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE is null and :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.create_dcr_number is null then
	clear_record;
	if :system.last_record = 'FALSE' then
		previous_record;
	end if;
else
	previous_record;
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          KEY-DOWN
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE is null and :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.path_and_termination is null then
	null;
else
	:control_block.pre_seq          := :PL_TLD_STAR_leg.sequence_num;
	:control_block.transition_ident := :PL_TLD_STAR_leg.transition_ident;
	:control_block.route_type       := :PL_TLD_STAR_leg.route_type;
	:control_block.aircraft_type       := :PL_TLD_STAR_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
	next_record;
	if :PL_TLD_STAR_leg.sequence_num is null then
		:PL_TLD_STAR_leg.route_type       := :control_block.route_type;
		:PL_TLD_STAR_leg.transition_ident := :control_block.transition_ident;
		:PL_TLD_STAR_leg.aircraft_type := :control_block.aircraft_type; --65347
		:PL_TLD_STAR_leg.sequence_num     := :control_block.pre_seq + 10;
	end if;
	go_item('PL_TLD_STAR_leg.fix_ident');
end if;
     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          KEY-CREREC
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012
IF 	:parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN	-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012  
-- To provide a sequence number for a new record
if get_block_property('pl_tld_STAR_leg',current_record) = 1 and 
	:pl_tld_STAR_leg.sequence_num is null then
	go_block('pl_tld_STAR_segment');
	first_record;
	if :pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type is not null then 
		go_block('pl_tld_STAR_leg');
		:pl_tld_STAR_leg.route_type       := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.route_type;
		:pl_tld_STAR_leg.transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.transition_ident;	
		:pl_tld_STAR_leg.aircraft_type := :pl_tld_STAR_segment.aircraft_type;	 --65347
		:pl_tld_STAR_leg.sequence_num     := 10;
	else
		if message_code = 40102 THEN
			clear_message;
		end if;
		message('Please create the segment first.');
		raise form_trigger_failure;
	end if; 
else
	:control_block.pre_seq          := :pl_tld_STAR_leg.sequence_num;
	:control_block.transition_ident := :pl_tld_STAR_leg.transition_ident;
	:control_block.route_type       := :pl_tld_STAR_leg.route_type;
	:control_block.aircraft_type       := :pl_tld_STAR_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
	create_record;
	:pl_tld_STAR_leg.route_type      := :control_block.route_type;
	:pl_tld_STAR_leg.transition_ident:= :control_block.transition_ident;
	:pl_tld_STAR_leg.aircraft_type:= :control_block.aircraft_type; --65347
	:pl_tld_STAR_leg.sequence_num := '-1';
	next_record;
	if :control_block.route_type      != :pl_tld_STAR_leg.route_type or
		:control_block.transition_ident != :pl_tld_STAR_leg.transition_ident or
		:control_block.aircraft_type != :pl_tld_STAR_leg.aircraft_type or --65347
		:pl_tld_STAR_leg.sequence_num is null then
 		Previous_Record;
 		:pl_tld_STAR_leg.sequence_num := :control_block.pre_seq + 10;
 	else
		:control_block.next_seq      := :pl_tld_STAR_leg.sequence_num;
		Previous_Record;
		:pl_tld_STAR_leg.sequence_num := floor((:control_block.pre_seq +	:control_block.next_seq)/2);
	end if;
end if;
go_item('pl_tld_STAR_leg.fix_ident');
END IF; -- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012

		declare 
			v_message varchar2(1);
		begin
			v_message := refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG','C');
		end;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');
	If :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' Then		
			dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
			 name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
	End If;
-- End Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
end if;

--Begin Fix SCR 6984.01--Madhu--01-SEP-2016
DECLARE
	ls_ICAO				PL_TLD_AIRPORT.AIRPORT_ICAO%TYPE;
	ls_Sec				PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE%TYPE;
	ls_Sub_Sec		PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE%TYPE;
	lb_Dummy			BOOLEAN;
BEGIN
IF :PARAMETER.FIX_LOV = 'N' THEN -- Fix scr 7218 Venkat M 19-OCT-2017
	fix_value_prc(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_IDENT,:PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT,
								:PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT,:PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO,
								Name_IN('global.data_supplier'),:PL_TLD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE,
								:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE,:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE,
								:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE);
END IF;							
:PARAMETER.FIX_LOV := 'N'; -- Fix scr 7218 Venkat M 19-OCT-2017
EXCEPTION
	WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
		:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE := '';
	WHEN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN
	  :PARAMETER.FIX_ICAO := :PL_TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO;  --scr 7218
	  lb_Dummy :=Show_LOV('FIX_LOV');
	WHEN OTHERS THEN
		NULL;
END;
--End Fix SCR 6984.01--Madhu--01-SEP-2016

	lov_ret	BOOLEAN;

	IF :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_IDENT IS NOT NULL THEN
		--lov_ret :=Show_LOV('FIX_STAR2');
		:PARAMETER.FIX_ICAO := NULL;  --scr 7218

		IF lov_ret = TRUE THEN
			 :PARAMETER.FIX_LOV := 'Y';
		ELSE
			 :PARAMETER.FIX_LOV := 'N';
		END IF;			
	END IF;	
END IF;

--Begin fix SCR 7218 -- Venkat M -19-OCT-0217
DECLARE
	lov_ret	BOOLEAN;
	ln_rec_cnt NUMBER;
BEGIN	
IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN		
	IF :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_IDENT IS NOT NULL THEN
		:PARAMETER.FIX_ICAO := NULL;
		lov_ret :=Show_LOV('FIX_LOV');
		IF lov_ret = TRUE THEN
			 :PARAMETER.FIX_LOV := 'Y';
		ELSE
			 :PARAMETER.FIX_LOV := 'N';
		END IF;			
	END IF;
END IF;	
END;	
--End fix SCR 7218 -- Venkat M -19-OCT-0217

if ERROR_CODE = 40200 then
		declare 
			v_message varchar2(1);
		begin
			v_message := refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG','C');
		end;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');
	If :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' Then		
			dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
			 name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
	End If;
-- End Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
end if;

--Begin Fix SCR 6626--Madhu --28-Jan-2016
Mag_Course_Prc(:PL_TLD_STAR_Leg.Magnetic_Course);
IF LENGTH(:PL_TLD_STAR_Leg.Magnetic_Course) > 4 THEN
	dsp_msg('Magnetic Course should not exceed 4 characters');
	RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
END IF;
--End Fix SCR 6626--Madhu --28-Jan-2016

     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
  recstat     VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status;   
  startitm    VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item;   
  rel_id      Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
  IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN   
    RETURN;
  END IF;
  --
  -- Begin STD_STAR_SEGMENT detail program section
  --
  IF ( (:STD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:STD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:STD_STAR.STAR_IDENT is not null) or (:STD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) ) THEN   
    rel_id := Find_Relation('STD_STAR.STD_STAR_STD_STAR_SEGMENT');   
    Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'STD_STAR_SEGMENT');   
  END IF;
  --
  -- End STD_STAR_SEGMENT detail program section
  --
  --
  -- Begin STD_STAR_LEG detail program section
  --
  IF ( (:STD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:STD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:STD_STAR.STAR_IDENT is not null) or (:STD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) ) THEN   
    rel_id := Find_Relation('STD_STAR.STD_STAR_STD_STAR_LEG');   
    Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'STD_STAR_LEG');   
  END IF;
  --
  -- End STD_STAR_LEG detail program section
  --

  IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN     
     Go_Item(startitm);     
     Check_Package_Failure;     
  END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text

       - Trigger Style                               PL/SQL
       * Trigger Text                                

--Begin Fix SCR 6985.01--Ashish N--07-Nov-2016
GO_ITEM('std_star_leg.transition_ident');
first_record;
LOOP
	IF :std_star_segment.transition_ident = :std_star_leg.transition_ident THEN
		next_item;
		EXIT;
	ELSE 
		next_record;
	END IF;
	EXIT WHEN :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
END LOOP;
--END Fix SCR 6985.01--Ashish N--07-Nov-2016
       - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes
       - Execution Hierarchy                         Override
       - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                  No
       - 'Keyboard Help' Text                        
       - Trigger Steps

       * Name                                        WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK
       - Subclass Information                        
       - Comments                                    
       - Trigger Style                               PL/SQL
       * Trigger Text                                

--Begin Fix SCR 6985.01--Ashish N--20-OCT-2016
GO_ITEM('std_star_leg.transition_ident');
first_record;
LOOP
	IF :std_star_segment.transition_ident = :std_star_leg.transition_ident THEN
		next_item;
		EXIT;
	ELSE 
		next_record;
	END IF;
	EXIT WHEN :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
END LOOP;
--END Fix SCR 6985.01--Ashish N--20-OCT-2016

If :STD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code is not null then
	-- Fill the character 1 through 4
	:STD_STAR_LEG.wc1 := substr(rpad(:STD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),1,1);
	:STD_STAR_LEG.wc2 := substr(rpad(:STD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),2,1);
	:STD_STAR_LEG.wc3 := substr(rpad(:STD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),3,1);
	:STD_STAR_LEG.wc4 := substr(rpad(:STD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),4,1);
end if;

     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes

     * Name                                          ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
  recstat     VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status;   
  startitm    VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item;   
  rel_id      Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
  IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN   
    RETURN;
  END IF;
  --
  -- Begin TLD_STAR_SEGMENT detail program section
  --
  IF ( (:TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:TLD_STAR.STAR_IDENT is not null) or (:TLD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) or (:TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT is not null) ) THEN   
    rel_id := Find_Relation('TLD_STAR.TLD_STAR_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT');   
    Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'TLD_STAR_SEGMENT');   
  END IF;
  --
  -- End TLD_STAR_SEGMENT detail program section
  --
  --
  -- Begin TLD_STAR_LEG detail program section
  --
  IF ( (:TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:TLD_STAR.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:TLD_STAR.STAR_IDENT is not null) or (:TLD_STAR.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) or (:TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT is not null) ) THEN   
    rel_id := Find_Relation('TLD_STAR.TLD_STAR_TLD_STAR_LEG');   
    Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'TLD_STAR_LEG');   
  END IF;
  --
  -- End TLD_STAR_LEG detail program section
  --

  IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN     
     Go_Item(startitm);     
     Check_Package_Failure;     
  END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override

       ----------
       * Name                                        WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK
       - Subclass Information                        
       - Comments                                    
       - Trigger Style                               PL/SQL
       * Trigger Text                                

--Begin Fix SCR 6985.01--Ashish N--20-OCT-2016
GO_ITEM('tld_star_leg.transition_ident');
first_record;
LOOP
	IF :tld_star_segment.transition_ident = :tld_star_leg.transition_ident THEN
		next_item;
		EXIT;
	ELSE 
		next_record;
	END IF;
	EXIT WHEN :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
END LOOP;
--END Fix SCR 6985.01--Ashish N--20-OCT-2016

	-- Fill the character 1 through 4
	:TLD_STAR_LEG.wc1 := substr(rpad(:TLD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),1,1);
	:TLD_STAR_LEG.wc2 := substr(rpad(:TLD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),2,1);
	:TLD_STAR_LEG.wc3 := substr(rpad(:TLD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),3,1);
	:TLD_STAR_LEG.wc4 := substr(rpad(:TLD_STAR_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),4,1);

go_item('TLD_STAR_LEG.SEQUENCE_NUM');
       - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes
       - Execution Hierarchy                         Override
       - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                  No
       - 'Keyboard Help' Text                        
       - Trigger Steps                               
       ----------

go_item('TLD_STAR_LEG.ATC_IND');
       - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes

DECLARE 
   ls_Airport_Ident                    Pl_Tld_Star.Airport_Ident%TYPE;
   ls_Airport_Icao                     Pl_Tld_Star.Airport_Icao%TYPE;
   ls_Data_Supplier                    Pl_Tld_Star.Data_Supplier%TYPE;
   ln_Processing_Cycle                 Pl_Tld_Star.Processing_Cycle%TYPE;
   ls_Customer_Ident                   Pl_Tld_Star.Customer_Ident%TYPE;
   ls_Plotting_Function_Command        VARCHAR2(600);
   ls_Plotting_Function_Dir            VARCHAR2(600);   
   ls_Form_Name                        VARCHAR2(100);
   ls_Table_Name                       VARCHAR2(100);
   ls_Query                            VARCHAR2(100);
   ls_Call_Plotting_Function           PLS_INTEGER := 1; 
   ls_Call_Plotting_Function1          PLS_INTEGER;
   ln_Record_Count                     NUMBER;
   ls_Form_Id                          FORMMODULE;
   MY_PROCESS_ID  WEBUTIL_HOST.PROCESS_ID;
	 ls_Plot_URL VARCHAR2(1024);--Fix SCR 6088 - Madhu --03-Oct-2013   
BEGIN
   ls_Form_Id                              := FIND_FORM( lower('AIRPORT_STAR'));
   BEGIN
       ls_Plotting_Function_Dir                := PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG.GetInstallationDir;
       Plot_Global_Pkg.ln_Plot_Process_Counter := NVL(PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG.ltab_Process_ID.COUNT, 0) + 1;
       -- FORMS11g PITSS       ln_Record_Count                         := PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG.Get_Process_Count;
   EXCEPTION
        WHEN OTHERS THEN
           ls_Plotting_Function_Dir := 'C:\Program Files\Honeywell Inc., Aviation Services\CorePTDU Tool\';
           ln_Record_Count          := 1;
   END;  
   
   IF :parameter.record_type = 'S'     AND :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
      ls_Table_Name        := 'PL_STD_STAR';
      ln_Processing_Cycle  := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DATABASE_VALUE);
   
   ELSIF :parameter.record_type = 'T'  AND :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
      ls_Table_Name        := 'PL_TLD_STAR';
      ln_Processing_Cycle  := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DATABASE_VALUE);
      ls_Customer_Ident    := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'  ,DATABASE_VALUE);
   
   ELSIF :parameter.record_type = 'S'  AND :parameter.library_access = 'MASTER'      THEN
      ls_Table_Name         := 'STD_STAR';
   
   ELSIF :parameter.record_type = 'T'  AND :parameter.library_access = 'MASTER'      THEN
      ls_Table_Name         := 'TLD_STAR';
      ls_Customer_Ident    := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT',DATABASE_VALUE);
   END IF;
   
   ls_Form_Name        := ls_Table_Name;
   ls_Airport_Ident    := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.AIRPORT_IDENT',DATABASE_VALUE);
   ls_Airport_Icao     := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.AIRPORT_ICAO' ,DATABASE_VALUE);
   ls_Data_Supplier    := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.DATA_SUPPLIER',DATABASE_VALUE);
   
   ls_Query            :=        ls_Data_Supplier
                          ||','||ls_Airport_Icao
                          ||','||ls_Airport_Ident
                          ||','||ln_Processing_Cycle
                          ||','||ls_Customer_Ident;

   IF ln_Record_Count >= 10 THEN
      dsp_msg('Attn !!!! Maximum of 10 Plot Windows are already opened, please close atleast one Plot Window to open new Plot Window');
   ELSE  
      
      IF ls_Airport_Ident      IS NOT NULL AND
         ls_Airport_Icao       IS NOT NULL AND
         ls_Data_Supplier      IS NOT NULL THEN
         
         ls_Table_Name := ls_Table_Name||'_LEG';
        
	      IF ls_Query IS NOT NULL THEN
	         Fetch_Plotting_Data.Get_Record_Count(ls_Query,ls_Table_Name,ln_Record_Count);
	      ELSE
	          ln_Record_Count := 0; 
	      END IF;   
         
         IF ln_Record_Count      > 0 THEN            
--Begin SCR 6088 -Madhu --03-Oct-2013            
            ls_Plot_URL:=:GLOBAL.ls_Plot_URL||'?username='||:global.user_name
      										||'&password='||:global.password
      										||'&connectstr='||:global.connect_string
      										||'&datatype='||ls_Table_Name
      										||'&query='||ls_Query;
            
        IF :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.gearth = 'Y' THEN
      	  WEB.SHOW_DOCUMENT(ls_Plot_URL,'_blank'); 
      	--WEB.SHOW_DOCUMENT ('javascript:window.open("'||ls_Plot_URL||'","","location=no,fullscreen=yes,toolbar=no,menubar=no,status=no,top=0,left=0,resizable=yes,height=600,width=800");self.close()','_blank');   
     -- location=no,toolbar=no,menubar=no,status=no,top=0,left=0,resizable=yes,fullscreen=yes,titlebar=no,
      	ELSE
--End SCR 6088 -Madhu --03-Oct-2013      			
            ls_Plotting_Function_Command  := ls_Plotting_Function_Dir||'CorePTDU.exe'
                                             ||' -user:'      ||:global.user_name
                                             ||' -password:'  ||:global.password
                                             ||' -connectstr:'||:global.connect_string
                                             ||' -datatype:'  ||ls_Table_Name
                                             ||' -query:'     ||ls_Query;    
             --message(ls_Plotting_Function_Command); 
            --ls_Call_Plotting_Function1     := Plot_
         -- FORMS 11g PITSS
         --message(ls_Plotting_Function_Command);synchronize;pause;
         MY_PROCESS_ID     := WEBUTIL_HOST.NonBlocking(ls_Plotting_Function_Command);
--Global_Pkg.WinExec(ls_Plotting_Function_Command, ls_Call_Plotting_Function);   
           
            BEGIN
               Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(Plot_Global_Pkg.ln_Plot_Process_Counter).ln_Process_ID 
                             := TO_NUMBER (MY_PROCESS_ID.handle); 
               Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(Plot_Global_Pkg.ln_Plot_Process_Counter).ls_DataType   
                           := TO_CHAR(ls_Form_Id.ID);
            EXCEPTION
               WHEN OTHERS THEN
                 NULL;
            END;              
           END IF;--Fix SCR 6088 --Madhu
            GO_BLOCK(ls_Form_Name);    
         ELSE
            dsp_msg('Invalid/No Data to plot');
         END IF;   
         
      ELSE
         dsp_msg('Invalid/No Data to plot');           
      END IF;    
      
   END IF;
   
END;

go_item('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS');
       - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes
       - Execution Hierarchy                         Override

       - Trigger Style                               PL/SQL
       - Trigger Text                                

declare
	total_rows   number;
	V_BUTTON     NUMBER(1);
begin
	if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
		dsp_msg('There is changes in the form, please do commit first.');
	else	
		total_rows := get_group_row_count(find_group('Refresh_Records_Group'));
		v_button := display_alert.more_buttons('S','Refresh Record',
								'You have modified or inserted or deleted '||total_rows||' record(s). '||chr(10)||
						  	'Do you want to refresh the Master Library now?'||chr(10)||chr(10),
						    'Refresh', 'Cancel');
		if v_button = 1 then
			refresh_master_library.refresh_records(total_rows);
		else
			null;
		end if;
	end if;	
end;
       - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes

     - Source Module

       ----------

   - Program Unit Text                               

FUNCTION Set_validate_ind
	(p_o_ind varchar2, p_n_ind varchar2) return varchar2 IS
BEGIN
  if p_o_ind = 'N' then
  	return substr(p_n_ind,1,1)||'N----';
  elsif p_o_ind = 'W' then
  	return substr(p_n_ind,1,2)||'W---';
  elsif p_o_ind = 'H' then
  	return substr(p_n_ind,1,3)||'H--';
  elsif p_o_ind = 'S' then
  	return substr(p_n_ind,1,4)||'S-';
  elsif p_o_ind = 'Y' then
  	return substr(p_n_ind,1,5)||'Y';		
  --elsif p_o_ind = 'I' then
  --	return 'I-----';
  else
  	return p_n_ind;
  end if;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Function
   ----------
   * Name                                            UPDATE_PROC_TYPE_AND_ALTITUDE
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 UPDATE_PROC_TYPE_AND_ALTITUDE
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE Update_Proc_Type_And_Altitude (p_master in varchar2,p_terminal in varchar2) is
	 v_cust varchar2(3) := null;
	 v_max_altitude number(5);
	 v_type         varchar2(1);
	 v_terminal     varchar2(8);
BEGIN
  			if :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
					v_cust := name_in(p_master||'.customer_ident');
				end if;
				if p_terminal = 'A' then
					v_terminal := 'airport';
				else
					v_terminal := 'heliport';
				end if;
				go_block(p_master||'_SEGMENT');
				first_record;
				if name_in(p_master||'_segment.route_type') is not null then
					loop
						v_max_altitude := check_procedures.set_max_trans_altitude
																(:parameter.record_type,substr(p_master,8),p_terminal,
																	name_in(p_master||'.'||v_terminal||'_ident'),
																	name_in(p_master||'.'||v_terminal||'_icao'),
																	name_in(p_master||'.'||substr(p_master,8)||'_ident'),
																	name_in(p_master||'_segment.route_type'),
																	name_in(p_master||'_segment.transition_ident'),
																	v_cust,
																	name_in(p_master||'_segment.create_dcr_number'),
																	:global.data_supplier,
																	name_in(p_master||'.processing_cycle'),
																	name_in(p_master||'_segment.aircraft_type')); --65347
						if nvl(v_max_altitude,-1) != nvl(name_in(p_master||'_segment.max_trans_altitude'),-1) then
							copy(v_max_altitude,:system.cursor_block||'.max_trans_altitude');
						end if;
						if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
  						first_record;
  						exit;
  					else
    	  			next_record;
  					end if;
  				end loop;
				end if;
	      v_type := check_procedures.set_procedure_type
       													(:parameter.record_type,substr(p_master,8),p_terminal,
																	name_in(p_master||'.'||v_terminal||'_ident'),
																	name_in(p_master||'.'||v_terminal||'_icao'),
																	name_in(p_master||'.'||substr(p_master,8)||'_ident'),
																	v_cust,
																	name_in(p_master||'_segment.create_dcr_number'),
																	:global.data_supplier,
																	name_in(p_master||'.processing_cycle'));			 
        if v_type != nvl(name_in(p_master||'.'||substr(p_master,8)||'_type'),'A') then
        	copy(v_type,p_master||'.'||substr(p_master,8)||'_type');
        end if;   
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            POPULATE_ITEMS
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 POPULATE_ITEMS
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE POPULATE_ITEMS(mname IN varchar2) IS
	scr_description	varchar2(100);
	scr_part_number	varchar2(100);
BEGIN	
	get_module_information(mname, scr_description, scr_part_number);
--Begin Fix SCR 101 -- Madhu -- 09-Apr-2012
	IF Name_In('parameter.work_type') = 'VIEW' THEN
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DESC := substr(scr_description,1,instr(scr_description,'/')-1)||substr(scr_description,instr(scr_description,'/')+7);
	ELSE
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DESC := scr_description;
	END IF;
--End Fix SCR 101 -- Madhu -- 09-Apr-2012
	:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DATE_TIME := to_char(sysdate,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS');
	:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_NAME := mname;
	:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_PART_NUMBER := scr_part_number;
	BEGIN
		SELECT data_supplier_name
		INTO   :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_SOURCE
		FROM   data_supplier
		WHERE  data_supplier = nvl(:GLOBAL.DATA_SUPPLIER,'T');
	Exception
		When no_data_found then
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_SOURCE := :GLOBAL.DATA_SUPPLIER;
	End;	
   SELECT DECODE(nvl(:parameter.record_type,'S'),'S','STANDARD','T','TAILORED','UNKNOWN')||', '||:parameter.library_access||', '||
				  DECODE(nvl(:parameter.work_type,'VIEW'),'VIEW','Query Only','Data Entry')
   INTO   :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_RECORD_TYPE
   FROM   dual;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            INITIALIZE_FORM
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 INITIALIZE_FORM
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE INITIALIZE_FORM IS
	fname	varchar2(100) := get_application_property(CURRENT_FORM_NAME);
	wn_id window := Find_Window('BASE_WINDOW');
	v_name  varchar2(50) := get_window_property(wn_id, TITLE);
	v_block varchar2(30) := Get_Form_Property(fname,FIRST_NAVIGATION_BLOCK);
	v_err varchar2(300);
BEGIN
	 
  default_value('J','global.data_supplier');
  default_value('I','global.lib_refreshed');
  default_value('99999','global.dcr_number');
  default_value('200406','global.processing_cycle');
  default_value('N','global.from_error_summary');
  default_value('200406','global.recent_cycle');
  default_value('MAXIMIZE','global.Status_Window'); 
  default_value(null,'global.customer_ident');
  default_value(null,'global.allroles');
  default_value('N','global.is_admin');
  default_value('N','global.from_leg_search');
  /*********************************************************************/
  /*********************************************************************/
  /* Global Variables declared Plotting Function- updated as part of scr 2303.00 */
  -- Declaring Common variables
  default_value('cpt','global.user_name');
  default_value('cpt','global.password');
  default_value('cpt','global.connect_string');
  default_value('airport','global.data_type');
  default_value('airport','global.table_name');
  default_value('ml','global.schema_type');
  default_value('blank','global.last_query');  
  :global.user_name := Get_Application_Property(USERNAME);
  :global.password := Get_Application_Property(PASSWORD);
  :global.connect_string := Get_Application_Property(CONNECT_STRING);  
  /*********************************************************************/
  /*********************************************************************/
  
  :global.Status_Window := get_window_property('BASE_WINDOW',window_state);
  if name_in('global.Status_Window') = 'MAXIMIZE' then
		set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_state, MAXIMIZE);
	else
		set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_state, NORMAL);
	end if;
  --set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_SIZE, 760, 440);
  
  -- activate all roles
  v_err := set_role(:global.allroles);
  if v_err != 'PASSED' then
		-- The roles cannot be activated
		display_alert.one_button('S','Fatal Error',
		'The roles cannot be activated.  Contact the COREPT Administrator.');
		exit_form;
  else
--  Continue
  if :global.processing_cycle is null then
    begin
      select max(processing_cycle) 
      into   :global.processing_cycle
      from pl_std_airport;
    exception
  	  when no_data_found then
  	   :global.processing_cycle := null;
    end;
  end if;
  :global.user_name := Get_Application_Property(USERNAME);
  :global.password := Get_Application_Property(PASSWORD);
  :global.connect_string := Get_Application_Property(CONNECT_STRING);


	if substr(v_block,1,3) in ('PL_','STD','TLD') then
		if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
			v_name := 'STD '||v_name;
		elsif :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
			v_name := 'TLD '||v_name;
		end if;
		if :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
			v_name := 'PL '||v_name;
		else
			v_name := 'ML '||v_name;
		end if;
	end if;	
	set_window_property(wn_id, TITLE, v_name);
	
/*
	IF :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.processing_cycle;
	END IF;
*/
	
	IF :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN																	   -- MOD
		activate_role;
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- MOD
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',WIDTH, 60);								 -- MOD
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.processing_cycle;								   -- MOD
	elsif :global.new_processing_cycle != 111111 then																	   -- MOD
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- MOD
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',WIDTH, 80);                -- MOD
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.old_processing_cycle||' - '||:global.new_processing_cycle; -- MOD
	end if;																																						   -- MOD

	populate_items(fname);
	unset_query_menu_items;
	
	if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
		-- Create the Refresh Records Group
		declare
			group_id       recordgroup;
			col1_id        groupcolumn;
			col2_id        groupcolumn;
			col3_id        groupcolumn;
			col4_id        groupcolumn;
		begin		
			group_id := create_group('Refresh_Records_Group');
			col1_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'dcr_number',number_column);
			col2_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'table_name',char_column,30);
			col3_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'valida_ind',char_column,1);
			col4_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'proc_cycle',number_column);
		end;
	end if;
	end if;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            DSP_ERROR
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 DSP_ERROR
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE DSP_ERROR(ERR_MSG IN VARCHAR2) IS
  alert_id    alert;
  choice      number(3);
BEGIN
  set_alert_property('ERROR_MESSAGE', alert_message_text,ERR_MSG); 
  alert_id := find_alert ('ERROR_MESSAGE');
  choice := show_alert(alert_id);
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
  IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
    RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
  END IF;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
  oldmsg VARCHAR2(2);  -- Old Message Level Setting
  reldef VARCHAR2(5);  -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
  --
  -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
  --
  reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
  oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
  --
  -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
  --
  IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
    Go_Block(detail);
    Check_Package_Failure;
    :System.Message_Level := '10';
    Execute_Query;
    :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
  ELSE
    --
    -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
    --
    Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
  END IF;

EXCEPTION
    WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
      :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
      RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
  mastblk  VARCHAR2(30);  -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
  coordop  VARCHAR2(30);  -- Operation Causing the Coord
  trigblk  VARCHAR2(30);  -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
  startitm VARCHAR2(61);  -- Item in which cursor started
  frmstat  VARCHAR2(15);  -- Form Status
  curblk   VARCHAR2(30);  -- Current Block
  currel   VARCHAR2(30);  -- Current Relation
  curdtl   VARCHAR2(30);  -- Current Detail Block

  FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
  RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
    curblk VARCHAR2(30);  -- Current Block
    currel VARCHAR2(30);  -- Current Relation
    retblk VARCHAR2(30);  -- Return Block
  BEGIN
    --
    -- Initialize Local Vars
    --
    curblk := Master;
    currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk,  FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
    --
    -- While there exists another relation for this block
    --
    WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
      --
      -- Get the name of the detail block
      --
      curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
      --
      -- If this block has changes, return its name
      --
      IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
        RETURN curblk;
      ELSE
        --
        -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
        --
        retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
        --
        -- If some block below is changed, return its name
        --
        IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
          RETURN retblk;
        ELSE
          --
          -- Constarer the next relation
          --
          currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
        END IF;
      END IF;
    END LOOP;

    --
    -- No changed blocks were found
    --
    RETURN NULL;
  END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
  --
  -- Init Local Vars
  --
  mastblk  := :System.Master_Block;
  coordop  := :System.Coordination_Operation;
  trigblk  := :System.Trigger_Block;
  startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
  frmstat  := :System.Form_Status;

  --
  -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
  -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
  --
  IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
    --
    -- If we're processing the driving master block...
    --
    IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
      --
      -- If something in the form is changed, find the
      -- first changed block below the master
      --
      IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
        curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
        --
        -- If we find a changed block below, go there
        -- and Ask to commit the changes.
        --
        IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
          Go_Block(curblk);
          Check_Package_Failure;
          Clear_Block(NO_COMMIT);
          --
          -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
          --
          IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
                   OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
            RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
          END IF;
        END IF;
      END IF;
    END IF;
  END IF;

  --
  -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
  -- any further asking to commit.
  --
  currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
  WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
    curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
    IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW'  THEN
      Go_Block(curdtl);
      Check_Package_Failure;
      Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
      IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
        RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
      END IF;
    END IF;
    currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
  END LOOP;

  --
  -- Put cursor back where it started
  --
  IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
    Go_Item(startitm);
    Check_Package_Failure;
  END IF;

EXCEPTION
  WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
    IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
      Go_Item(startitm);
    END IF;
    RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            POPULATE_RECORD
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE populate_record
    (p_record out  sdv_records.cr_airport_procedure,
     p_cycle  out  number,
     p_processing_cycle out  number) IS       
BEGIN
  -- Populate v_record;
  if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
  	p_processing_cycle  										:= nvl(:PL_STD_STAR.processing_cycle,:global.processing_cycle);
  	if :global.recent_cycle >= p_processing_cycle then
  		p_cycle := p_processing_cycle;
  	else
  		p_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;
  	p_record.procedure_type                 := 'E'; -- This is a STAR
    p_record.record_type			              := :parameter.record_type;
    p_record.section                        := 'P'; -- This is an airport
    p_record.airport_icao                   := :pl_std_star.airport_icao;
    p_record.airport_ident                  := :pl_std_star.airport_ident;
    p_record.alt_1                          := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.alt_1,' ');
    p_record.alt_2                          := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.alt_2,' ');
    p_record.alt_description                := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.alt_description,' ');
    p_record.arc_radius                     := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_star_leg.arc_radius*1000),6,'0');
    p_record.atc_ind                        := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.atc_ind,' ');
    p_record.center_fix_icao_code           := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
    p_record.center_fix_ident               := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_ident;
    p_record.center_fix_multiple_code       := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_multiple_code;
    p_record.center_fix_section             := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_section;
    p_record.center_fix_subsection          := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_subsection,' ');
    p_record.cycle_data                     := :pl_std_star_leg.cycle_data;
    p_record.file_recno                     := :pl_std_star_leg.file_recno;
    p_record.fix_icao_code                  := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_icao_code;
    p_record.fix_ident                      := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_ident;
    p_record.fix_section_code               := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_section_code;
    p_record.fix_subsection_code            := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.fix_subsection_code,' ');
    p_record.magnetic_course                := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.magnetic_course,' '),4);
    p_record.path_and_termination           := :pl_std_star_leg.path_and_termination;
    p_record.recomm_navaid_icao_code        := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
    p_record.recomm_navaid_ident            := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
    p_record.recomm_navaid_section          := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
    p_record.recomm_navaid_subsection       := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection,' ');
    p_record.rho                            := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_star_leg.rho*10),4,'0');
    p_record.rnp                            := :pl_std_star_leg.rnp;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009    
    --p_record.rnp2                           := :pl_std_star_leg.rnp2;
    --p_record.rnp3                           := :pl_std_star_leg.rnp3;
-- End Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009    
    p_record.route_distance                 := :pl_std_star_leg.route_distance;
    p_record.route_type                     := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.route_type,' ');
    p_record.sequence_num                   := lpad(:pl_std_star_leg.sequence_num,3,'0');
    p_record.procedure_ident                := :pl_std_star.star_ident;
    p_record.speed_limit                    := lpad(:pl_std_star_leg.speed_limit,3,'0');
    p_record.theta                          := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_star_leg.theta*10),4,'0');
    p_record.trans_altitude                 := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_star_leg.trans_altitude),5,'0');
    p_record.transition_ident               := rpad(:pl_std_star_leg.transition_ident,5,' ');
    p_record.turn_dir_valid                 := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.turn_dir_valid,' ');
    p_record.turn_direction                 := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.turn_direction,' ');
    if :pl_std_star_leg.vertical_angle < 0 then
    	p_record.vertical_angle               := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(:pl_std_star_leg.vertical_angle*100),2),3,'0');
    else
    	p_record.vertical_angle               := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_star_leg.vertical_angle*100),4,'0');
    end if;
    p_record.waypoint_desc_code             := nvl(rpad(:pl_std_star_leg.waypoint_desc_code,4,' '),'    ');
    p_record.area_code                      := :pl_std_star.area_code;
--Begin Fix SCR 6709 --Madhu --15-Mar-2016
 --   p_record.aircraft_type 									:= :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type; --Fix SCR 7426
    p_record.specials_ind 									:= :pl_std_star.specials_ind;
--End Fix SCR 6709 --Madhu --15-Mar-2016    	
		--Imran CMC - SCR 7276
		p_record.speed_limit_desc 									:= :pl_std_star_leg.speed_limit_desc;
		--Imran CMC - SCR 7276
		p_record.aircraft_type 									:= NVL(:pl_std_star_leg.aircraft_type,'');--65347
--	  p_record.Proc_Design_Mag_Var_ind				:= NVL(:pl_std_star_segment.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND,''); -- SCR 06185 - Ashish Niranjan- 30-AUG-2023
		p_record.Proc_Design_Mag_Var						:= rpad(nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR,' '),5); --SCR 06185 - Ashish Niranjan- 30-AUG-2023
  else
  	p_processing_cycle			    						:= nvl(:PL_TLD_STAR.processing_cycle,:global.processing_cycle);
  	/*if :global.recent_cycle >= p_processing_cycle then
  		p_cycle := p_processing_cycle;
  	else
  		p_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;*/ --7607
  		p_cycle := p_processing_cycle; --7607
  	p_record.procedure_type                 := 'E'; -- This is a STAR
    p_record.record_type			              := :parameter.record_type;
    p_record.section                        := 'P'; -- This is an airport
    p_record.airport_icao                   := :pl_tld_star.airport_icao;
    p_record.airport_ident                  := :pl_tld_star.airport_ident;
    p_record.alt_1                          := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.alt_1,' ');
    p_record.alt_2                          := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.alt_2,' ');
    p_record.alt_description                := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.alt_description,' ');
    p_record.arc_radius                     := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_star_leg.arc_radius*1000),6,'0');
    p_record.atc_ind                        := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.atc_ind,' ');
    p_record.center_fix_icao_code           := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
    p_record.center_fix_ident               := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_ident;
    p_record.center_fix_multiple_code       := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_multiple_code;
    p_record.center_fix_section             := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_section;
    p_record.center_fix_subsection          := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_subsection,' ');
    p_record.cycle_data                     := :pl_tld_star_leg.cycle_data;
    p_record.file_recno                     := :pl_tld_star_leg.file_recno;
    p_record.fix_icao_code                  := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_icao_code;
    p_record.fix_ident                      := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_ident;
    p_record.fix_section_code               := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_section_code;
    p_record.fix_subsection_code            := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.fix_subsection_code,' ');
    p_record.magnetic_course                := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.magnetic_course,' '),4);
    p_record.path_and_termination           := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.path_and_termination,' ');
    p_record.recomm_navaid_icao_code        := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
    p_record.recomm_navaid_ident            := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
    p_record.recomm_navaid_section          := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
    p_record.recomm_navaid_subsection       := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection,' ');
    p_record.rho                            := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_star_leg.rho*10),4,'0');
    p_record.rnp                            := :pl_tld_star_leg.rnp;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009    
    --p_record.rnp2                           := :pl_tld_star_leg.rnp2;
    --p_record.rnp3                           := :pl_tld_star_leg.rnp3;
-- End Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009    
    p_record.route_distance                 := :pl_tld_star_leg.route_distance;
    p_record.route_type                     := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.route_type,' ');
    p_record.sequence_num                   := lpad(:pl_tld_star_leg.sequence_num,3,'0');
    p_record.procedure_ident                := :pl_tld_star.star_ident;
    p_record.speed_limit                    := lpad(:pl_tld_star_leg.speed_limit,3,'0');
    p_record.theta                          := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_star_leg.theta*10),4,'0');
    p_record.trans_altitude                 := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_star_leg.trans_altitude),5,'0');
    p_record.transition_ident               := rpad(:pl_tld_star_leg.transition_ident,5,' ');
    p_record.turn_dir_valid                 := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.turn_dir_valid,' ');
    p_record.turn_direction                 := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.turn_direction,' ');
    if :pl_tld_star_leg.vertical_angle < 0 then
    	p_record.vertical_angle               := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(:pl_tld_star_leg.vertical_angle*100),2),3,'0');
    else
    	p_record.vertical_angle               := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_star_leg.vertical_angle*100),4,'0');
    end if;
    p_record.waypoint_desc_code             := nvl(rpad(:pl_tld_star_leg.waypoint_desc_code,4,' '),'    ');
    p_record.area_code                      := :pl_tld_star.customer_ident;
--Begin Fix SCR 6709 --Madhu --15-Mar-2016
   -- p_record.aircraft_type 									:= :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type; --Fix SCR 7426
    p_record.specials_ind 									:= :pl_tld_star.specials_ind;
--End Fix SCR 6709 --Madhu --15-Mar-2016 
		--Imran CMC - SCR 7276
		p_record.speed_limit_desc 									:= :pl_tld_star_leg.speed_limit_desc;
		--Imran CMC - SCR 7276
		p_record.aircraft_type 									:= NVL(:pl_tld_star_leg.aircraft_type,'');--65347
	--	p_record.Proc_Design_Mag_Var_ind				:= NVL(:pl_tld_star_segment.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND,''); --SCR 06185 - Ashish Niranjan- 30-AUG-2023
		p_record.Proc_Design_Mag_Var						:= rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR,' '),5); --SCR 06185 - Ashish Niranjan- 30-AUG-2023
  end if;  
END;


   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            POPULATE_REL_RECORD
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE populate_rel_record 
     (p_record     out   cpt_types.rec_proc_rdv,
      p_table      out   varchar2,
      p_dcr        out   number) IS
BEGIN
  if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
    p_table := 'pl_std_star_leg';
    p_dcr   := :pl_std_star.create_dcr_number;
    p_record.cfixicao         := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
    p_record.cfixid           := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_ident;
    p_record.cfixsec          := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_section;
    p_record.cfixsubsec       := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_subsection;
    p_record.mult_code        := nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE,'0');
    p_record.path_and_term    := :pl_std_star_leg.path_and_termination;
    p_record.fixicao          := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_icao_code;
    p_record.fixid            := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_ident;
    p_record.fixsec           := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_section_code;
    p_record.fixsubsec        := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_subsection_code;
    p_record.recommicao       := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
    p_record.recommid         := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
    p_record.recommsec        := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
    p_record.recommsubsec     := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection;
    p_record.airport_icao     := :pl_std_star_leg.airport_icao;
    p_record.airport_ident    := :pl_std_star_leg.airport_ident;
    p_record.v_procedure_ident:= :pl_std_star.star_IDENT;
    p_record.cust_area_code   := :pl_std_star.area_code;
    p_record.generated_in_house_flag   := 'N';
    p_record.validate_ind     := :pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind;
    p_record.v_rowid          := null;
    p_record.cdcr             := :pl_std_star_leg.create_dcr_number;
    p_record.route_type       := :pl_std_star_leg.route_type;
    p_record.v_procedure_ident := :pl_std_star_leg.star_ident;
    p_record.waypoint_desc_code := :pl_std_star_leg.waypoint_desc_code;
    p_record.Magnetic_Course		:= :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.Magnetic_Course;--Fix SCR 4721.03-Madhu-- 26-Nov-2013
  else
    p_table := 'pl_tld_star_leg';
    p_dcr   := :pl_tld_star.create_dcr_number;
    p_record.cfixicao         := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
    p_record.cfixid           := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_ident;
    p_record.cfixsec          := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_section;
    p_record.cfixsubsec       := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_subsection;
    p_record.mult_code        := nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE,'0');
    p_record.path_and_term    := :pl_tld_star_leg.path_and_termination;
    p_record.fixicao          := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_icao_code;
    p_record.fixid            := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_ident;
    p_record.fixsec           := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_section_code;
    p_record.fixsubsec        := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_subsection_code;
    p_record.recommicao       := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
    p_record.recommid         := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
    p_record.recommsec        := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
    p_record.recommsubsec     := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection;
    p_record.airport_icao     := :pl_tld_star_leg.airport_icao;
    p_record.airport_ident    := :pl_tld_star_leg.airport_ident;
    p_record.v_procedure_ident:= :pl_tld_star.star_IDENT;
    p_record.cust_area_code   := :pl_tld_star.customer_ident;
    p_record.generated_in_house_flag   := :pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag;
    p_record.validate_ind     := :pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind;
    p_record.v_rowid          := null;
    p_record.cdcr             := :pl_tld_star_leg.create_dcr_number;
    p_record.route_type       := :pl_tld_star_leg.route_type;
    p_record.v_procedure_ident := :pl_tld_star_leg.star_ident;
    p_record.waypoint_desc_code := :pl_tld_star_leg.waypoint_desc_code;
    p_record.Magnetic_Course		:= :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.Magnetic_Course;--Fix SCR 4721.03-Madhu-- 26-Nov-2013
  end if;     
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            VALIDATE_LEG
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE validate_leg(p_ignore_ref varchar2 := 'Y') IS
  v_record  sdv_records.cr_airport_procedure;       
	v_err_ind	number := 0;
	v_err_list cpt_types.errlist_type;
	v_err			varchar2(200) := null;
	v_rerr    varchar2(8);--Fix SCR 4721.03--Madhu-- 9-JUL-2013
  v_all_err varchar2(32000) := null; -- Fix Eswar KC - SCR 5021 - Changed varchar2 size from 4000 to 32000
	v_nerr    number := 0;
	v_valid   varchar2(1);
	v_rel_rec cpt_types.rec_proc_rdv;
	v_exist   number;
	v_cycle   number(6);
	v_processing_cycle number(6);
	v_table   varchar2(30);
	v_dcr     number;
	v_leg_ind varchar2(1) := 'Y';
BEGIN
	Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'BUSY');
	-- Check structural
  populate_record(v_record, v_cycle,v_processing_cycle);
  RECSV2.VAIRPORT_PROCEDURE(:global.data_supplier, v_cycle, v_record,v_err_list,v_err_ind);
  -- Check the result
  IF v_err_ind != 0 THEN
  	for i in 1..v_err_list.count loop
   	  if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', v_err_list(i)) then
   	    v_all_err := v_all_err||' * '||to_char(v_err_list(i))||' - '||get_err_text(v_err_list(i));
   	  	v_leg_ind := 'I';
   	  else
   	  	if v_leg_ind != 'I' then
   	  		v_leg_ind := 'O';
   	  	end if;	
    	end if;
    end loop;
  ELSE
    null;
  END IF;
  -- Check relational 
  populate_rel_record(v_rel_rec,v_table,v_dcr);  
  recrv2.vairport_procedure(v_table,:global.data_supplier,v_cycle,:parameter.record_type,
                            v_rel_rec,v_dcr,v_rerr,v_valid,p_ignore_ref,null,'DU');--7607 Added null and DU
  --if substr(v_rerr,2,4) != 'YYYY' then --Commented for SCR 4721.03
 	IF v_rerr LIKE '%N%' THEN --Fix SCR 4721.03 -Madhu -- 26-Nov-2013
  	if substr(v_rerr,2,1) = 'N' then
        v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 475 - '||get_err_text(475);
    end if;  
  	if substr(v_rerr,3,1) = 'N' then
        v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 476 - '||get_err_text(476);
    end if;  
  	if substr(v_rerr,4,1) = 'N' then
        v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 477 - '||get_err_text(477);
  	end if;  
  	if substr(v_rerr,5,1) = 'N' then
        v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 467 - '||get_err_text(467);
    end if;  
--Begin Fix SCR 4721.03 -Madhu -- 26-Nov-2013
   	IF SUBSTR(v_rerr,8,1) = 'N' THEN
        v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 1167 - '||get_err_text(1167);
    END IF;
--End Fix SCR 4721.03 -Madhu -- 26-Nov-2013
  end if;
  if p_ignore_ref = 'N' then
  	set_update_dcr(upper(:system.cursor_block),v_record);
  end if;
  if v_all_err is not null then
  	:control_block.seq_errors := '* Route Type '''||v_record.route_type||
  	''', Transition '''||v_record.transition_ident||''': '||chr(10)||'Seq#'||v_record.sequence_num||' ->'||v_all_err||chr(10);
  	if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 	    set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 	    set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
      :control_block.std_leg_errors  := v_all_err;
      if nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind,'N') != 'I' then
      	:pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind := 'I';
      end if;
      if :PL_STD_STAR.ref_info is null then
      	if nvl(:pl_std_star.validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') then
 	    		:pl_std_star.validate_ind := 'I';
 	    		:pl_std_star.old_validate_ind := 'I';
 	    		:control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1;
 	    	end if;	
      else
      	:control_block.std_validation_errors := :PL_STD_STAR.ref_info;
	    	set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
	    	set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);  		  		
 	    end if;
 	  else
 	    set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 	    set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
      :control_block.tld_leg_errors  := v_all_err;
      if nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind,'N') != 'I' then
