      	:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind := 'I';
      end if;
      if :PL_TLD_STAR.ref_info is null then
   	    if nvl(:pl_tld_star.validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') then
 	  	  	:pl_tld_star.validate_ind := 'I';
 	    		:pl_tld_star.old_validate_ind := 'I';
 	    		:control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1;
 	    	end if;
 	    else
	      :control_block.tld_validation_errors := :PL_TLD_STAR.ref_info;
	    	set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
	    	set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 	 	
 	    end if;
    end if;
 	else
 	  :control_block.seq_errors := null;
 	  if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 	  	if nvl(:pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind,'I') = 'I' then
 	  		:pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind := v_leg_ind;
 	  	else
 	  		if (:pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind = 'Y' and v_leg_ind = 'O') or
 	  			 (:pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind = 'O' and v_leg_ind = 'Y') then
 	  			:pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind := v_leg_ind;
 	  		end if;	
 	  	end if; 	  	
 	  	set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 	  elsif :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
  	  if nvl(:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind,'I') = 'I' then
  	  	:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind := v_leg_ind;
  	  else
  	  	if (:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind = 'Y' and v_leg_ind = 'O') or
  	  		(:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind = 'O' and v_leg_ind = 'Y') then
 	  			:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind := v_leg_ind;
 	  		end if;	
  	  end if;
  	  set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
  	end if; 				
 	end if;
 	Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT'); 	
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            VALIDATE_PROCEDURE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE validate_procedure(p_ignore_ref varchar2 := 'Y') IS
  v_all_err varchar2(32000) := null; -- Fix Eswar KC - SCR 5021 - Changed varchar2 size from 8000 to 32000	
	v_proc_err varchar2(32000) := null;--Increased the length from 8000 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Neelima, 07-Mar-2011
	cursor_block  varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block;
	cursor_record varchar2(4) := :system.cursor_record;
	cursor_item varchar2(100) := :system.cursor_item;
	v_detail_ind        varchar2(6) := '------';
	v_master_ind varchar2(6) := '------';	
	v_button     number(1);
	v_segs         cpt_types.table_vchar30;
	v_seg_exist    varchar2(1) := 'N';
	v_index  number := 0;
	v_cycle  number(7);
  ls_valid_ind	VARCHAR2(1000);--Fix SCR 7149 --Madhu--18-Oct-2017
BEGIN
	Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'BUSY');
  if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
		:CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := null;
	else
		:CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := null;
	end if;	
  -- Validate keys
	validate_keys(p_ignore_ref);
	v_all_err := :control_block.key_errors;
  if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
  	refresh_master_library.delete_from_ref_table
  	(name_in(substr(:system.cursor_block,1,11)||'.create_dcr_number'));
	end if;
--Begin Fix -- SCR 3403.03 --Madhu --14-May-2013
  If :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'QUERY'  THEN
    v_all_err:= validate_rwy_transition||v_all_err; 
  END IF;
--End Fix -- SCR 3403.03 --Madhu --14-May-2013 
  if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
    set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
    set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
    :control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS := 'W O R K I N G !  Please wait.';  	  
  	v_master_ind := set_validate_ind(:pl_std_star.validate_ind,v_master_ind);
  	-- Get Segment
  	if cursor_block not like '%SEGMENT' then
  		go_block('pl_std_star_segment');
  		if error_CODE in (40209,50016) then -- illegal format
 				Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
 				raise form_trigger_failure;
			end if;
  	end if;
  	first_record;
  	if :pl_std_star_segment.route_type is not null then
  		loop
/*  
  --Start Fix SCR 7426.00 - Ashish N - 08-Sep-2017
  	IF :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type IS NULL THEN
  	  	NULL;
  	ELSIF :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type IS NOT NULL AND :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type NOT IN ('A','B','C','D','E','F','G','H','I','J','K','L','P','R','S','T','U' )	Then  	
  					v_cycle := :pl_std_star.processing_cycle; 
  			IF NOT is_override (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
                             v_cycle,
                             'STAR',
                             1181
                            ) THEN
  	     v_all_err := v_all_err||' * '||'1181'||' - ' || 'Route Type: '||:PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.route_type||' Transition Ident: '||:PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.transition_ident||'-->' ||'Aircraft Type: '||get_err_text(1181)||chr(10);
  			END IF;
  		END IF;
  --End Fix SCR 7426.00 - Ashish N - 08-Sep-2017
  */
  	 -- Start Fix SCR 7459.00 - Eswar KC - 09-May-2017
  	  IF :pl_std_star_segment.QUALIFIER_1 IS NULL THEN
  	  	NULL;
			ELSIF :pl_std_star_segment.QUALIFIER_1 IS NOT NULL AND :pl_std_star_segment.QUALIFIER_1 NOT IN   ('D','R','F','G','H','P')	 Then	
  	     v_all_err := v_all_err||' * Route Type: '||:PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.route_type||' Transition Ident: '||:PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.transition_ident||'-->' ||'Invalid Qualifier_1: '||:PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.qualifier_1||chr(10);
  		END IF;  			
			
			IF :pl_std_star_segment.QUALIFIER_2 IS NULL THEN
  	  	NULL;
			ELSIF :pl_std_star_segment.QUALIFIER_2 IS NOT NULL AND :pl_std_star_segment.QUALIFIER_2 NOT IN ('C','D','F','G','H','I')	Then  	
  	     v_all_err := v_all_err||' * Route type: '||:PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.route_type||' Transition Ident: '||:PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.transition_ident||'-->' ||'Invalid Qualifier_2: '||:PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.qualifier_2||chr(10);
  			
			END IF;  
		-- End Fix SCR 7459.00 - Eswar KC - 09-May-2017

         --Start Fix SCR 06185.00 - Ashish N - 08-Sep-2023
  	IF :pl_std_star_segment.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND IS NULL THEN
  	  	NULL;
  	ELSIF :pl_std_star_segment.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND IS NOT NULL AND :pl_std_star_segment.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND NOT IN ('P','L' )	Then  	
  					v_cycle := :pl_std_star.processing_cycle; 
  			IF NOT is_override (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
                             v_cycle,
                             'STAR',
                             1188
                            ) THEN
  	     v_all_err := v_all_err||' * '||'1188'||' - ' || 'Route Type: '||:PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.route_type||' Transition Ident: '||:PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT.transition_ident||':'||get_err_text(1188)||chr(10);
  			END IF;
  		END IF;
  --End Fix SCR 06185.00 - Ashish N - 08-Sep-2023
  			v_index := v_index + 1;
  			v_segs(v_index) := :pl_std_star_segment.route_type||','||:pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident||','||:pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
  			if p_ignore_ref = 'N' then
    			set_update_dcr('PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT',null);
    		end if;
  			exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  			next_record;
  		end loop;
  		first_record;
  	end if;
  	-- Validate all legs
		recsv2.vset_global_constant (99999); 	--Fix --SCR 4721.03 - Madhu -26-Nov-2013
		Magnetic_Course_SDV_Prc(:parameter.record_type);--Fix --SCR 4721.03 - Madhu -26-Nov-2013
  	go_block('pl_std_star_leg');
  	if :PL_STD_star_leg.sequence_num is not null then
  		if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then  
  			first_record;
  			loop
  				if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
  					:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND 
  					:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
  					:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
  					:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
  					:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
  				end if;
  				exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  				next_record;
  			end loop;	
				:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
				:control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
		:control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
		:control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
			end if;
  		first_record;
  		loop
  			validate_leg(p_ignore_ref);
  			v_seg_exist := 'N';
  			for i in 1..v_index loop
  				if :PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type||','||:pl_std_star_leg.transition_ident||','||:pl_std_star_leg.aircraft_type = v_segs(i) then --65347
  					v_seg_exist := 'Y';
  					exit;
  				end if;
  			end loop;
  			if v_seg_exist = 'N' then
  				IF v_all_err IS NULL OR LENGTH(v_all_err)<30000 THEN --Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013	
  					v_all_err := v_all_err||' * Segment '||:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.route_type||' Transition Ident '||:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident||' Aircraft Type '||:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type --65347
  										||', Seq #'||:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.sequence_num||'--> '||to_char(5630)||' - '||get_err_text(5630)||chr(10);
  				END IF;
  			end if;	
  			v_all_err := SUBSTR(v_all_err||:control_block.seq_errors,1,30000);--Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013
  			v_detail_ind := set_validate_ind(:pl_std_star_leg.validate_ind,v_detail_ind);
  			exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 				next_record;
  		end loop;
  		-- Validate procedure
  		if :global.recent_cycle >= :pl_std_star.processing_cycle then
  		  v_cycle := :pl_std_star.processing_cycle;
  	  else
  		  v_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	  end if;
  		check_procs.v_one_proc
              ('S','STAR','A',:pl_std_star.airport_ident,:pl_std_star.airport_icao,
               :pl_std_star.star_ident,:pl_std_star.area_code,:pl_std_star.create_dcr_number, 
               :pl_std_star.data_supplier, v_cycle,--:pl_std_star.processing_cycle,
               v_proc_err,p_ignore_ref);
    else
  		v_all_err := v_all_err||' ** This Procedure has no legs! '; 	
  	end if;
  else
    set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
    set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
    :control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS := 'W O R K I N G !  Please wait.';
    v_master_ind := set_validate_ind(:pl_tld_star.validate_ind,v_master_ind);
  	--
  	-- Get Segment
  	if :system.cursor_block not like '%SEGMENT' then
  		go_block('pl_tld_star_segment');
  		if error_CODE in (40209,50016) then -- illegal format
 				Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
 				raise form_trigger_failure;
			end if;
  	end if;
  	first_record;
  	if :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type is not null then
  		loop
/* 			--Start Fix SCR 7426.00 - Ashish N - 08-Sep-2017
				IF :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type IS NULL THEN
  	  	NULL;
				ELSIF :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type IS NOT NULL AND :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type NOT IN ('A','B','C','D','E','F','G','H','I','J','K','L','P','R','S','T','U' )	Then  	
					v_cycle := :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle; 
					IF NOT is_override (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
                             v_cycle,
                             'STAR',
                             1181
                            ) THEN
  	     v_all_err := v_all_err||' * '||'1181'||' - ' || 'Route Type: '||:PL_tld_star_SEGMENT.route_type||' Transition Ident: '||:PL_tld_star_SEGMENT.transition_ident||'-->' ||'Aircraft Type: '||get_err_text(1181)||chr(10);
					END IF;
				END IF;	
		--End Fix SCR 7426.00 - Ashish N - 08-Sep-2017 */

  	 -- Start Fix SCR 7459.00 - Eswar KC - 09-May-2017
  	  IF :pl_tld_star_segment.QUALIFIER_1 IS NULL THEN
  	  	NULL;
			ELSIF :pl_tld_star_segment.QUALIFIER_1 IS NOT NULL AND :pl_tld_star_segment.QUALIFIER_1 NOT IN   ('D','R','F','G','H','P')	 Then	
  	     v_all_err := v_all_err||' * Route Type: '||:PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.route_type||' Transition Ident: '||:PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.transition_ident||'-->' ||'Invalid Qualifier_1: '||:PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.qualifier_1||chr(10);
  		END IF;  			
			
			IF :pl_tld_star_segment.QUALIFIER_2 IS NULL THEN
  	  	NULL;
			ELSIF :pl_tld_star_segment.QUALIFIER_2 IS NOT NULL AND :pl_tld_star_segment.QUALIFIER_2 NOT IN ('C','D','F','G','H','I')	Then  	
  	     v_all_err := v_all_err||' * Route type: '||:PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.route_type||' Transition Ident: '||:PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.transition_ident||'-->' ||'Invalid Qualifier_2: '||:PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.qualifier_2||chr(10);
  			
			END IF;  
		-- End Fix SCR 7459.00 - Eswar KC - 09-May-2017
       
  --Start Fix SCR 06185.00 - Ashish N - 31-AUG-2023
  	IF :pl_tld_star_segment.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND IS NULL THEN
  	  	NULL;
  	ELSIF :pl_tld_star_segment.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND IS NOT NULL AND :pl_tld_star_segment.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND NOT IN ('P','L' )	Then  	
  					v_cycle := :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle; 
  			IF NOT is_override (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
                             v_cycle,
                             'STAR',
                             1188
                            ) THEN
  	     v_all_err := v_all_err||' * '||'1188'||' - ' || 'Route Type: '||:PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.route_type||' Transition Ident: '||:PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT.transition_ident||':'||get_err_text(1188)||chr(10);
  			END IF;
  	END IF;
  --End Fix SCR 06185.00 - Ashish N - 31-AUG-2023    
          
  			if :pl_tld_star.flag_change = 'Y' then
  				:pl_tld_star_segment.generated_in_house_flag := :pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag;
		  	  :pl_tld_star_segment.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle;
  			end if;
  			v_index := v_index + 1;
  			v_segs(v_index) := :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type||','||:pl_tld_star_segment.transition_ident||','||:pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347

  			
  			if p_ignore_ref = 'N' then
    			set_update_dcr('PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT',null);
    		end if;
  			exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  			next_record;
  		end loop;
  		first_record;
  	end if;
  	-- Validate all legs
		recsv2.vset_global_constant (99999); 	--Fix --SCR 4721.03 - Madhu -26-Nov-2013
    Magnetic_Course_SDV_Prc(:parameter.record_type);--Fix --SCR 4721.03 - Madhu -26-Nov-2013
  	go_block('pl_tld_star_leg');
  	if :pl_tld_star_leg.sequence_num is not null then
  		if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' OR :pl_tld_star.flag_change = 'Y' then
  			first_record;
  			loop
  				if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
  					:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND 
  					 :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
  					:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
  					:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
  					:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
  				end if;
  				:pl_tld_star_leg.generated_in_house_flag := :pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag;
		  		:pl_tld_star_leg.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle;
  				exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
  				next_record;
  			end loop;	
				:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
				:control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
		:control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
		:control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
				:pl_tld_star.flag_change := 'N';		
  		end if;
  		first_record;
  		loop
  			validate_leg(p_ignore_ref);
  			v_seg_exist := 'N';
  			for i in 1..v_index loop
  				if :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type||','||:pl_tld_star_leg.transition_ident||','||:pl_tld_star_leg.aircraft_type = v_segs(i) then --65347
  					v_seg_exist := 'Y';
  					exit;
  				end if;
  			end loop;
  			if v_seg_exist = 'N' then
  				IF v_all_err IS NULL OR LENGTH(v_all_err)<30000 THEN --Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013
  					v_all_err := v_all_err||' * Route '||:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.route_type||' Transition '||:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.transition_ident||' Aircraft Type '||:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.aircraft_type|| --65347
  										', Seq #'||:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.sequence_num||'--> '||to_char(5630)||' - '||get_err_text(5630)||chr(10);
  			
  				END IF;
  			end if;	
  			v_all_err := SUBSTR(v_all_err||:control_block.seq_errors,1,30000);--Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013
  			v_detail_ind := set_validate_ind(:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind,v_detail_ind);
  			ls_valid_ind := ls_valid_ind||:pl_tld_star_leg.validate_ind;--Fix SCR 7149 --Madhu--18-Oct-2017  			
  			exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 				next_record;
  		end loop;
  		-- Validate procedure
  		/*if :global.recent_cycle >= :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle then
  			v_cycle := :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle;
  		else
  			v_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  		end if;*/ --7607
  		v_cycle := nvl(:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle,:global.processing_cycle); --7607
  		check_procs.v_one_proc
              ('T','STAR','A',:pl_tld_star.airport_ident,:pl_tld_star.airport_icao,
               :pl_tld_star.star_ident,:pl_tld_star.customer_ident,:pl_tld_star.create_dcr_number, 
               :pl_tld_star.data_supplier, v_cycle, --:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle,
               v_proc_err, p_ignore_ref);
    else
  		v_all_err := v_all_err||' ** This Procedure has no legs! '; 	
    end if;
  end if;
--Begin Fix SCR 7149 --Madhu--18-Oct-2017
  IF :control_block.temp_field = 'Y' AND INSTR(ls_valid_ind,'I')>0  THEN 
  	v_all_err := v_all_err||'* This STAR has been locked by other user. Please exit from the form without saving '||chr(10);
  	:control_block.temp_field := 'N';
  END IF;  
--End Fix SCR 7149 --Madhu--18-Oct-2017  
  --Begin Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013
	IF LENGTH(NVL(v_all_err,0)) IS NOT NULL THEN
    IF LENGTH(v_all_err || v_proc_err) < 30000 THEN 
		  v_all_err := v_all_err||v_proc_err;  
		ELSIF LENGTH(v_all_err || v_proc_err) >= 30000 THEN
			v_all_err := SUBSTR(v_all_err||v_proc_err,1,30000)||'.....';
		END IF;
  END IF;
  --End Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013
	go_block(cursor_block);
	if cursor_block not LIKE '%STAR' then
		go_record(cursor_record);
	end if;
	go_item(cursor_item);
	if rtrim(name_in(substr(cursor_block,1,11)||'_leg.SEQUENCE_NUM')) is not null then
  	validate_leg('Y');
	end if;
	-- Set validate indicator of the Master record
	Set_Master(p_ignore_ref, substr(cursor_block,1,11),v_all_err, 
						 :parameter.work_type, v_master_ind, v_detail_ind);
	Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
	:control_block.validated := 'Y';	
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CHECK_PROCS
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PACKAGE  check_procs IS
       
  Type segs_table is table of check_procedures.segrec 
      index by binary_integer;    

  Procedure v_one_proc 
      (p_record_type         in  varchar2,   -- S for standard, T for tailored
       p_proc                in  varchar2,   -- star, star, approach
       p_terminal_type       in  varchar2,   -- A - airport, H - heliport
       p_terminal_ident      in  varchar2,   -- Airport/Heliport ident
       p_terminal_icao       in  varchar2,   -- Airport/Heliport ICAO code
       p_proc_ident          in  varchar2,   -- Procedure ident
       p_cust                in  varchar2,   -- Customer ident
       p_dcr                 in  number, 
       p_supplier            in  varchar2, 
       p_cycle               in  number,
       p_error_list          out varchar2,
       p_ignore_ref          in  varchar2);
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Package Spec
   ----------
   * Name                                            CHECK_PROCS
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/*
    SCR 0148 --Madhu -- 06-June-2012 
    This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done for Production SCR 5328   
*/
PACKAGE BODY CHECK_PROCS IS

  Procedure fill_segs
      (p_record_type in varchar2,
       p_segs        out segs_table,
       p_nsegs       out number
       ) IS
    v_index  number := 0;
  begin
  	if p_record_type = 'S' then
  		-- Process Standard data
    	go_block('pl_std_star_leg');
    	first_record;
    	go_block('pl_std_star_segment');
  	  first_record;
  	  if :pl_std_star_segment.route_type is not null then
  	  loop
  	 	  v_index := v_index + 1;
  		  p_segs(v_index).procedure_type   := 'STAR';
  		  p_segs(v_index).record_type      := p_record_type;
  		  p_segs(v_index).terminal_type    := 'A';
  		  p_segs(v_index).transition_ident := :pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident;
  		  p_segs(v_index).route_type       := :pl_std_star_segment.route_type;
  		  p_segs(v_index).aircraft_type       := :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
  		  p_segs(v_index).qualifier_1 		 := nvl(:pl_std_star_segment.qualifier_1,' ');--- SCR 3918
  		  p_segs(v_index).qualifier_2			 := nvl(:pl_std_star_segment.qualifier_2,' ');--- SCR 3918
  		  p_segs(v_index).procedure_ident  := :pl_std_star.star_ident;
  		  p_segs(v_index).terminal_ident   := :pl_std_star.airport_ident;
  		  p_segs(v_index).terminal_icao    := :pl_std_star.airport_icao;
  		  p_segs(v_index).PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND := nvl(:pl_std_star_segment.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND,' '); --SCR 06185 - Ashish Niranjan- 30-AUG-2023
  		  if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
  		  	first_record;
  		  	exit;
  		  else
    		  next_record;
  		  end if;
  	  end loop;
  	  end if;
  	  p_nsegs := v_index;
  	else
  		-- Process Tailored data
    	go_block('pl_tld_star_leg');
    	first_record;
    	go_block('pl_tld_star_segment');
  	  first_record;
  	  if :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type is not null then
  	  	loop
  	 	  	v_index := v_index + 1;
  		  	p_segs(v_index).procedure_type   := 'STAR';
  		  	p_segs(v_index).record_type      := p_record_type;
  		  	p_segs(v_index).terminal_type    := 'A';
  		  	p_segs(v_index).transition_ident := :pl_tld_star_segment.transition_ident;
  		  	p_segs(v_index).route_type       := :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type;
  		  	p_segs(v_index).aircraft_type       := :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
    		  p_segs(v_index).qualifier_1 		 := nvl(:pl_tld_star_segment.qualifier_1,' ');--- SCR 3918
    		  p_segs(v_index).qualifier_2			 := nvl(:pl_tld_star_segment.qualifier_2,' ');--- SCR 3918
  		  	p_segs(v_index).procedure_ident  := :pl_tld_star.star_ident;
  		  	p_segs(v_index).terminal_ident   := :pl_tld_star.airport_ident;
  		  	p_segs(v_index).terminal_icao    := :pl_tld_star.airport_icao;
  		  	p_segs(v_index).PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND := nvl(:pl_tld_star_segment.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND,' '); --SCR 06185 - Ashish Niranjan- 31-AUG-2023
  		  	if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
  		  		first_record;
  		  		exit;
  		  	else
    		  	next_record;
  		  	end if;
  	  	end loop;
  	  end if;
  	  p_nsegs := v_index;
  	end if;
  end fill_segs;
  		
  Procedure fill_legs
      (p_record_type in varchar2,
       p_rt          in varchar2,  -- route type
       p_ti          in varchar2,  -- transition ident
       p_at					 in varchar2, --65347
       p_legs        out check_procedures.legs_table,
       p_nlegs       out number) IS
    v_index  number := 0;
  begin
  	if p_record_type = 'S' then
  		-- Process Standard data
    	go_block('pl_std_star_leg');
    	first_record;
  	  loop
  	  	if :pl_std_star_leg.transition_ident = p_ti and
  	  		 :pl_std_star_leg.route_type = p_rt AND 
  	  		 :pl_std_star_leg.aircraft_type = p_at then --65347
  	 	    v_index := v_index + 1;
  		    p_legs(v_index).procedure_type   := 'STAR';
  		    p_legs(v_index).record_type      := p_record_type;
  		    p_legs(v_index).terminal_type    := 'A';
  		    p_legs(v_index).transition_ident := :pl_std_star_leg.transition_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).route_type       := :pl_std_star_leg.route_type;
  		    p_legs(v_index).aircraft_type       := :pl_std_star_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
  		    p_legs(v_index).procedure_ident  := :pl_std_star.star_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).terminal_ident   := :pl_std_star.airport_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).terminal_icao    := :pl_std_star.airport_icao;
  		    p_legs(v_index).sequence_num     := :pl_std_star_leg.sequence_num;
  		    p_legs(v_index).alt_1            := :pl_std_star_leg.alt_1;
  		    p_legs(v_index).alt_2            := :pl_std_star_leg.alt_2;
  		    p_legs(v_index).alt_description  := :pl_std_star_leg.alt_description;
  		    p_legs(v_index).arc_radius       := :pl_std_star_leg.arc_radius;
  		    p_legs(v_index).atc_ind          := :pl_std_star_leg.atc_ind;
  		    p_legs(v_index).center_fix_icao_code    := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).center_fix_ident    := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).center_fix_multiple_code    := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_multiple_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).center_fix_section    := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_section;
  		    p_legs(v_index).center_fix_subsection    := :pl_std_star_leg.center_fix_subsection;
  		    p_legs(v_index).cycle_data    := :pl_std_star_leg.cycle_data;
  		    p_legs(v_index).file_recno    := :pl_std_star_leg.file_recno;
  		    p_legs(v_index).fix_icao_code    := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_icao_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).fix_ident    := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).fix_section_code    := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_section_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).fix_subsection_code    := :pl_std_star_leg.fix_subsection_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).magnetic_course    := :pl_std_star_leg.magnetic_course;
  		    p_legs(v_index).path_and_termination    := :pl_std_star_leg.path_and_termination;
  		    p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_icao_code    := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_ident    := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_section    := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
  		    p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_subsection    := :pl_std_star_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection;
  		    p_legs(v_index).rho    := :pl_std_star_leg.rho;
  		    p_legs(v_index).rnp    := :pl_std_star_leg.rnp;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009  		    
  		    --p_legs(v_index).rnp2   := :pl_std_star_leg.rnp2;
  		    --p_legs(v_index).rnp3   := :pl_std_star_leg.rnp3;
-- End Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009  		    
  		    p_legs(v_index).route_distance    := :pl_std_star_leg.route_distance;
  		    p_legs(v_index).speed_limit    := :pl_std_star_leg.speed_limit;
  		    p_legs(v_index).theta    := :pl_std_star_leg.theta;
  		    p_legs(v_index).trans_altitude    := :pl_std_star_leg.trans_altitude;
  		    p_legs(v_index).turn_dir_valid    := :pl_std_star_leg.turn_dir_valid;
  		    p_legs(v_index).turn_direction    := :pl_std_star_leg.turn_direction;
  		    p_legs(v_index).vertical_angle    := :pl_std_star_leg.vertical_angle;
  		    p_legs(v_index).waypoint_desc_code    := :pl_std_star_leg.waypoint_desc_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR   := :pl_std_star_leg.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR; --06185 - Ashish Niranjan- 31-AUG-2023
  		  end if;
  		  if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
  		  	first_record;
  		  	exit;
  		  else
    		  next_record;
  		  end if;
  	  end loop;
  	  p_nlegs := v_index;
  	else
  		-- Process Tailored data
    	go_block('pl_tld_star_leg');
    	first_record;
  	  loop
  	  	if :pl_tld_star_leg.transition_ident = p_ti and
  	  		 :pl_tld_star_leg.route_type = p_rt AND 
  	  		 :pl_tld_star_leg.aircraft_type = p_at then --65347
  	 	    v_index := v_index + 1;
  		    p_legs(v_index).procedure_type   := 'STAR';
  		    p_legs(v_index).record_type      := p_record_type;
  		    p_legs(v_index).terminal_type    := 'A';
  		    p_legs(v_index).transition_ident := :pl_tld_star_leg.transition_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).route_type       := :pl_tld_star_leg.route_type;
  		    p_legs(v_index).aircraft_type       := :pl_tld_star_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
  		    p_legs(v_index).procedure_ident  := :pl_tld_star.star_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).terminal_ident   := :pl_tld_star.airport_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).terminal_icao    := :pl_tld_star.airport_icao;
  		    p_legs(v_index).sequence_num     := :pl_tld_star_leg.sequence_num;
  		    p_legs(v_index).alt_1            := :pl_tld_star_leg.alt_1;
  		    p_legs(v_index).alt_2            := :pl_tld_star_leg.alt_2;
  		    p_legs(v_index).alt_description  := :pl_tld_star_leg.alt_description;
  		    p_legs(v_index).arc_radius       := :pl_tld_star_leg.arc_radius;
  		    p_legs(v_index).atc_ind          := :pl_tld_star_leg.atc_ind;
  		    p_legs(v_index).center_fix_icao_code    := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).center_fix_ident    := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).center_fix_multiple_code    := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_multiple_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).center_fix_section    := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_section;
  		    p_legs(v_index).center_fix_subsection    := :pl_tld_star_leg.center_fix_subsection;
  		    p_legs(v_index).cycle_data    := :pl_tld_star_leg.cycle_data;
  		    p_legs(v_index).file_recno    := :pl_tld_star_leg.file_recno;
  		    p_legs(v_index).fix_icao_code    := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_icao_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).fix_ident    := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).fix_section_code    := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_section_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).fix_subsection_code    := :pl_tld_star_leg.fix_subsection_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).magnetic_course    := :pl_tld_star_leg.magnetic_course;
  		    p_legs(v_index).path_and_termination    := :pl_tld_star_leg.path_and_termination;
  		    p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_icao_code    := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_ident    := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
  		    p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_section    := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
  		    p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_subsection    := :pl_tld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection;
  		    p_legs(v_index).rho    := :pl_tld_star_leg.rho;
  		    p_legs(v_index).rnp    := :pl_tld_star_leg.rnp;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009  		    
  		    --p_legs(v_index).rnp2   := :pl_tld_star_leg.rnp2;
  		    --p_legs(v_index).rnp3   := :pl_tld_star_leg.rnp3;
-- End Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009  		    
  		    p_legs(v_index).route_distance    := :pl_tld_star_leg.route_distance;
  		    p_legs(v_index).speed_limit    := :pl_tld_star_leg.speed_limit;
  		    p_legs(v_index).theta    := :pl_tld_star_leg.theta;
  		    p_legs(v_index).trans_altitude    := :pl_tld_star_leg.trans_altitude;
  		    p_legs(v_index).turn_dir_valid    := :pl_tld_star_leg.turn_dir_valid;
  		    p_legs(v_index).turn_direction    := :pl_tld_star_leg.turn_direction;
  		    p_legs(v_index).vertical_angle    := :pl_tld_star_leg.vertical_angle;
  		    p_legs(v_index).waypoint_desc_code    := :pl_tld_star_leg.waypoint_desc_code;
  		    p_legs(v_index).PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR   := :pl_tld_star_leg.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR; --06185 - Ashish Niranjan- 31-AUG-2023
  		  end if;
  		  if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
  		  	first_record;
  		  	exit;
  		  else
    		  next_record;
  		  end if;
  	  end loop;
  	  p_nlegs := v_index;
  	end if;
  end fill_legs;
  		
  		
  Procedure v_one_proc 
      (p_record_type         in  varchar2,   -- S for standard, T for tailored
       p_proc                in  varchar2,   -- star, star, approach
       p_terminal_type       in  varchar2,   -- A - airport, H - heliport
       p_terminal_ident      in  varchar2,   -- Airport/Heliport ident
       p_terminal_icao       in  varchar2,   -- Airport/Heliport ICAO code
       p_proc_ident          in  varchar2,   -- Procedure ident
       p_cust                in  varchar2,   -- Customer ident
       p_dcr                 in  number, 
       p_supplier            in  varchar2, 
       p_cycle               in  number,
       p_error_list          out varchar2,
       p_ignore_ref          in  varchar2) is
    	v_legs       check_procedures.legs_table; -- Legs Table - holds all legs belonging to the current segment
      v_segs       segs_table; -- Segs table - holds all segs belonging to the current proc
    	v_nsegs      number;     -- Number of segments
    	v_nlegs      number;     -- Number of legs within current segment
      v_err        number;
      v_all_errors varchar2(32000) := null;--Increased the length from 8000 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Neelima, 07-Mar-2011
      v_is_map     boolean := FALSE;    -- TRUE for Missed Approach, FALSE for not a Missed Approach
      v_mleg       number;     -- The leg number of a Missed Approach point  
    	v_exception  exception;
    	--v_exist_123  varchar2(3) := 'NNN'; -- Mod on 6/19/2003 for SCR695
    	seg_route_type varchar2(5);          -- Mod 3
    	seg_transition varchar2(1000) := ',';  -- Mod 3
    	v_mag_course_1 number;          -- Mod 4
    	v_mag_course_2 number;          -- Mod 4
    	v_mag_course_diff number;       -- Mod 4
    	v_table        varchar2(15);
    	v_in_house     varchar2(1);
    	v_count        number;
    	v_altitude     varchar2(1) := 'N'; -- Mod 9
    	v_runway_dcr_1  number;            -- Mod 9
    	v_runway_dcr_2  number;            -- Mod 9
    	v_distance      number;            -- Mod 9
    	v_exist_route   varchar2(20);      -- Mod 9
    	v_errlist    cpt_types.errlist_type;
    	v_err_num       number(4);
    	v_seq           number(4);
    	v_runway_transition varchar2(1) := 'N';
    	v_processing_cycle number(6);
    	rseg         check_procedures.segrec;--- SCR 3918
    	v_s1 varchar2(10);
    	v_s2 varchar2(10);
			ls_Proc_Err VARCHAR2(32000) := NULL; -- Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu --29-Sep-2013
				--65347
			v_star_transition      VARCHAR2(1000) := ',';
			v_sid_transition      VARCHAR2(1000) := ',';
			v_appr_transition      VARCHAR2(1000) := ',';
			--v_transition_aircraft_type VARCHAR2(30) := ',';
			--v_common_aircraft_type VARCHAR2(30);
			--v_invalid_aircraft_type  VARCHAR2(1):= 'N';
--SCR 6146--Madhu--19-Jan-2021
			v_aircraft_type			VARCHAR2(1):= null;
			 v_transition_aircraft_type VARCHAR2(4000) := ',';
		  v_common_aircraft_type VARCHAR2(4000):=NULL;
		  v_invalid_aircraft_type  VARCHAR2(1):= 'N';	  
		  v_star_enrt_transition VARCHAR2(32767) := NULL;
		  v_sid_enrt_transition VARCHAR2(32767) := NULL;
		  ln_enrt_trans_count  NUMBER := 0; 
		  v_dup_enrt_found VARCHAR2(1):= 'N';
		  v_enrt_transition_aircraft_typ VARCHAR2(4000) := ',';
		  v_rwy_transition_aircraft_type VARCHAR2(4000) := ',';
		  v_invalid_values VARCHAR2(4000) := NULL;
		  l_first_Proc_Design_Mag_Var VARCHAR2(5) := NULL; --SCR 06185 - Ashish N- 04-Sep-2023
--SCR 6146--Madhu--19-Jan-2021
	  --65347
			
    begin
      fill_segs(p_record_type, v_segs, v_nsegs);
      if v_nsegs = 0 then              -- Added on 01/20/2002
      	ls_Proc_Err := '* '||to_char(5640)||' - '||get_err_text(5640);
      	raise v_exception;             -- Added on 01/20/2002
      end if;
      if p_record_type = 'T' then
      	v_table := 'PL_TLD_STAR';
      	v_in_house := :pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag;
      	v_processing_cycle := nvl(:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle,:global.processing_cycle);
      else
      	v_table := 'PL_STD_STAR';
      	v_in_house := 'N';
      	v_processing_cycle := nvl(:pl_std_star.processing_cycle,:global.processing_cycle);
      end if;
      for i in 1..v_nsegs loop
      	rseg.qualifier_1 := v_segs(i).qualifier_1; --- SCR 3918
      	rseg.qualifier_2 := v_segs(i).qualifier_2; --- SCR 3918  
      	rseg.aircraft_type := v_segs(i).aircraft_type; --- 65347 
      	rseg.transition_ident := v_segs(i).transition_ident; --6146  	
      	rseg.PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND := v_segs(i).PROC_DESIGN_MAG_VAR_IND; --SCR 06185- Ashish N- -04-sep-2023 
      	-- Star mod for SCR695
      	/*if v_segs(i).route_type = '1' then
      		v_exist_123 := 'Y'||substr(v_exist_123,2);
      	elsif v_segs(i).route_type = '2' then
      		v_exist_123 := substr(v_exist_123,1,1)||'Y'||substr(v_exist_123,3);
      	elsif v_segs(i).route_type = '3' then
      		v_exist_123 := substr(v_exist_123,1,2)||'Y';
      	end if;*/
      	-- End mod for SCR695
        if instr(nvl(v_exist_route,'*'),v_segs(i).route_type) = 0 then  -- mod 9
         	v_exist_route := v_exist_route||v_segs(i).route_type;         -- mod 9
        else
        	if v_segs(i).route_type in ('2','5','8','M') then               
        		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 731) then
        			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> * 731 - '||get_err_text(731);	
        		end if;	
          end if;
        end if;       
        -- mod 9
      	
      	--65347
 /*     	
      	IF instr(NVL(v_star_transition,'*'),v_segs(i).transition_ident) = 0 THEN
					v_star_transition := v_star_transition||v_segs(i).transition_ident||',';
				ELSE  
							IF NOT UTIL1.IS_OVERRIDE_ERROR(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 5677) THEN   
                  ls_Proc_Err := ls_Proc_Err||'* Route Type '''||v_segs(i).route_type||''', Transition '''||
        																v_segs(i).transition_ident||''' -> '||to_char(5677)||' - '||get_err_text(5677)||chr(10);
      
               END IF;
				END IF;  
*/ -- Commented for SCR 5690 DU Split 

-- SCR 6146--Madhu--19-Jan-2021
				IF v_segs(i).route_type IN ('2','5','8','M') THEN
					
					v_common_aircraft_type := v_segs(i).aircraft_type;
				
				ELSIF v_segs(i).route_type IN ('1','4', '7', 'F') THEN
					
					IF v_star_enrt_transition IS NOT NULL THEN
						
						ln_enrt_trans_count := nvl(length(v_star_enrt_transition), 0) - nvl(length(replace(v_star_enrt_transition, ',')), 0) + 1;
						
						FOR i in 1..ln_enrt_trans_count LOOP
						--	dsp_msg(v_star_enrt_transition||'/'||v_segs(i).transition_ident||'/'||rseg.transition_ident);
							IF REGEXP_SUBSTR (NVL(v_star_enrt_transition,'*'), '[^,]+', 1, i) = rseg.transition_ident THEN				
								v_dup_enrt_found := 'Y';
								EXIT;
							ELSE
								v_dup_enrt_found := 'N';
							END IF;
													
						END LOOP;
						
						IF v_dup_enrt_found = 'N' THEN				
							v_star_enrt_transition := v_star_enrt_transition||','||rseg.transition_ident;
						ELSE
							IF NOT UTIL1.IS_OVERRIDE_ERROR(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 5677) THEN 
								ls_Proc_Err := ls_Proc_Err||'* Route Type '''||rseg.route_type||''', Transition '''||
	        															rseg.transition_ident||''' -> '||to_char(5677)||' - '||get_err_text(5677)||chr(10);
							END IF;
						END IF;
					ELSE	
						v_star_enrt_transition := 	rseg.transition_ident;
					END IF;
						
					v_enrt_transition_aircraft_typ  := v_enrt_transition_aircraft_typ||rseg.aircraft_type||',';	
				ELSE
					v_rwy_transition_aircraft_type  := v_rwy_transition_aircraft_type||rseg.aircraft_type||',';		
				END IF;	
-- SCR 6146--Madhu--19-Jan-2021				     	
      	/*IF NVL(v_aircraft_type, v_segs(i).aircraft_type) != v_segs(i).aircraft_type THEN
	      	IF NOT UTIL1.IS_OVERRIDE_ERROR(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 5677) THEN 
	      		ls_Proc_Err := ls_Proc_Err||'* Route Type '''||v_segs(i).route_type||''', Transition '''||
	        																v_segs(i).transition_ident||''' -> '||to_char(5677)||' - '||get_err_text(5677)||chr(10);
	      	END IF;
      	END IF;	
      	v_aircraft_type := v_segs(i).aircraft_type;*/
      	
      	--65347
      	if v_segs(i).route_type in ('3','6','9','S') then
      		seg_route_type := '369S';
      	elsif v_segs(i).route_type in ('2','5','8','M') then
      		seg_transition := seg_transition||v_segs(i).transition_ident||',';
      	end if;	
      	-- Start mod 7
        chkprc_util.check_sid_star_transition(v_segs(i).route_type, v_segs(i).transition_ident,  v_table,  p_record_type,  p_proc,  
        														p_terminal_ident, p_terminal_icao, p_cust,  p_dcr,  p_supplier,  p_cycle,  v_in_house,
                                    v_runway_transition,v_runway_dcr_1,v_err_num, p_ignore_ref,'DU'); --7607
        if v_err_num > 0 then
        	if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', v_err_num) then
        		v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> * '||to_char(v_err_num)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err_num);
        	end if;	
        end if;	
        -- End mod 7
      	fill_legs(p_record_type, v_segs(i).route_type, v_segs(i).transition_ident,v_segs(i).aircraft_type, --65347
                  v_legs, v_nlegs);
        
        if v_nlegs = 0 then            -- Added on 01/20/2002
        	ls_Proc_Err := ls_Proc_Err||'* Route Type '''||v_segs(i).route_type||''', Transition '''||
        																v_segs(i).transition_ident||''', Aircraft type '''||v_segs(i).aircraft_type|| ''' -> '||to_char(1000)||' - '||get_err_text(1000); --65347
        	raise v_exception;           -- Added on 01/20/2002
        end if;
        -- Check current segment
        if v_nlegs > 1 then
          -- Check leg sequence
          for i in 2..v_nlegs loop
          	v_err := chkprc_util.v_leg_sequence(v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination,
          	                                    v_legs(i).path_and_termination);
          	if v_err > 0 then
          		--  SCR 1022.01 #4 - Check if TF-DF 
	            if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'TF' and v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'DF' and
	            	 substr(v_legs(i-1).waypoint_desc_code,2,1) in ('B','Y') then
	            	-- Allow this combination
	            	null;
	            else
          			-- Add the error to v_all_errors
          			if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', v_err) then
          				v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i-1).sequence_num||' - '||
          																 to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err)||
          																 ': The leg '''||v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||''' '||
                              						 ' is followed by '''||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||''''||chr(10); 
              	end if;
              end if;	
          		end if;
  -- SCR 6055--Madhu--12-Jan-2021         		
          		IF v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'PI' AND v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'CF' and v_legs(i).Turn_Direction IS NOT NULL THEN
          			
          			IF NOT is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 1187) THEN
          				
          				 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i-1).sequence_num||' - '||
	                                                                         to_char(1187)||' - '||get_err_text(1187)||chr(10); 
          			
          			END IF;
          			
          		END IF;	
  -- SCR 6055--Madhu--12-Jan-2021         		
          	-- Start changes for SCR 4795
          	-- ARINC 424 Attachment 5 Leg Sequencing section. 
        	  -- The IF leg is coded only when the altitude constraints at each end of the 'FX','HX' or 'PI' leg or different
        	 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'IF' and v_legs(i).path_and_termination in ('FA','FC','FD','FM','HA','HF','HM','PI') AND
                 NVL(v_legs(i-1).alt_description,'$') = NVL(v_legs(i).alt_description,'$') THEN
              select  Decode ( (SUBSTR(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i-1).alt_1)),'0'),1,2)) , 'FL' ,(SUBSTR(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i-1).alt_1)),'0'),3) * 100), TO_NUMBER(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i-1).alt_1)),'0')))
							into v_s1
				 			from dual;
				  		select  Decode ( (SUBSTR(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i).alt_1)),'0'),1,2)) , 'FL' ,(SUBSTR(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i).alt_1)),'0'),3) * 100), TO_NUMBER(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i).alt_1)),'0')))
							into v_s2
				 			from dual;
				 				IF v_s1 = v_s2 then	
				 				if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 1159) then
										v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||1159||' - '||get_err_text(1159);
			          end if;
			      		end if;
				   end if;
          --End  changes for SCR 4795
      		
      		  -- Start mod 9
        	  -- Atta. 5 - 3.3
        	  if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination in ('CF','DF','IF','TF') and v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'PI' then
        	  	-- If fix is null, error 1001 shall be cought
        	  	if v_legs(i-1).FIX_IDENT||v_legs(i-1).FIX_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i-1).FIX_SECTION_CODE||v_legs(i-1).FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE
        	  		!= v_legs(i).FIX_IDENT||v_legs(i).FIX_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i).FIX_SECTION_CODE||v_legs(i).FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE then
        	  		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 960) then
        	  			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||960||' - '||get_err_text(960);
        	  		end if;
        	  	end if;
        	  end if;
        	  -- Atta. 5 - 3.4.1	
        	  if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'AF' and v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'AF' then
        	  	if v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION
        	  		!= v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION then
        	  		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 961) then
        	  			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||961||' - '||get_err_text(961);
        	  		end if;
        	  	end if;
        	  	if abs(v_legs(i-1).rho - v_legs(i).rho) > .87 then
        	  		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 962) then
        	  			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||962||' - '||get_err_text(962);
        	  		end if;
        	  	end if;
        	  end if;
        	  -- Atta. 5 - 3.4.3
        	  if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'FD' and v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'AF' then
        	  	if v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION
        	  		!= v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION then
        	  		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 963) then
        	  			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||963||' - '||get_err_text(963);
        	  		end if;
        	  	end if;
        	  end if;
        	  -- Atta. 5 - 3.4.4
        	  if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination in ('CD','VD') and v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'AF' then
        	  	begin
        	  		v_distance := to_number(v_legs(i-1).route_distance)/10;
        	  		if v_distance != v_legs(i).rho then
        	  			if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 964) then
        	  				v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||964||' - '||get_err_text(964);
        	  			end if;
        	  		end if;
        	  	exception
        	  		when others then  -- route distance is not number.
        	  		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 964) then
        	  			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||964||' - '||get_err_text(964);
        	  		end if;
        	  	end;
        	  	if v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION
        	  		!= v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION then
        	  		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 965) then
        	  			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||965||' - '||get_err_text(965);
        	  		end if;
        	  	end if;
        	  end if;	
        	  -- Atta. 5 - 3.5
        	  if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination in ('AF','CF','DF','IF','RF','TF','HA','HF','HM') and
        	  	v_legs(i).path_and_termination in ('FA','FC','FD','FM') then
        	  	if v_legs(i-1).fix_ident != v_legs(i).fix_ident then
        	  		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 966) then
        	  			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||966||' - '||get_err_text(966);
        	  		end if;
        	  	end if;
        	  end if;
        	  -- Atta. 5 - 3.7
        	  if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination in ('CI','VI') and rtrim(v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT) is not null then
        	  	if v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION
        	  		!= v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION then
        	  		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 967) then
        	  			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||967||' - '||get_err_text(967);
        	  		end if;
        	  	end if;
        	  end if;	
          	-- End mod 9
          	-- Start SCR694 mod 4          	
            begin
            	if rtrim(v_legs(i-1).magnetic_course) is not null and rtrim(v_legs(i).magnetic_course) is not null then
		          	if substr(v_legs(i-1).magnetic_course,4,1) = 'T' then
		            	v_mag_course_1 := to_number(substr(v_legs(i-1).magnetic_course,1,3));
		          	else
			          	v_mag_course_1 := to_number(v_legs(i-1).magnetic_course)/10;
		          	end if;	
		          	if substr(v_legs(i).magnetic_course,4,1) = 'T' then
		            	v_mag_course_2 := to_number(substr(v_legs(i).magnetic_course,1,3));
		          	else
			          	v_mag_course_2 := to_number(v_legs(i).magnetic_course)/10;
		          	end if;
		          	v_mag_course_diff := abs(v_mag_course_1-v_mag_course_2);
		          	if v_mag_course_diff between 135 and 225 and v_mag_course_diff not in (135,225) then
		          		if v_legs(i).path_and_termination != 'IF' and
		          			v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination not in ('AF', 'FM', 'HM', 'PI', 'VM') and
		          			not(v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'RF' and v_legs(i).path_and_termination in ('RF','AF'))
		          			and rtrim(v_legs(i).turn_direction) is null  then
			          		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 929) then
			          			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          			v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||929||' - '||get_err_text(929);
		          			end if;
		          		end if;
		          		if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination not in ('AF','DF','HA','HF','HM','IF','PI','FM','VM')
		          			and v_legs(i).path_and_termination not in ('AF','DF','HA','HF','HM','IF','PI','RF') -- Fix - SCR 5328 - Eswar KC - 13-April-2012, added 'RF'
		          			and rtrim(v_legs(i).turn_direction) != 'E' and rtrim(v_legs(i).turn_dir_valid) is null then
			          		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 930) then
			          			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          			v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||930||' - '||get_err_text(930);
          					end if;
          				end if;
		          	end if;
		          	/*
		          	-- Start SCR1152 mod 5
		          	if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'RF' and	
		          		--(v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'TF' or substr(v_legs(i).path_and_termination,1,1) in ('C','F','H')) and
		          		v_legs(i).path_and_termination != 'RF' and substr(v_legs(i).path_and_termination,1,1) != 'H' and
		          		v_mag_course_diff != 0 then
		          		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 934) then
		          			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||934||' - '||get_err_text(934);
		          		end if;
		          	end if;			          		
		          	*/
		          end if;
            	/*
            	if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'RF' and	
		          	--substr(v_legs(i).path_and_termination,1,1) in ('C','F','H') and
		          	v_legs(i).path_and_termination != 'RF' and substr(v_legs(i).path_and_termination,1,1) != 'H' and
		          	rtrim(v_legs(i-1).magnetic_course) is not null and rtrim(v_legs(i).magnetic_course) is null then
		          	if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 934) then
		          		v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
			          		v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||934||' - '||get_err_text(934);
        				end if;
        			end if;
        			-- End SCR1152 mod 5	
        			*/
		        exception
		         	when others then
		         	-- when magnetic_course is invalid, the error shall be caught at structure validation
		         	null;
		        end;			
	          -- End SCR694 mod 4
      	   	if rtrim(v_legs(i-1).alt_1) is not null then
      				v_altitude := 'Y';
         		end if;
          end loop;
        end if; 
        -- Conitnue mod 9
        -- Atta. 5 - 5.1
        if v_legs(v_nlegs).path_and_termination = 'VM' then
        	if v_legs(v_nlegs).fix_ident||v_legs(v_nlegs).fix_icao_code	!= p_terminal_ident||p_terminal_icao or
        		v_legs(v_nlegs).fix_section_code||v_legs(v_nlegs).fix_subsection_code != 'PA' then
        		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 975) then
        			v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  '||to_char(975)||' - '||get_err_text(975)||chr(10);
        		end if;
        	end if;
        end if;	        	
        -- Parcial end nmod 9
        
                --start 06185 - Ashish Niranjan- 31-AUG-2023
        FOR i IN 1..v_nlegs LOOP
			l_first_Proc_Design_Mag_Var := v_legs(1).Proc_Design_Mag_Var;
            IF  NVL(rseg.Proc_Design_Mag_Var_Ind, '$') = 'P' and i > 1 and l_first_Proc_Design_Mag_Var is not null THEN		
								IF nvl(v_legs(i).Proc_Design_Mag_Var, l_first_Proc_Design_Mag_Var) != l_first_Proc_Design_Mag_Var THEN
										IF NOT IS_OVERRIDE(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', 1190) THEN 
											v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||' - '|| to_char(1190)||' - '||get_err_text(1190)||chr(10); 
										END IF;
								l_first_Proc_Design_Mag_Var := null;
					
							 EXIT;
               END IF;
			
							END IF;
        END LOOP;       
        --End 06185 - Ashish Niranjan- 31-AUG-2023
        
        -- Check 1st and last legs
        if v_nlegs > 1 then
         	v_err := chkprc_util.v_first_leg
                          (v_legs(1).path_and_termination, v_legs(2).path_and_termination,
                           v_legs(v_nlegs).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
                           v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc,v_is_map,
                           v_legs(1).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_nlegs).waypoint_desc_code,null);
          if v_err > 0 and not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', v_err) then
          	v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  '||to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10);
          end if;         
        else
          v_err := chkprc_util.v_first_leg
                          (v_legs(1).path_and_termination, v_legs(1).path_and_termination,
                           v_legs(v_nlegs).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
                           v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc,v_is_map,
                           v_legs(1).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_nlegs).waypoint_desc_code,null);
          if v_err > 0 and not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', v_err) then
          	v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  '||to_char(v_err)||' - Single Leg, '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10);
          end if;         
        end if; 
        if v_nlegs > 1 then
          v_err := chkprc_util.v_last_leg
                          (v_legs(1).path_and_termination, v_legs(2).path_and_termination,
                           v_legs(v_nlegs).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
                           v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc,v_is_map,
                           v_legs(1).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_nlegs).waypoint_desc_code);
          if v_err > 0 and not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', v_err) then
          		v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  '||to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10);
          end if;         
        else
          v_err := chkprc_util.v_last_leg
                          (v_legs(1).path_and_termination, v_legs(1).path_and_termination,
                           v_legs(v_nlegs).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
                           v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc,v_is_map,
                           v_legs(1).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_nlegs).waypoint_desc_code);
          if v_err > 0 and not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', v_err) then
          	v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'->  '||to_char(v_err)||' - Single Leg, '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10);
          end if;         
         	if rtrim(v_legs(1).alt_1) is not null then
      			v_altitude := 'Y';
         	end if;
        end if; 
        -- Check the existence of all fields
        chkprc_util.v_fields_exist('STAR', v_legs, v_nlegs, v_errlist);
        if v_errlist.count > 0 then
      	  for i in 1..v_errlist.count loop
            v_err_num := to_number(substr(to_char(v_errlist(i)),1,4));
            v_seq := v_legs(to_number(substr(to_char(v_errlist(i)),5))).SEQUENCE_NUM;
            if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', v_err_num) then
            	v_all_errors := v_all_errors||'->  Seq#'||v_seq||' - '||
          									to_char(v_err_num)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err_num)||chr(10);          	
            end if;
            if length(v_all_errors) > 7000 then
            	v_all_errors := v_all_errors||'....';
            	exit;
            end if;	
      	  end loop;
        end if;
        if v_all_errors is not null then
        	ls_Proc_Err := ls_Proc_Err||chr(10)||'* Route Type '''||v_segs(i).route_type||''', Transition '''||
        									v_segs(i).transition_ident||''': '||chr(10)||v_all_errors;
        	v_all_errors := null;	
        end if;
        -- End check one segment
      end loop;
      chkprc_util.check_exist_route_types('STAR',v_exist_route,seg_transition,seg_route_type,v_errlist,v_err);
      if v_err > 0 then
      	for i in 1..v_errlist.count loop
      		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', v_errlist(i)) then
      			ls_Proc_Err := '* '||to_char(v_errlist(i))||' - '||get_err_text(v_errlist(i))||chr(10)||ls_Proc_Err; 
      		end if;
      	end loop;
      end if;
      
-- SCR 6146--Madhu--19-Jan-2021   
			IF v_common_aircraft_type IS NULL THEN
		
					v_transition_aircraft_type := v_enrt_transition_aircraft_typ;
					v_rwy_transition_aircraft_type  := replace(v_rwy_transition_aircraft_type, ',', null);
					v_transition_aircraft_type  := replace(v_transition_aircraft_type, ',', null);
					v_invalid_values			:= v_transition_aircraft_type;
					
					For i in 1..nvl(length(v_rwy_transition_aircraft_type),0) loop
		
						v_common_aircraft_type := substr(v_rwy_transition_aircraft_type, i,1);				
						v_invalid_aircraft_type := chkprc_util.check_aircraft_type_comb(v_transition_aircraft_type, v_common_aircraft_type, v_invalid_values);
					
					end loop; 
					
					IF v_invalid_aircraft_type = 'Y' AND v_invalid_values IS NOT NULL THEN
						IF NOT UTIL1.IS_OVERRIDE_ERROR(:global.data_supplier,v_processing_cycle,'STAR', 5678) THEN
								ls_Proc_Err := '*5678 - '||get_err_text(5678)||chr(10)||ls_Proc_err;
							END IF;
					END IF;
				
			ELSE	
	      	v_transition_aircraft_type := v_enrt_transition_aircraft_typ||v_rwy_transition_aircraft_type;
	      	v_transition_aircraft_type  := replace(v_transition_aircraft_type, ',', null);
					v_invalid_aircraft_type := chkprc_util.check_aircraft_type_comb(v_transition_aircraft_type, v_common_aircraft_type, v_invalid_values);
					
					IF v_invalid_aircraft_type = 'Y' THEN
							IF NOT UTIL1.IS_OVERRIDE_ERROR(:global.data_supplier,v_processing_cycle,'STAR', 5680) THEN
								ls_Proc_Err := '*5680 - '||get_err_text(5680)||chr(10)||ls_Proc_err;
							END IF;
					END IF;
			END IF;
-- SCR 6146--Madhu--19-Jan-2021      
 --Begin fix SCR 5990 --Madhu --27-Sep-2013
      IF LENGTH(ls_Proc_Err) < 20000 THEN
      	p_error_list := ls_Proc_Err;
      ELSIF LENGTH(ls_Proc_Err) >= 20000 THEN
      	p_error_list := SUBSTR(ls_Proc_Err,1,20000);
      END IF;
 --End fix SCR 5990 --Madhu --27-Sep-2013
      -- End checking one procedure
    exception
    	when v_exception then
    	   p_error_list := ls_Proc_Err;--Fix SCR 6909--Madhu--28-Jun-2016
    	   --null;
    	when others then 
    	    dsp_msg(sqlerrm); 
    end v_one_proc;
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Package Body
   ----------
   * Name                                            SET_MESSAGE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE set_message(p_show varchar2) IS
BEGIN
	if p_show = 'Y' then
    if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
  	  set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
	    set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
	  else
  	  set_item_property('control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
	    set_item_property('control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
	  end if;
  else
    if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
    	:control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS := null;
	    set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
  	  set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
	  else
    	:control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS := null;
	    set_item_property('control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
  	  set_item_property('control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
	  end if;
  end if;
  synchronize;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            VALIDATE_KEYS
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE validate_keys(p_ignore_ref varchar2 := 'Y') IS
v_dcr   number;
v_err   number;
v_all_errs  varchar2(32000):= null;--Increased the length from 200 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Neelima, 07-Mar-2011
v_cycle number(6);
v_processing_cycle number(6);
BEGIN
	Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'BUSY');
	if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
		if rtrim(:pl_std_star.processing_cycle) is null then
  		:pl_std_star.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
		end if;	
		v_processing_cycle := :pl_std_star.processing_cycle;
		if :global.recent_cycle >= v_processing_cycle then
  		v_cycle := v_processing_cycle;
  	else
  		v_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;
		-- Check Area Code 
    v_err := util1.v_area_code(:pl_std_star.area_code);
    v_dcr := vrel2.check_reference(p_ignore_ref, 'pl_std_star',:pl_std_star.create_dcr_number,
    																	 'S','P','A',
                                       :global.data_supplier,
                                       v_cycle,--:pl_std_star.processing_cycle,
                                       :pl_std_star.airport_icao,
                                       :pl_std_star.airport_ident);
    if p_ignore_ref = 'N' then
    	set_update_dcr('PL_STD_STAR',null);
    end if;	                                   
  else
  	validate_extra_fields(:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle,:pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag);
  	if rtrim(:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle) is null then
  		:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
  	end if;	
  	v_processing_cycle := :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle;
  /*	if :global.recent_cycle >= v_processing_cycle then
  		v_cycle := v_processing_cycle;
  	else
  		v_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;*/ --7607
  	v_cycle := v_processing_cycle; --7607
  	if rtrim(:pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag) is null then
  		:pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag := 'Y';
  	end if;
  	 -- Check Customer Ident
  	v_err := util1.v_customer(:pl_tld_star.customer_ident); 
  	-- Check Airport
  	v_dcr := vrel2.check_reference(p_ignore_ref, 'pl_tld_star', :pl_tld_star.create_dcr_number,
  																		 'T','P','A',
                                       :global.data_supplier,
                                       v_cycle, --:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle,
                                       :pl_tld_star.airport_icao,
                                       :pl_tld_star.airport_ident,
                                       :pl_tld_star.customer_ident,
                                       null,null,
                                       :pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag,
                                       null,'DU'); --7607 added null and DU
	    if p_ignore_ref = 'N' then
    	set_update_dcr('PL_TLD_STAR',null); -- Fix SCR 6909 --Madhu
    end if;
  end if;
	if v_err > 0 or v_dcr is null then
  	if v_err > 0 then 
  		if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'STAR', v_err) then
  			v_all_errs := '* '||to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err);
  		end if;	
  	end if;
  	if v_dcr is null then
  		v_all_errs := '* 216 - '||get_err_text(216);
  	end if;
		:control_block.key_errors := v_all_errs||chr(10);
 		set_message('Y');
		if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
    	:control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS := v_all_errs||:pl_std_star.ref_info;
    	if :PL_STD_STAR.ref_info is null then
    		if nvl(:pl_std_star.validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') then
    			:pl_std_star.validate_ind := 'I';
    			:pl_std_star.old_validate_ind := 'I';
    			:control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1;
    		end if;
    	else
    		set_item_property('control_block.STD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
    		set_item_property('control_block.STD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
    		Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
    		--raise form_trigger_failure;
    	end if;
   	else
  		:control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS := v_all_errs||:pl_tld_star.ref_info;
  		if :PL_TLD_STAR.ref_info is null then
  			if nvl(:pl_tld_star.validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') then
  				:pl_tld_star.validate_ind := 'I';
  				:pl_tld_star.old_validate_ind := 'I';
  				:control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1;
  			end if;
  		else
    		set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
    		set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
    		Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
    		--raise form_trigger_failure;
  		end if;
  	end if; 		
 	else
		:control_block.key_errors := null;		
    set_message('N');
 	end if;	
	Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CHECK_PROC_PK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

FUNCTION check_proc_pk RETURN boolean IS
  v_exist number := 0;
BEGIN
  if upper(:parameter.record_type) = 'S' then
  	select count(*) 
  	into   v_exist
  	from   pl_std_star
  	where  airport_ident    = :pl_std_star.airport_ident
  	and    airport_icao     = :pl_std_star.airport_icao
  	and    star_ident       = :pl_std_star.star_ident
  	and    processing_cycle = :pl_std_star.processing_cycle
  	and    data_supplier    = :pl_std_star.data_supplier
  	and    create_dcr_number != nvl(:pl_std_star.create_dcr_number,0);
  else                                                        
  	select count(*) 
  	into   v_exist
  	from   pl_tld_star
  	where  airport_ident    = :pl_tld_star.airport_ident
  	and    airport_icao     = :pl_tld_star.airport_icao
  	and    star_ident       = :pl_tld_star.star_ident
  	and    customer_ident   = :pl_tld_star.customer_ident
  	and    processing_cycle = :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle
  	and    data_supplier    = :pl_tld_star.data_supplier
  	and    create_dcr_number != nvl(:pl_tld_star.create_dcr_number,0);
  end if;	
  if v_exist > 0 then
  	return FALSE;
  end if;
  return TRUE;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Function
   ----------
   * Name                                            CHECK_SEGMENT_PK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

FUNCTION Check_segment_pk RETURN boolean IS
  v_exist number := 0;
BEGIN
  if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
  	select count(*) 
  	into   v_exist
  	from   pl_std_star_segment
  	where  route_type       = :pl_std_star_segment.route_type
  	and    transition_ident = :pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident
  	and    aircraft_type = :pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type --65347
  	and    airport_ident    = :pl_std_star_segment.airport_ident
  	and    airport_icao     = :pl_std_star_segment.airport_icao
  	and    star_ident       = :pl_std_star_segment.star_ident
  	and    processing_cycle = :pl_std_star_segment.processing_cycle
  	and    data_supplier    = :pl_std_star_segment.data_supplier
  	and    create_dcr_number != :pl_std_star_segment.create_dcr_number;
  else
  	select count(*) 
  	into   v_exist
  	from   pl_tld_star_segment
  	where  route_type       = :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type
  	and    transition_ident = :pl_tld_star_segment.transition_ident
  	and    aircraft_type = :pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type --65347
  	and    airport_ident    = :pl_tld_star_segment.airport_ident
  	and    airport_icao     = :pl_tld_star_segment.airport_icao
  	and    star_ident       = :pl_tld_star_segment.star_ident
  	and    customer_ident   = :pl_tld_star_segment.customer_ident
  	and    processing_cycle = :pl_tld_star_segment.processing_cycle
  	and    data_supplier    = :pl_tld_star_segment.data_supplier
  	and    create_dcr_number != :pl_tld_star_segment.create_dcr_number;
  end if;
  if v_exist > 0 then
  	return FALSE;
  end if;
  return TRUE;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Function
   ----------
   * Name                                            SET_WAYPOINT_CODE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE set_waypoint_code IS
  v_waypoint_code  varchar2(4);
BEGIN
  if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
  	v_waypoint_code := rtrim(nvl(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.wc1,' ')||
                 			 nvl(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.wc2,' ')||
                       nvl(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.wc3,' ')||
                       nvl(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.wc4,' '));
  	if nvl(v_waypoint_code,' ') != nvl(:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE,' ') then
  		:PL_STD_STAR_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE := v_waypoint_code;
  	end if;
  else
  	v_waypoint_code := rtrim(nvl(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.wc1,' ')||
                 			 nvl(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.wc2,' ')||
                       nvl(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.wc3,' ')||
                       nvl(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.wc4,' '));
  	if nvl(v_waypoint_code,' ') != nvl(:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE,' ') then
  		:PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE := v_waypoint_code;
  	end if;
  end if;	
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CHECK_TO_COMMIT
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/* Formatted on 2011/09/07 22:40 (Formatter Plus v4.8.7) */
PROCEDURE check_to_commit (p_action_type VARCHAR2)
IS
   v_master        VARCHAR2 (30)    := SUBSTR (:SYSTEM.cursor_block, 1, 11);
   v_button        NUMBER (1)       := 1;
   total_rows      NUMBER;
   cursor_block    VARCHAR2 (30)    := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
   cursor_record   VARCHAR2 (4)     := :SYSTEM.cursor_record;
   cursor_item     VARCHAR2 (100)   := :SYSTEM.cursor_item;
   v_temp          VARCHAR2 (32000);  --Increased the length from 8000 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Neelima, 07-Mar-2011
   v_button_text   VARCHAR2 (100);
   v_ignore_ref    VARCHAR2 (1);
   msgnum          NUMBER         	:= MESSAGE_CODE; -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 07-Sep-2011    
   ls_Table				VARCHAR2(50) ; -- Fix SCR 6460--Madhu - 9-Jun-2021
   ln_cnt 				NUMBER; -- Fix SCR 6460--Madhu - 9-Jun-2021
   
BEGIN
   IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN
   	ls_Table := Get_Block_Property( SUBSTR (:SYSTEM.cursor_block, 1, 11), QUERY_DATA_SOURCE_NAME); -- Fix SCR 6460--Madhu - 9-Jun-2021
      set_waypoint_code;
     IF    :SYSTEM.form_status = 'CHANGED' OR (:control_block.validated = 'N'
             AND NAME_IN ('control_block.'|| SUBSTR (:SYSTEM.cursor_block, 4, 3)||'_VALIDATION_ERRORS') IS NOT NULL) THEN
         IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
            v_button_text := 'Cancel';
         call_trans_ident_chk;  -- Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.
         :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'SAVE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012              
         ELSIF p_action_type = 'EXIT' THEN
            v_button_text := 'Exit Without Save';
         ELSIF p_action_type NOT IN ('ENTER_QUERY', 'EXECUTE_QUERY') THEN
            v_button_text := 'Clear Without Save';
         ELSE
            v_button_text := 'Cancel Modification';
         END IF;

         IF :GLOBAL.lib_refreshed = 'Y' THEN
            v_button :=
               display_alert.more_buttons
                       ('S','Refresh Record','You have modified record(s). Select an option: '|| CHR (10)|| ' '|| CHR (10)|| 
                         --'1. Save without refreshing the Master Library'||chr(10)|| -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 07-Sep-2011 
                           '1. Save and refresh Master Library'|| CHR (10)|| 
						   						 '2. Cancel modification, NO Save, NO Refresh',
                           'Save&Refresh',v_button_text
                        );
         ELSE
            IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
               v_button := 1;
          --Begin Fix - SCR 5814 - Madhu - 14-Nov-2012.
            ELSIF :SYSTEM.form_status <> 'CHANGED' and p_action_type = 'EXIT' THEN
            	 v_button := 2;
          --End Fix - SCR 5814 - Madhu - 14-Nov-2012.
            ELSE
               v_button :=
                  display_alert.more_buttons
	                  ('S','Refresh Record','Record is modified or inserted or deleted. Select an option: '|| CHR (10)|| ' ',
	                   'Save',v_button_text
	                  );
            END IF;
	--Begin Fix - SCR 5814 - Madhu - 14-Nov-2012.
	            IF v_button = 1 THEN
			             :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'SAVE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012                       
			            COMMIT_FORM;
		         ELSE
		            EXIT_FORM (no_commit); 
		         END IF;
	--End Fix - SCR 5814 - Madhu - 14-Nov-2012.
         END IF;
      -- Here the v_button values are chnaged 2 in place of 3, 1 in place of 2 for SCR 5180 - Eswar KC
         IF    (:GLOBAL.lib_refreshed = 'Y' AND v_button = 2)
            OR (:GLOBAL.lib_refreshed != 'Y' AND v_button = 1) 	
            OR (:GLOBAL.lib_refreshed != 'Y' AND v_button = 2) OR v_button = 3 THEN --Fix - SCR 5814 - Madhu - 14-Nov-2012.
            IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
            	 call_trans_ident_chk;  -- Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.
               NULL;
            ELSIF p_action_type = 'EXIT' THEN
               EXIT_FORM (no_commit);
            ELSE
               GO_BLOCK (v_master || '_LEG');
               CLEAR_BLOCK (no_commit);
               GO_BLOCK (v_master || '_SEGMENT');
               CLEAR_BLOCK (no_commit);
               GO_BLOCK (v_master);
               CLEAR_RECORD;
            END IF;
         ELSE
            -- Validate Procedure
            IF RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.airport_ident')) IS NOT NULL THEN
               IF p_action_type IS NOT NULL THEN
                  v_ignore_ref := 'N';
               ELSE
                  v_ignore_ref := 'Y';
               END IF;
               validate_procedure (v_ignore_ref);
               call_trans_ident_chk;  -- Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.
        			 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'SAVE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Dass - 16-Sep-2012              
               COMMIT_FORM;
               validate_procedure (v_ignore_ref);-- Fix -- SCR 3403.03 --Madhu --14-May-2013
               IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
                  v_temp := :control_block.tld_validation_errors;
               ELSE
                  v_temp := :control_block.std_validation_errors;
               END IF;

               -- Begin Fix SCR 6460--Madhu - 9-Jun-2021	
               	forms_utilities.check_valid_ind_const_prc(substr(ls_Table,4),
               																						RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.create_dcr_number')),
               																						:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
               																						RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.processing_cycle')),
               																						ln_cnt
               																						);
               --dsp_msg('count:'||ln_cnt);
               IF ln_cnt > 0 THEN
               	IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
               		:PL_TLD_STAR.VALIDATE_IND := 'I';
               	ELSE
               		:PL_STD_STAR.VALIDATE_IND := 'I';
               	END IF;
               		v_temp := v_temp||'- There exists an inconsistency in validate indicator of STAR and STAR Leg. Please re-query the record to get proper error details.';
