               	refresh_master_library.set_record_group
										(RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.create_dcr_number')),RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.validate_ind')) ,
								 		v_master,RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.processing_cycle')),'U');
               	commit_form;
               END IF;
               --End Fix SCR 6460--Madhu - 9-Jun-2021               
               
               update_proc_type_and_altitude (v_master, 'A');
               IF :SYSTEM.form_status = 'CHANGED' THEN
                	:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'SAVE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 16-Sep-2012              
                	call_trans_ident_chk;  -- Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.
                  COMMIT_FORM;
               END IF;

               GO_BLOCK (cursor_block);
               IF cursor_block NOT LIKE '%STAR' THEN
                  GO_RECORD (cursor_record);
               END IF;
               GO_ITEM (cursor_item);
            END IF;
            IF p_action_type IN ('DOWN', 'NEXT_RECORD') THEN
               NEXT_RECORD;
            END IF;

            -- Set for Refreshing
            IF :GLOBAL.lib_refreshed = 'Y' THEN
               total_rows := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT (FIND_GROUP ('Refresh_Records_Group'));
-- Below removed the logic for the button 'Save Only' as per needed. - Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5180.
               IF total_rows > 0 THEN
                    refresh_master_library.refresh_records (total_rows);
						     		IF (msgnum = 40400) THEN  -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 07-Sep-2011 
						           CLEAR_MESSAGE; 
						     		END IF;                    
               END IF;
            END IF;
            :control_block.validated := 'Y';
            IF v_temp IS NOT NULL THEN
               IF :parameter.record_type = 'S' THEN
                  :control_block.std_validation_errors := v_temp;
                  SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('control_block.std_validation_errors', visible, property_true);
                  SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('control_block.std_validation_errors', enabled, property_true );
               ELSE
                  :control_block.tld_validation_errors := v_temp;
                  SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('control_block.tld_validation_errors', visible, property_true);
                  SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('control_block.tld_validation_errors', enabled, property_true);
               END IF;
            END IF;
         END IF;
      ELSE
         refresh_master_library.if_refresh;
      END IF;
   END IF;
--if :system.cursor_block like 'PL%STAR' and name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.create_dcr_number') is not null then
-- INVALID_RECORD_COUNT(NULL,NULL,NULL,'MASTER');
--end if;
--Start SCR 64476 -Ashish N- 08-May-2019
 	IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN 
			go_item('pl_tld_star.customer_ident');
 	ELSE
 			go_item('pl_std_star.airport_ident');
 	END IF;
--End SCR 64476 -Ashish N- 08-May-2019
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level

/* Package is created and used by Plotting Function */
PACKAGE PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG IS
   TYPE ltyp_Plot_Process IS RECORD
   (ln_Process_ID   PLS_INTEGER,
    ls_DataType     VARCHAR2(30));

   TYPE ltyp_Process_ID IS TABLE OF ltyp_Plot_Process
   INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
   
   ltab_Process_ID           ltyp_Process_ID; 
   ln_Plot_Process_Counter   INTEGER;
   ls_Plotting_Function_Dir  VARCHAR2(2000);

   Ffi_error        BOOLEAN;
   Ffi_error_text   VARCHAR2 (2000);
   Ffi_error_code   NUMBER;

   FUNCTION Winexec (Cmd IN OUT VARCHAR2, Ucmdshow IN OUT PLS_INTEGER)
      RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

   FUNCTION Getcoreptdupid
      RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

   FUNCTION get_process_count
      RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

   FUNCTION GetInstallationDir
      RETURN VARCHAR2;

   PROCEDURE Exit_coreptdu_plot (Pi_sprocess_id VARCHAR2);

END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Package Spec
   ----------
   * Name                                            PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Program Unit Text                               

/* Package is created and used by Plotting Function */
PACKAGE BODY PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG IS
   /* Declare the library and function handles. */
   Getcoreptdupid_lhandle       Ora_ffi.Libhandletype;
   Getcoreptdupid_fhandle       Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
   Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle   Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
   get_process_count_fhandle    Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
   GetInstallationDir_fhandle   Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;

   -- Private Package Variables
   Lh_kernel32                  Ora_ffi.Libhandletype;
   Fh_winexec                   Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
   
   FUNCTION Getcoreptdupid_handle (Fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype)
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER;
   PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, Getcoreptdupid_handle, 11265);

   FUNCTION get_process_count_handle (Fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype)
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER;
   PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, get_process_count_handle, 11265);


   FUNCTION Exit_coreptdu_plot_handle (Fhandle         Ora_ffi.Funchandletype,
                                       Ls_process_id   VARCHAR2)
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER;
   PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, Exit_coreptdu_plot_handle, 11265);
   
   FUNCTION GetInstallationDir_handle (Fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype)
   RETURN VARCHAR2;
   PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, GetInstallationDir_handle, 11265);

   
   FUNCTION Getcoreptdupid
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER IS
   BEGIN
      RETURN (Getcoreptdupid_handle (Getcoreptdupid_fhandle));
   END Getcoreptdupid;

   FUNCTION get_process_count
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER IS
   BEGIN
      RETURN (get_process_count_handle (get_process_count_fhandle));
   END get_process_count;

   PROCEDURE Exit_coreptdu_plot (Pi_sprocess_id VARCHAR2)
   AS 
      Ls_return   PLS_INTEGER;
   BEGIN
      Ls_return := Exit_coreptdu_plot_handle (Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle,
                                              Pi_sprocess_id);
   END;
   
   FUNCTION GetInstallationDir
   RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
   BEGIN
      RETURN (GetInstallationDir_handle (GetInstallationDir_fhandle));
   END GetInstallationDir;
   
   PROCEDURE Loadlibrary;

   FUNCTION I_winexec (Functionhandle   IN       Ora_ffi.Funchandletype,
                       Cmd              IN OUT   VARCHAR2,
                       Ucmdshow         IN       PLS_INTEGER)
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

   PROCEDURE Rg_winexec;
   PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, I_winexec, 11265);

   PROCEDURE Loadlibrary IS
   BEGIN
      BEGIN
         Lh_kernel32 := Ora_ffi.Find_library ('KERNEL32.DLL');
      EXCEPTION
         WHEN Ora_ffi.Ffi_error THEN
            Lh_kernel32 := Ora_ffi.Load_library (NULL, 'KERNEL32.DLL');
      END;
   EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
         Ffi_error := TRUE ;
         Ffi_error_text := Tool_err.message;
         Ffi_error_code := Tool_err.Code;
         FOR Ierrors IN 1 .. Tool_err.Nerrors
         LOOP
            message ('KERNEL32: ' || Tool_err.message);
            Tool_err.Pop;
         END LOOP;
         Tool_err.CLEAR;
   END Loadlibrary;

   PROCEDURE Rg_winexec IS
   BEGIN
      Fh_winexec := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Lh_kernel32,
                                               'WinExec',
                                               Ora_ffi.C_std);
      Ora_ffi.Register_parameter (Fh_winexec, Ora_ffi.C_char_ptr);
      Ora_ffi.Register_parameter (Fh_winexec, Ora_ffi.C_int);
      Ora_ffi.Register_return (Fh_winexec, Ora_ffi.C_int);
   EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
         Ffi_error := TRUE ;
         Ffi_error_text := Tool_err.message;
         Ffi_error_code := Tool_err.Code;
         FOR Ierrors IN 1 .. Tool_err.Nerrors
         LOOP
            message ('KERNEL32: ' || Tool_err.message);
            Tool_err.Pop;
         END LOOP;
         Tool_err.CLEAR;
   END Rg_winexec;

   FUNCTION Winexec (Cmd IN OUT VARCHAR2, Ucmdshow IN OUT PLS_INTEGER)
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER IS 
      Rc           PLS_INTEGER;
      L_cmd        VARCHAR2 (8192) := rpad (substr (nvl (Cmd, ' '), 1, 8192), 8192, chr (0));
      L_ucmdshow   PLS_INTEGER     := Ucmdshow;
   BEGIN
      Rc       := I_winexec (Fh_winexec, L_cmd, L_ucmdshow);
      Cmd      := L_cmd;
      Ucmdshow := L_ucmdshow;
      RETURN Rc;
   END Winexec;

BEGIN
   /*
   BEGIN
	   Getcoreptdupid_lhandle :=
	      Ora_ffi.Load_library ('C:\Program Files\Honeywell Inc., Aviation Services\CorePTDU Tool\','PFUtils.dll');
	
	   -- Register the foreign function. 
	   Getcoreptdupid_fhandle := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
	                                                        'GetCorePTDUPID',
	                                                        Ora_ffi.C_std);
	
	   Ora_ffi.Register_return (Getcoreptdupid_fhandle, Ora_ffi.C_int);
	
	   get_process_count_fhandle := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
	                                                           'get_process_count',
	                                                           Ora_ffi.C_std);
	
	   Ora_ffi.Register_return (get_process_count_fhandle, Ora_ffi.C_int);
	
	   GetInstallationDir_fhandle := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
	                                                            'GetInstallationDir',
	                                                            Ora_ffi.C_std);
	                                                            
	   Ora_ffi.Register_return (GetInstallationDir_fhandle, Ora_ffi.C_char_ptr);
	
	   Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle :=
	                             Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
	                                                        'KillDUApp',
	                                                        Ora_ffi.C_std);
	                                                        
	   Ora_ffi.Register_parameter (Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle,
	                               Ora_ffi.C_char_ptr);

   EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
         NULL;
   END;      
   	
   Loadlibrary;
   Rg_winexec;
   */
   NULL;
END PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG;
   * Program Unit Type                               Package Body
   ----------
   * Name                                            SET_UPDATE_DCR
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/*
    SCR 0129 --Madhu -- 15-Apr-2012 
    This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done to this form from baseline version of build 229A to 236
    (SCR no's 5359)
    
    Mod 6665: SCR 6665--Madhu--25-Aug-2015
    Mod 6885: SCR 6885--Madhu--14-Oct-2015
*/
PROCEDURE set_update_dcr (
   p_block    VARCHAR2,
   p_record   sdv_records.cr_airport_procedure
)
IS
   get_rec_cur         cpt_types.refcur;
   get_rec_cur1        cpt_types.refcur;      -- Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 30-Dec-2011
   rtld_star           pl_tld_star%ROWTYPE;
   rstd_star           pl_std_star%ROWTYPE;
   rtld_star_segment   pl_tld_star_segment%ROWTYPE;
   rstd_star_segment   pl_std_star_segment%ROWTYPE;
   rtld_star_leg       pl_tld_star_leg%ROWTYPE;
   rstd_star_leg       pl_std_star_leg%ROWTYPE;
   v_dcr               NUMBER       := NAME_IN (p_block ||'.create_dcr_number');
   v_cycle_data        VARCHAR2 (4) := SUBSTR (NAME_IN (p_block ||'.processing_cycle'), 3);
   v_count             NUMBER       := 0;
BEGIN
   IF p_block LIKE 'PL_STD_STAR'
   THEN
      OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_std_star WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
      LOOP
         FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rstd_star;
         EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
         v_count := v_count + 1;
         IF NVL (:pl_std_star.area_code, ' ') != NVL (rstd_star.area_code, ' ') OR
--Begin Fix SCR 6909 --Madhu
	    NVL (:pl_std_star_segment.aircraft_type, ' ') != NVL (rstd_star_segment.aircraft_type, ' ') OR
	    NVL (:pl_std_star.specials_ind, ' ') != NVL (rstd_star.specials_ind, ' ') OR
--End Fix SCR 6909 --Madhu
				NVL (:pl_std_star.saaar_star_ind, ' ') != NVL (rstd_star.saaar_star_ind, ' ')  								-- Fix - SCR 7032.01 - Madhu - 17-Jul-2017 
         THEN
            COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
         END IF;
      END LOOP;
      CLOSE get_rec_cur;
--Begin Fix SCR 6909 --Madhu
   ELSIF p_block LIKE 'PL_TLD_STAR'
   THEN
      OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_tld_star WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
      LOOP
         FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rtld_star;
         EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
         v_count := v_count + 1;
         IF NVL (:pl_tld_star_segment.aircraft_type, ' ') != NVL (rtld_star_segment.aircraft_type, ' ') OR
	    NVL (:pl_tld_star.specials_ind, ' ') != NVL (rtld_star.specials_ind, ' ') OR
	    	NVL (:pl_tld_star.saaar_star_ind, ' ') != NVL (rtld_star.saaar_star_ind, ' ')  								-- Fix - SCR 7032.01 - Madhu - 17-Jul-2017 

         THEN
            COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
         END IF;
      END LOOP;
      CLOSE get_rec_cur;
--End Fix SCR 6909 --Madhu
   ELSIF p_block LIKE 'PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT'
   THEN
      OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_std_star_segment WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
      LOOP
         FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rstd_star_segment;
         EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
         v_count := v_count + 1;
         IF      :pl_std_star_segment.route_type 				!= rstd_star_segment.route_type OR 
                 :pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident 	!= rstd_star_segment.transition_ident OR 
            NVL (:pl_std_star_segment.qualifier_1, ' ') != NVL (rstd_star_segment.qualifier_1, ' ') OR               -- Fix - SCR 3918 - Sesha
            NVL (:pl_std_star_segment.qualifier_2, ' ') != NVL (rstd_star_segment.qualifier_2, ' ') OR								 -- Fix - SCR 3918 - Sesha
            NVL (:pl_std_star_segment.proc_design_mag_var_ind, ' ') != NVL (rstd_star_segment.proc_design_mag_var_ind, ' ') --Fis SCR 06185
         THEN
            COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_SEGMENT')||'.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
            COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 30-Dec-2011
-- Cursor fetches the leg records for a particular transaction ident to update the cycle data and navigating to the legs block
-- and finding out the particular leg record based on the create_dcr_number and updating.After updating going back to the calling block.
            OPEN get_rec_cur1 FOR
               SELECT   *
                   FROM pl_std_star_leg
                  WHERE airport_ident = rstd_star_segment.airport_ident
                    AND airport_icao = rstd_star_segment.airport_icao
                    AND star_ident = rstd_star_segment.star_ident
                    AND processing_cycle = rstd_star_segment.processing_cycle
                    AND transition_ident = rstd_star_segment.transition_ident
                    AND data_supplier = rstd_star_segment.data_supplier
                    AND route_type = rstd_star_segment.route_type
               ORDER BY sequence_num;
            LOOP
               FETCH get_rec_cur1 INTO rstd_star_leg;
               EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur1%NOTFOUND;
               GO_BLOCK ('PL_STD_STAR_LEG');
               FIRST_RECORD;
               IF :pl_std_star_leg.route_type IS NOT NULL
               THEN
                  LOOP
                     IF :pl_std_star_leg.create_dcr_number = rstd_star_leg.create_dcr_number THEN
--Start Mod 6885                     	
                     	IF :pl_std_star_segment.route_type 				!= rstd_star_segment.route_type OR 
                 				:pl_std_star_segment.transition_ident 	!= rstd_star_segment.transition_ident THEN
                        COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, 'PL_STD_STAR_LEG.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
                      END IF;
--End Mod 6885                        
                        COPY (SUBSTR (:pl_std_star.processing_cycle, 3), 'pl_std_star_leg.cycle_data' );
                     END IF;
                     EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
                     NEXT_RECORD;
                  END LOOP;
               END IF;
            END LOOP;
            GO_BLOCK (p_block);
         -- End Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 30-Dec-2011
         END IF;
      END LOOP;
      CLOSE get_rec_cur;
   ELSIF p_block LIKE 'PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT'
   THEN
      OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_tld_star_segment WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
      LOOP
         FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rtld_star_segment;
         EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
         v_count := v_count + 1;

         IF     :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type 				!= rtld_star_segment.route_type OR 
                :pl_tld_star_segment.transition_ident 	!= rtld_star_segment.transition_ident OR 
           NVL (:pl_tld_star_segment.qualifier_1, ' ') 	!= NVL (rtld_star_segment.qualifier_1, ' ') OR   -- Fix - SCR 3918 - Sesha
           NVL (:pl_tld_star_segment.qualifier_2, ' ') 	!= NVL (rtld_star_segment.qualifier_2, ' ') OR     -- Fix - SCR 3918 - Sesha
           NVL (:pl_tld_star_segment.proc_design_mag_var_ind, ' ') 	!= NVL (rtld_star_segment.proc_design_mag_var_ind, ' ') --Fix SCR 06185
         THEN
            COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_SEGMENT')||'.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
            COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 30-Dec-2011
-- Cursor fetches the leg records for a particular transaction ident to update the cycle data and navigating to the legs block
-- and finding out the particular leg record based on the create_dcr_number and updating.After updating going back to the calling block.
            OPEN get_rec_cur1 FOR
               SELECT   *
                   FROM pl_tld_star_leg
                  WHERE customer_ident 			= rtld_star_segment.customer_ident
                    AND airport_ident 			= rtld_star_segment.airport_ident
                    AND airport_icao 				= rtld_star_segment.airport_icao
                    AND star_ident 					= rtld_star_segment.star_ident
                    AND processing_cycle 		= rtld_star_segment.processing_cycle
                    AND transition_ident 		= rtld_star_segment.transition_ident
                    AND data_supplier 			= rtld_star_segment.data_supplier
                    AND route_type 					= rtld_star_segment.route_type
               ORDER BY sequence_num;
            LOOP
               FETCH get_rec_cur1 INTO rtld_star_leg;
               EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur1%NOTFOUND;
               GO_BLOCK ('PL_TLD_STAR_LEG');
               FIRST_RECORD;
               IF :pl_tld_star_leg.route_type IS NOT NULL
               THEN
                  LOOP
                     IF :pl_tld_star_leg.create_dcr_number = rtld_star_leg.create_dcr_number THEN
--Start Mod 6885                    
                     	IF :pl_tld_star_segment.route_type 				!= rtld_star_segment.route_type OR 
                					:pl_tld_star_segment.transition_ident 	!= rtld_star_segment.transition_ident THEN
                        COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, 'PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
                      END IF;
--End Mod 6885                      
                        COPY (SUBSTR (:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle, 3), 'pl_tld_star_leg.cycle_data' );
                     END IF;
                     EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
                     NEXT_RECORD;
                  END LOOP;
               END IF;
            END LOOP;
            GO_BLOCK (p_block);
         -- End Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 30-Dec-2011
         END IF;
      END LOOP;
     CLOSE get_rec_cur;
   ELSIF p_block LIKE 'PL_STD_STAR_LEG'
   THEN
      OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_std_star_leg WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
      LOOP
         FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rstd_star_leg;
         EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
         v_count := v_count + 1;
         
			  IF p_record.alt_1                            		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.alt_1,' ') OR
	         p_record.alt_2                          			!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.alt_2,' ') OR
	         p_record.alt_description                			!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.alt_description,' ') OR
	         NVL (:pl_std_star_leg.arc_radius,0)      		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.arc_radius,0) OR
	         p_record.atc_ind                        			!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.atc_ind,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.center_fix_icao_code,' ')  		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.center_fix_icao_code,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.center_fix_ident,' ')      		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.center_fix_ident,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.center_fix_multiple_code,' ') 	!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.center_fix_multiple_code,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.center_fix_section,' ')    		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.center_fix_section,' ') OR
	         p_record.center_fix_subsection          			!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.center_fix_subsection,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.fix_icao_code,' ')         		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.fix_icao_code,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.fix_ident,' ')             		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.fix_ident,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.fix_section_code,' ')      		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.fix_section_code,' ') OR
	         p_record.fix_subsection_code            			!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.fix_subsection_code,' ') OR
	         p_record.magnetic_course                			!=RPAD (NVL (rstd_star_leg.magnetic_course,' '),4) OR
	         p_record.path_and_termination           			!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.path_and_termination,'  ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_icao_code,' ') 	!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_ident,' ')   		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.recomm_navaid_ident,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_section,' ')	 		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.recomm_navaid_section,' ') OR
	         p_record.recomm_navaid_subsection       			!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection,' ') OR
	         NVL (:pl_std_star_leg.rho,0)             		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.rho,0) OR
	         NVL (p_record.rnp,' ')                   		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.rnp,' ') OR
	--         NVL (p_record.rnp2,' ')                  		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.rnp2,' ') OR  	-- SCR 4450
	--         NVL (p_record.rnp3,' ')                  		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.rnp3,' ') OR  	-- SCR 4450
	         NVL (p_record.route_distance,' ')        		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.route_distance,' ') OR
	         NVL (:pl_std_star_leg.speed_limit,0)     		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.speed_limit,0) OR
	         NVL (:pl_std_star_leg.theta,0)           		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.theta,0) OR
	         NVL (:pl_std_star_leg.trans_altitude,0)  		!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.trans_altitude,0) OR
	         p_record.turn_dir_valid                 			!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.turn_dir_valid,' ') OR
	         p_record.turn_direction                 			!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.turn_direction,' ') OR
	         NVL (:pl_std_STAR_leg.vertical_angle,0) 			!= NVL (rstd_star_leg.vertical_angle,0) OR
	         p_record.waypoint_desc_code             			!= NVL (rpad(rstd_star_leg.waypoint_desc_code,4,' '),'    ') OR
	         NVL (:pl_std_STAR_leg.proc_design_mag_var,' ')  != NVL (rstd_star_leg.proc_design_mag_var,' ') --Fix SCR 06185
	         
         THEN
            COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_LEG')||'.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
            COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
            COPY (SUBSTR (:pl_std_star.processing_cycle, 3), p_block || '.cycle_data' );                 -- Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 26-Dec-2011
         END IF;
      END LOOP;
      CLOSE get_rec_cur;
   ELSIF p_block LIKE 'PL_TLD_STAR_LEG'
   THEN
      OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_tld_star_leg WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
      LOOP
         FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rtld_star_leg;
         EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
         v_count := v_count + 1;

			  IF p_record.alt_1                          				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.alt_1,' ') OR
	         p_record.alt_2                          				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.alt_2,' ') OR
	         p_record.alt_description                				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.alt_description,' ') OR
	         NVL (:pl_tld_star_leg.arc_radius,0)      			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.arc_radius,0) OR
	         p_record.atc_ind                        				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.atc_ind,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.center_fix_icao_code,' ')  			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.center_fix_icao_code,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.center_fix_ident,' ')      			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.center_fix_ident,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.center_fix_multiple_code,' ')		!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.center_fix_multiple_code,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.center_fix_section,' ')    			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.center_fix_section,' ') OR
	         p_record.center_fix_subsection          				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.center_fix_subsection,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.fix_icao_code,' ')         			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.fix_icao_code,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.fix_ident,' ')            		 		!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.fix_ident,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.fix_section_code,' ')      			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.fix_section_code,' ') OR
	         p_record.fix_subsection_code            				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.fix_subsection_code,' ') OR
	         p_record.magnetic_course           	   	  		!=rpad(NVL (rtld_star_leg.magnetic_course,' '),4) OR            
			     p_record.path_and_termination           				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.path_and_termination,'  ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_icao_code,' ')	 		!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_ident,' ')   			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_ident,' ') OR
	         NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_section,' ') 			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_section,' ') OR
	         p_record.recomm_navaid_subsection       				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection,' ') OR
	         NVL (:pl_tld_star_leg.rho,0)             			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.rho,0) OR
	         NVL (p_record.rnp,' ')                   			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.rnp,' ') OR
	--         NVL (p_record.rnp2,' ')                  			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.rnp2,' ') OR -- SCR 4450
	--				 NVL (p_record.rnp3,' ')                  			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.rnp3,' ') OR -- SCR 4450
	         NVL (p_record.route_distance,' ')        			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.route_distance,' ') OR
	         NVL (:pl_tld_star_leg.speed_limit,0)     			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.speed_limit,0) OR
	         NVL (:pl_tld_star_leg.theta,0)           			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.theta,0) OR
	         NVL (:pl_tld_star_leg.trans_altitude,0)  			!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.trans_altitude,0) OR
	         p_record.turn_dir_valid                 				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.turn_dir_valid,' ') OR
	         p_record.turn_direction                 				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.turn_direction,' ') OR
	         NVL (:pl_tld_STAR_leg.vertical_angle,0) 				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.vertical_angle,0) OR
	         NVL (:pl_tld_STAR_leg.waypoint_desc_code,' ') 	!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.waypoint_desc_code,' ') OR
	         NVL (:pl_tld_STAR_leg.proc_design_mag_var,' ')  				!= NVL (rtld_star_leg.proc_design_mag_var,' ')  --Fix SCR 06185
         THEN
            COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_LEG')||'.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
            COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
            COPY (SUBSTR (:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle, 3), p_block || '.cycle_data');                 -- Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 26-Dec-2011
         END IF;
      END LOOP;
      CLOSE get_rec_cur;
   END IF;
   IF v_count = 0 THEN     -- it is a new record                                               
--Start Mod 6665       	                                           
      IF p_block LIKE '%LEG' THEN
      	COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_LEG')||'.update_dcr_number');
      	COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
      ELSIF p_block LIKE '%SEGMENT' THEN
      	COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_SEGMENT')||'.update_dcr_number');
      	COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
      ELSE
      	COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
      END IF;
--End Mod 6665
      IF p_block LIKE '%LEG' THEN
         COPY (v_cycle_data, p_block || '.cycle_data');
      END IF;
--Start Mod 6665
	ELSIF :Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del = 'Y' THEN
			IF p_block LIKE '%LEG' THEN
      	COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_LEG')||'.update_dcr_number');
      ELSIF p_block LIKE '%SEGMENT' THEN
      	COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_SEGMENT')||'.update_dcr_number');
      ELSE
      	COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
      END IF;
      :Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del := 'N';
	END IF;
--End Mod 6665
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CALL_TRANS_IDENT_CHK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

  -- Begin Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012. Restricting '-' along with other characters in Transition ident field. 
PROCEDURE call_trans_ident_chk IS
BEGIN
 chk_segment_trans_ident;
 chk_leg_trans_ident;	        
END;
  -- End Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CHK_LEG_TRANS_IDENT
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

-- Begin Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012. Restricting '-' along with other characters in Transition ident field. 
PROCEDURE CHK_LEG_TRANS_IDENT IS
v_num number;
v_block varchar2(100);
BEGIN
	  If :parameter.record_type='T'
  	then	
  			v_block := 'PL_TLD_STAR_LEG';  			
  	else
  			v_block := 'PL_STD_STAR_LEG';  			
  	end if; 
	  go_block(v_block);
  	first_record;  	
  	loop
	  v_num := forms_utilities.Check_trans_ident_ID(Name_in(v_block||'.TRANSITION_IDENT'));
    IF v_num = 0 THEN
    	 dsp_msg('Transition Ident '||(Name_in(v_block||'.TRANSITION_IDENT'))||' is Invalid for Procedure.'||chr(10)||
    	 					'It contains '' - '' along with other characters.');

        RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
    END IF;     
    If :system.last_record='TRUE'
    Then
    	EXIT;
    end if;
    Next_record;
    end loop;
END;
-- END Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CHK_SEGMENT_TRANS_IDENT
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

-- Begin Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012. Restricting '-' along with other characters in Transition ident field. 
PROCEDURE chk_segment_trans_ident IS
v_num number;
v_block varchar2(100);
BEGIN
	  If :parameter.record_type='T'
  	then	
  			v_block := 'PL_TLD_STAR_SEGMENT';  			
  	else
  			v_block := 'PL_STD_STAR_SEGMENT';  			
  	end if;
  	go_block(v_block);
  	first_record;  	
  	loop
	  v_num := forms_utilities.Check_trans_ident_ID(Name_in(v_block||'.TRANSITION_IDENT'));
    IF v_num = 0 THEN
    	  dsp_msg('Transition Ident '||(Name_in(v_block||'.TRANSITION_IDENT'))||' is Invalid for Procedure.'||chr(10)||
    	 					'It contains '' - '' along with other characters.');

        RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
    END IF;     
    If :system.last_record='TRUE'
    Then
    	EXIT;
    end if;
    Next_record;
    END LOOP;
 END;
-- End Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            VALIDATE_RWY_TRANSITION
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

--Begin Fix -- SCR 3403.03 --Madhu --14-May-2013
FUNCTION validate_rwy_transition
   RETURN VARCHAR2
IS
	 v_all_err			VARCHAR2 (32000):=null;
   v_cValidind    CHAR(1);
   v_sTable VARCHAR2(30);
   v_rRecord  sdv_records.cr_airport_procedure;
   v_nCycle NUMBER;
   v_nProcessing_Cycle NUMBER;
BEGIN

		populate_record(v_rRecord,v_nCycle, v_nProcessing_Cycle);
		v_sTable := 'STAR';
--7607		
		IF :global.recent_cycle >= v_nProcessing_Cycle THEN
  		v_nCycle := v_nProcessing_Cycle;
  	ELSE
  		v_nCycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	END IF;
--7607
		
  	recsv2.chk_transition_ident( :GLOBAL.data_supplier,
                                v_nCycle,
                                v_rRecord,
                                null,
                                null,
                                v_sTable,
                                null,
                                1,
                                v_cValidind);

      IF v_cValidind = 'I'
      THEN
         v_all_err := v_all_err || ' * 487 - ' || get_err_text (487)||chr(10);
      END IF;

	RETURN (v_all_err);
END;
--End Fix -- SCR 3403.03 --Madhu --14-May-2013
   * Program Unit Type                               Function
   ----------
   * Name                                            MAGNETIC_COURSE_SDV_PRC
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

--Begin Fix --SCR 4721.03 --Madhu -26-Nov-2013
PROCEDURE Magnetic_Course_SDV_Prc(pi_Record_Type IN VARCHAR2) IS
	ls_Block VARCHAR2(30);
	ls_Magnetic_Course Pl_STD_STAR_Leg.Magnetic_Course%TYPE;
BEGIN
	
  IF pi_Record_Type = 'S' THEN
  	ls_Block := 'PL_STD_STAR_LEG';
  ELSE
  	ls_Block := 'PL_TLD_STAR_LEG';
  END IF;
  
  Go_Block(ls_Block);
  FIRST_RECORD;
  LOOP
		ls_Magnetic_Course := Name_In(ls_Block||'.Magnetic_Course');
		IF ls_Magnetic_Course IS NOT NULL THEN
			recsv2.vset_global_constant (1166,ls_Magnetic_Course); 
			EXIT;
	  END IF;
	  EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
	  NEXT_RECORD;
  END LOOP;
END;
--End Fix --SCR 4721.03 --Madhu -26-Nov-2013
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            GET_CYCLE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

--Begin Fix SCR 7218 --Venkat --09-OCT-2017
FUNCTION get_cycle RETURN number IS
BEGIN
  if :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle > :global.max_cycle then
  	return :global.max_cycle;
  else
  	return nvl(:pl_tld_star.processing_cycle,:global.processing_cycle);
  end if;
END;
--Begin Fix SCR 7218 --Venkat --09-OCT-2017
   * Program Unit Type                               Function
   ----------
 - Property Classes                                  
 * Record Groups                                     
   ----------
   * Name                                            VALIDATE_IND
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 VALIDATE_IND
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Record Group Type                               Query
   - Record Group Query                              
   * Record Group Fetch Size                         0
   - Column Specifications                           
   ----------
   * Name                                            FIX_RG
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Record Group Type                               Query
   * Record Group Query                              select airport_ident,fix_ident Ident,fix_icao ICAO,record_type Type,processing_cycle Proc_Cycle,fix_section S,fix_subsection SS,Cust_Ident Cust,latitude,longitude
from  all_fixes_vw_syn 
where  fix_ident = :PL_TLD_STAR_LEG.FIX_IDENT
and (:PARAMETER.FIX_ICAO IS NULL or fix_icao = :PARAMETER.FIX_ICAO)
and  processing_cycle in  (util2.get_previous_cycle(:PL_TLD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE),:PL_TLD_STAR.PROCESSING_CYCLE )
and    data_supplier    = :global.data_supplier
and    validate_ind in ('Y','O')
and   ( record_type = 'S' 
OR ( record_type = 'T' AND cust_ident = :PL_TLD_STAR.CUSTOMER_IDENT and    generated_in_house_flag = 'Y'))
order by Proc_Cycle desc,type,airport_ident
   * Record Group Fetch Size                         0
   * Column Specifications                           
     ----------
     * Name                                          AIRPORT_IDENT
     * Data Length Semantics                         BYTE
     * Maximum Length                                4
     * Column Data Type                              Character
     - Column Value List                             
     ----------
     * Name                                          IDENT
     * Data Length Semantics                         BYTE
     * Maximum Length                                5
     * Column Data Type                              Character
     - Column Value List                             
     ----------
     * Name                                          ICAO
     * Data Length Semantics                         BYTE
     * Maximum Length                                2
     * Column Data Type                              Character
     - Column Value List                             
     ----------
     * Name                                          TYPE
     * Data Length Semantics                         BYTE
     * Maximum Length                                1
     * Column Data Type                              Character
     - Column Value List                             
     ----------
     * Name                                          PROC_CYCLE
     * Data Length Semantics                         Null
     * Maximum Length                                23
     * Column Data Type                              Number
     - Column Value List                             
     ----------
     * Name                                          S
     * Data Length Semantics                         BYTE
     * Maximum Length                                1
     * Column Data Type                              Character
     - Column Value List                             
     ----------
     * Name                                          SS
     * Data Length Semantics                         BYTE
     * Maximum Length                                1
     * Column Data Type                              Character
     - Column Value List                             
     ----------
     * Name                                          CUST
     * Data Length Semantics                         BYTE
     * Maximum Length                                3
     * Column Data Type                              Character
     - Column Value List                             
     ----------
     * Name                                          LATITUDE
     * Data Length Semantics                         BYTE
     * Maximum Length                                9
     * Column Data Type                              Character
     - Column Value List                             
     ----------
     * Name                                          LONGITUDE
     * Data Length Semantics                         BYTE
     * Maximum Length                                10
     * Column Data Type                              Character
     - Column Value List                             
     ----------
   ----------
   * Name                                            AIRPORT_RG
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Record Group Type                               Query
   * Record Group Query                              SELECT 'STD' TYPE,
       airport_ident,
       airport_icao,
       airport_name
  FROM pl_std_airport
 WHERE airport_ident LIKE
          RTRIM (:pl_tld_star.airport_ident, '%') || '%'
       AND processing_cycle = :parameter.comp_cycle
       AND data_supplier = :global.data_supplier
       AND validate_ind IN ('Y', 'S', 'H', 'O')
UNION
SELECT 'TLD' TYPE,
       airport_ident,
       airport_icao,
       airport_name
  FROM pl_tld_airport
 WHERE airport_ident LIKE
          RTRIM (:pl_tld_star.airport_ident, '%') || '%'
       AND processing_cycle = :pl_tld_star.processing_cycle
       AND data_supplier = :global.data_supplier
       AND validate_ind IN ('Y', 'S', 'H', 'O')
       AND CUSTOMER_IDENT = :pl_tld_star.CUSTOMER_IDENT
       AND generated_in_house_flag LIKE
              RTRIM (:pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag, 'Y') || '%'
UNION
SELECT 'TLD' TYPE,
       airport_ident,
       airport_icao,
       airport_name
  FROM pl_tld_airport
 WHERE airport_ident LIKE
          RTRIM (:pl_tld_star.airport_ident, '%') || '%'
       AND processing_cycle = :parameter.comp_cycle
       AND data_supplier = :global.data_supplier
       AND validate_ind IN ('Y', 'S', 'H', 'O')
       AND CUSTOMER_IDENT = :pl_tld_star.CUSTOMER_IDENT
       AND generated_in_house_flag LIKE
              RTRIM (:pl_tld_star.generated_in_house_flag, 'Y') || '%'
ORDER BY TYPE, airport_ident
   * Record Group Fetch Size                         0

     * Maximum Length                                3
